@RestResource(urlMapping='/Account/*')
global with sharing class AccountRESTWebservice {

    global static List<string> restServiceErrorMessages{get;set;}

    global class ClientReqModel{   
        public string Id {get;set;}
        public string Name {get;set;}
        public string LastName {get;set;}
        public string FirstName {get;set;}
        public string MiddleName {get;set;}
        public string Salutation {get;set;}
        public string Suffix {get;set;}
        public string TYPE {get;set;}
        public string RECORDTYPEID {get; set;}        
        public string PERSONMOBILEPHONE {get;set;}
        public string PERSONEMAIL {get;set;}
        public string PREFERRED_COMMUNICATION_METHOD {get;set;}
        public string OPT_IN_FOR_AFTER_SALES_MARKETING {get;set;}
        public string OTHER_INFORMATION {get;set;}   
        public string IsPersonAccount {get; set;} 
        public string Mobile {get; set;}
        public string Email {get; set;} 
        public string PrefComm {get; set;} 
        public string Optin {get; set;} 
        public string Other {get; set;} 
        public boolean Insurer {get; set;} 
        public boolean Broker {get; set;} 
        public boolean Admin {get; set;}
        public boolean Estimator {get; set;}
        public boolean ServiceAdvisor {get; set;}
        public integer ClaimID {get; set;}
        public integer BranchID {get; set;}
        public string SalesForceID {get; set;}
        public string DateAdded {get; set;}
    }

    global class ClientReqResponseModel{   
        public string SFClientUniqueId { get; set; }
        public string ClientName {get;set;}
        public string ClientContactNo {get;set;}
        public string MethodName { get; set; }
        public string WasSuccessful { get; set; }
        public string ErrorMessage { get; set; }
    }

    @HttpPost
    global static ClientReqResponseModel CreateClient(ClientReqModel clientModel) {
        ClientReqResponseModel response = new ClientReqResponseModel();
        List<String> restServiceErrorMessages = new List<String>();

        try {
            System.debug('Input clientModel: ' + JSON.serializePretty(clientModel));

            if (clientModel == null) {
                throw new AuraHandledException('Client model is null');
            }

            Boolean isInsurer = clientModel.Insurer != null ? clientModel.Insurer : false;
            Boolean isBroker = clientModel.Broker != null ? clientModel.Broker : false;
            Boolean isAdmin = clientModel.Admin != null ? clientModel.Admin : false;
            Boolean isEstimator = clientModel.Estimator != null ? clientModel.Estimator : false;
            Boolean IsServiceAdvisor = clientModel.ServiceAdvisor != null ? clientModel.ServiceAdvisor : false;

            if (isInsurer || isBroker) {

                List<Account> existingAccounts = [
                    SELECT Id, Name, Phone
                    FROM Account
                    WHERE Name = :(clientModel.FirstName != null ? clientModel.FirstName : '') + ' ' + (clientModel.LastName != null ? clientModel.LastName : '')
                    LIMIT 1
                ];

                Account account;
                if (!existingAccounts.isEmpty()) {

                    account = existingAccounts[0];
                    response.SFClientUniqueId = account.Id;
                    response.ClientName = account.Name;
                    response.ClientContactNo = account.Phone;
                    response.WasSuccessful = 'true';
                    response.MethodName = 'CreateClient - Existing Found';

                } else {

                    account = new Account();
                    account.Name = (clientModel.FirstName != null ? clientModel.FirstName : '') + ' ' + (clientModel.LastName != null ? clientModel.LastName : '');

                    if (String.isBlank(account.Name)) {
                        throw new AuraHandledException('Account name cannot be blank');
                    }

                    if (isInsurer) {
                        account.RecordTypeId = Schema.SObjectType.Account.getRecordTypeInfosByDeveloperName().get('Insurance_Company').getRecordTypeId();
                        account.Type = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.Type) ? clientModel.Type : 'Insurance Company';
                    } else if (isBroker) {
                        account.RecordTypeId = Schema.SObjectType.Account.getRecordTypeInfosByDeveloperName().get('Broker').getRecordTypeId();
                        account.Type = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.Type) ? clientModel.Type : 'Broker'; 
                    }

                    account.Phone = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.Mobile) ? clientModel.Mobile : (String.isNotBlank(clientModel.PERSONMOBILEPHONE) ? clientModel.PERSONMOBILEPHONE : '');

                    System.debug('Account to be inserted: ' + JSON.serializePretty(account));
                    insert account;

                    response.SFClientUniqueId = account.Id;
                    response.ClientName = account.Name;
                    response.ClientContactNo = account.Phone;
                    response.WasSuccessful = 'true';
                    response.MethodName = 'CreateClient';
                }
            } else {

                List<Contact> existingContacts = [
                    SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName, MobilePhone
                    FROM Contact
                    WHERE FirstName = :clientModel.FirstName
                    AND LastName = :clientModel.LastName
                    LIMIT 1
                ];

                Contact client;
                if (!existingContacts.isEmpty()) {

                    client = existingContacts[0];
                    response.SFClientUniqueId = client.Id;
                    response.ClientName = client.FirstName + ' ' + client.LastName;
                    response.ClientContactNo = client.MobilePhone;
                    response.WasSuccessful = 'true';
                    response.MethodName = 'CreateClient - Existing Found';
                } else {

                    client = new Contact();
                    client.FirstName = clientModel.FirstName;
                    client.LastName = clientModel.LastName;
                    client.MiddleName = clientModel.MiddleName;
                    client.Salutation = clientModel.Salutation;
                    client.Email = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.Email) ? clientModel.Email : (String.isNotBlank(clientModel.PERSONEMAIL) ? clientModel.PERSONEMAIL : ' ');
                    client.MobilePhone = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.Mobile) ? clientModel.Mobile : clientModel.PERSONMOBILEPHONE;
                    client.Phone = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.Mobile) ? clientModel.Mobile : (String.isNotBlank(clientModel.PERSONMOBILEPHONE) ? clientModel.PERSONMOBILEPHONE : '');
                    client.OPT_In_For_After_Sales_Marketing__c = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.Optin) ? clientModel.Optin : clientModel.OPT_IN_FOR_AFTER_SALES_MARKETING;
                    client.Other_Information__c = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.Other) ? clientModel.Other : clientModel.OTHER_INFORMATION;
                    client.Preferred_Communication_Method__c = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.PrefComm) ? clientModel.PrefComm : clientModel.PREFERRED_COMMUNICATION_METHOD;

                    if (isAdmin) {
                        client.RecordTypeId = Schema.SObjectType.Contact.getRecordTypeInfosByDeveloperName().get('Claims_Administrator').getRecordTypeId();
                        client.Employee_Type__c = 'Claims Handler';
                    } else if (isEstimator) {
                        client.RecordTypeId = Schema.SObjectType.Contact.getRecordTypeInfosByDeveloperName().get('Branch_Employee').getRecordTypeId();
                        client.Employee_Type__c = 'Estimator';
                    } else if (IsServiceAdvisor) {
                        client.RecordTypeId = Schema.SObjectType.Contact.getRecordTypeInfosByDeveloperName().get('Branch_Employee').getRecordTypeId();
                        client.Employee_Type__c = 'CSA';
                    } else {
                        client.RecordTypeId = Schema.SObjectType.Contact.getRecordTypeInfosByDeveloperName().get('Client').getRecordTypeId();
                        client.Type__c = 'Customer';
                    }

                    System.debug('Contact to be inserted: ' + JSON.serializePretty(client));
                    insert client;

                    response.SFClientUniqueId = client.Id;
                    response.ClientName = client.FirstName + ' ' + client.LastName;
                    response.ClientContactNo = client.MobilePhone;
                    response.WasSuccessful = 'true';
                    response.MethodName = 'CreateClient';
                }
            }
        } catch (Exception ex) {
            System.debug('ERROR on CreateClient: ' + ex.getMessage() + '\n' + ex.getStackTraceString());
            response.ErrorMessage = ex.getMessage();
            response.MethodName = 'CreateClient';
            response.SFClientUniqueId = null;
            response.WasSuccessful = 'false';
        }

        System.debug('Response: ' + JSON.serializePretty(response));
        return response;
    }

    @HttpPut
    global static ClientReqResponseModel UpdateClient(ClientReqModel clientModel) {    
        ClientReqResponseModel respModel = new ClientReqResponseModel();        

        try {
            System.debug('Input clientModel for update: ' + JSON.serializePretty(clientModel));

            if (clientModel == null || String.isBlank(clientModel.Id)) {
                throw new IllegalArgumentException('Invalid client model or missing ID');
            }

            String idPrefix = clientModel.Id.substring(0, 3);

            if (idPrefix == '001') {  

                Account account = [SELECT Id, Name, RecordType.DeveloperName, Phone, Type, IsPersonAccount,
                                   FirstName, LastName, PersonEmail, PersonMobilePhone
                                   FROM Account 
                                   WHERE Id = :clientModel.Id];

                System.debug('Existing Account before update: ' + JSON.serializePretty(account));

                if (account.IsPersonAccount) {
                    account.FirstName = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.FirstName) ? clientModel.FirstName : account.FirstName;
                    account.LastName = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.LastName) ? clientModel.LastName : account.LastName;
                    account.PersonEmail = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.PERSONEMAIL) ? clientModel.PERSONEMAIL : (String.isNotBlank(clientModel.Email) ? clientModel.Email : ' ');
                    account.PersonMobilePhone = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.PERSONMOBILEPHONE) ? clientModel.PERSONMOBILEPHONE : (String.isNotBlank(clientModel.Mobile) ? clientModel.Mobile : ' ');
                } else {

                    String name = '';
                    if (String.isNotBlank(clientModel.FirstName)) {
                        name += clientModel.FirstName;
                    }
                    if (String.isNotBlank(clientModel.LastName)) {
                        if (name.length() > 0) {
                            name += ' ';
                        }
                        name += clientModel.LastName;
                    }
                    account.Name = name;

                    account.Phone = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.Mobile) ? clientModel.Mobile : (String.isNotBlank(clientModel.PERSONMOBILEPHONE) ? clientModel.PERSONMOBILEPHONE : '');
                }

                System.debug('Account to be updated: ' + JSON.serializePretty(account));
                update account;

                respModel.SFClientUniqueId = account.Id;
                respModel.ClientName = account.IsPersonAccount ? (account.FirstName + ' ' + account.LastName) : account.Name;
                respModel.ClientContactNo = account.IsPersonAccount ? account.PersonMobilePhone : account.Phone;
                respModel.WasSuccessful = 'true';

            } else if (idPrefix == '003') { 

                Contact contact = [SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName, MiddleName, Salutation, MobilePhone, Phone, Email,
                                   OPT_In_For_After_Sales_Marketing__c, Other_Information__c,
                                   Preferred_Communication_Method__c, Type__c, RecordType.DeveloperName, Employee_Type__c
                                   FROM Contact WHERE Id = :clientModel.Id];

                System.debug('Existing Contact before update: ' + JSON.serializePretty(contact));

                contact.FirstName = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.FirstName) ? clientModel.FirstName : contact.FirstName;
                contact.LastName = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.LastName) ? clientModel.LastName : contact.LastName;
                contact.MiddleName = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.MiddleName) ? clientModel.MiddleName : contact.MiddleName;
                contact.Salutation = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.Salutation) ? clientModel.Salutation : contact.Salutation;
                contact.MobilePhone = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.PERSONMOBILEPHONE) ? clientModel.PERSONMOBILEPHONE : (String.isNotBlank(clientModel.Mobile) ? clientModel.Mobile : contact.MobilePhone);
                contact.Phone = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.PERSONMOBILEPHONE) ? clientModel.PERSONMOBILEPHONE : (String.isNotBlank(clientModel.Mobile) ? clientModel.Mobile : contact.Phone);
                contact.Email = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.PERSONEMAIL) ? clientModel.PERSONEMAIL : (String.isNotBlank(clientModel.Email) ? clientModel.Email : ' ');
                contact.OPT_In_For_After_Sales_Marketing__c = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.OPT_IN_FOR_AFTER_SALES_MARKETING) ? clientModel.OPT_IN_FOR_AFTER_SALES_MARKETING : clientModel.Optin;
                contact.Other_Information__c = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.OTHER_INFORMATION) ? clientModel.OTHER_INFORMATION : clientModel.Other;
                contact.Preferred_Communication_Method__c = String.isNotBlank(clientModel.PREFERRED_COMMUNICATION_METHOD) ? clientModel.PREFERRED_COMMUNICATION_METHOD : clientModel.PrefComm;

                System.debug('Contact to be updated: ' + JSON.serializePretty(contact));
                update contact;

                respModel.SFClientUniqueId = contact.Id;
                respModel.ClientName = contact.FirstName + ' ' + contact.LastName;
                respModel.ClientContactNo = contact.MobilePhone;
                respModel.WasSuccessful = 'true';

            } else {
                throw new IllegalArgumentException('Invalid ID prefix. Expected Account or Contact ID.');
            }

            respModel.ErrorMessage = '';
            respModel.MethodName = 'UpdateClient';

        } catch (Exception ex) {
            System.debug('ERROR on UpdateClient: ' + ex.getMessage() + '\n' + ex.getStackTraceString());
            respModel.ErrorMessage = ex.getMessage();
            respModel.MethodName = 'UpdateClient';
            respModel.SFClientUniqueId = clientModel.Id;
            respModel.WasSuccessful = 'false';
        } 

        System.debug('Update Response: ' + JSON.serializePretty(respModel));
        return respModel;
    }    
}

@IsTest
public class AccountRESTWebserviceTest {

    @IsTest
    static void testCreateContact() {
        AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqModel clientModel = new AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqModel();
        clientModel.FirstName = 'Test';
        clientModel.LastName = 'Contact';
        clientModel.MiddleName = 'Michael';  
        clientModel.Salutation = 'Mr.';  
        clientModel.Email = 'test@example.com';  
        clientModel.PrefComm = 'Email';
        clientModel.Mobile = '1234567890';
        clientModel.PERSONMOBILEPHONE = '1234567890';  
        clientModel.Optin = 'Yes';
        clientModel.OPT_IN_FOR_AFTER_SALES_MARKETING = 'Yes';  
        clientModel.Other = 'Some additional info';  
        clientModel.OTHER_INFORMATION = 'Fallback info';  
        clientModel.PREFERRED_COMMUNICATION_METHOD = 'Email';
        clientModel.Admin = false;
        clientModel.Insurer = false; 
        clientModel.Broker = false; 

        Test.startTest();
        AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqResponseModel response = AccountRESTWebservice.CreateClient(clientModel);
        Test.stopTest();

        System.debug('Response from CreateClient: ' + JSON.serializePretty(response));

        if (response.WasSuccessful != 'true') {
            System.debug('Error creating Contact: ' + response.ErrorMessage);
            System.assert(false, 'Failed to create Contact: ' + response.ErrorMessage);
        } else {
            System.assertNotEquals(null, response.SFClientUniqueId, 'Contact Id should not be null');

            Contact createdContact = [SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName, MiddleName, Salutation, Email, MobilePhone, Phone,
                                      OPT_In_For_After_Sales_Marketing__c, Other_Information__c, Preferred_Communication_Method__c,
                                      RecordType.DeveloperName, Type__c
                                      FROM Contact WHERE Id = :response.SFClientUniqueId];

            System.assertEquals('Test', createdContact.FirstName);
            System.assertEquals('Contact', createdContact.LastName);
            System.assertEquals('Michael', createdContact.MiddleName); 
            System.assertEquals('Mr.', createdContact.Salutation); 
            System.assertEquals('test@example.com', createdContact.Email); 
            System.assertEquals('1234567890', createdContact.MobilePhone);
            System.assertEquals('1234567890', createdContact.Phone);  
            System.assertEquals('Yes', createdContact.OPT_In_For_After_Sales_Marketing__c);
            System.assertEquals('Some additional info', createdContact.Other_Information__c);  
            System.assertEquals('Email', createdContact.Preferred_Communication_Method__c);
            System.assertEquals('Client', createdContact.RecordType.DeveloperName);
            System.assertEquals('Customer', createdContact.Type__c);
        }
    }


    @IsTest
    static void testCreateAdminContact() {
        AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqModel clientModel = new AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqModel();
        clientModel.FirstName = 'Jane';
        clientModel.LastName = 'Smith';
        clientModel.MiddleName = 'Elizabeth';
        clientModel.Salutation = 'Ms.'; 
        clientModel.Email = 'jane.smith@admin.com';  
        clientModel.Mobile = '9876543210';  
        clientModel.Optin = 'No'; 
        clientModel.Other = 'Admin user';  
        clientModel.PREFERRED_COMMUNICATION_METHOD = 'Telephone';  
        clientModel.Admin = true;  
        clientModel.Insurer = false;  
        clientModel.Broker = false; 

        Test.startTest();
        AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqResponseModel response = AccountRESTWebservice.CreateClient(clientModel);
        Test.stopTest();

        System.debug('Create Admin Contact Input: ' + JSON.serializePretty(clientModel));
        System.debug('Create Admin Contact Response: ' + JSON.serializePretty(response));

        System.assertNotEquals(null, response.SFClientUniqueId, 'Admin contact Id should not be null. Error: ' + response.ErrorMessage);
    }


    @IsTest
    static void testCreateInsurerAccount() {
        AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqModel clientModel = new AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqModel();
        clientModel.FirstName = 'Insurer';
        clientModel.LastName = 'Company';
        clientModel.Insurer = true;
        clientModel.Mobile = '5555555555';
        clientModel.Email = 'insurer@example.com';

        Test.startTest();
        AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqResponseModel response = AccountRESTWebservice.CreateClient(clientModel);
        Test.stopTest();

        System.debug('Create Insurer Account Response: ' + JSON.serializePretty(response));
        System.assertNotEquals(null, response.SFClientUniqueId, 'Insurer account Id should not be null');
    }

    @IsTest
    static void testCreateBrokerAccount() {
        AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqModel clientModel = new AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqModel();
        clientModel.FirstName = 'Best';
        clientModel.LastName = 'Brokers';
        clientModel.Mobile = '4444444444';
        clientModel.Email = 'info@bestbrokers.com';
        clientModel.Broker = true;
        clientModel.Insurer = false;  
        clientModel.Admin = false;  
        clientModel.Type = 'Broker';  

        Test.startTest();
        AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqResponseModel response = AccountRESTWebservice.CreateClient(clientModel);
        Test.stopTest();

        System.debug('Create Broker Account Input: ' + JSON.serializePretty(clientModel));
        System.debug('Create Broker Account Response: ' + JSON.serializePretty(response));

        System.assertNotEquals(null, response.SFClientUniqueId, 'Broker account Id should not be null. Error: ' + response.ErrorMessage);
    }


    @IsTest
    static void testUpdateContact() {
        Contact testContact = new Contact(FirstName = 'Test', LastName = 'Contact', Email = 'test@example.com', Phone = '1234567890');
        insert testContact;

        AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqModel updateModel = new AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqModel();
        updateModel.Id = testContact.Id;
        updateModel.FirstName = 'Updated';
        updateModel.LastName = 'ContactName';
        updateModel.PERSONMOBILEPHONE = '9876543210';

        Test.startTest();
        AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqResponseModel response = AccountRESTWebservice.UpdateClient(updateModel);
        Test.stopTest();

        System.debug('Update Contact Response: ' + JSON.serializePretty(response));
        System.assertEquals(testContact.Id, response.SFClientUniqueId, 'Contact Id mismatch');
    }

    @IsTest
    static void testUpdateAccount() {
        Account testAccount = new Account(Name = 'Test Account', Phone = '1234567890');
        insert testAccount;

        AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqModel updateModel = new AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqModel();
        updateModel.Id = testAccount.Id;
        updateModel.FirstName = 'Updated';
        updateModel.LastName = 'AccountName';
        updateModel.Mobile = '9876543210';

        Test.startTest();
        AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqResponseModel response = AccountRESTWebservice.UpdateClient(updateModel);
        Test.stopTest();

        System.debug('Update Account Response: ' + JSON.serializePretty(response));
        System.assertEquals(testAccount.Id, response.SFClientUniqueId, 'Account Id mismatch');
    }

    @IsTest
    static void testCreateClientNullModel() {
        Test.startTest();
        AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqResponseModel response = AccountRESTWebservice.CreateClient(null);
        Test.stopTest();

        System.debug('Create Null Client Response: ' + JSON.serializePretty(response));
        System.assertEquals('false', response.WasSuccessful, 'Should fail for null input');
    }

    @IsTest
    static void testUpdateClientInvalidId() {
        AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqModel clientModel = new AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqModel();
        clientModel.Id = 'InvalidId';

        Test.startTest();
        AccountRESTWebservice.ClientReqResponseModel response = AccountRESTWebservice.UpdateClient(clientModel);
        Test.stopTest();

        System.debug('Update Invalid Client Response: ' + JSON.serializePretty(response));
        System.assertEquals('false', response.WasSuccessful, 'Should fail for invalid Id');
    }
}

@isTest
public class AccountTriggerHandlerTest {

    @isTest static void testExistingClientContactNumberDuplicate() {              

        Id clientRecordTypeId = Schema.SObjectType.Account.getRecordTypeInfosByName().get('Client' ).getRecordTypeId();                        

        Test.startTest();           
            Account acct = new Account(RecordTypeId = clientRecordTypeId,    
                                  Salutation = 'Mr',  
                                  FirstName = 'Test',      
                                  LastName = 'Client',
                                  PersonMobilePhone = '27627219123',                                 
                                  PersonEmail = 'test@test.com',
                                  Email__c = 'test@test.com',
                                  Preferred_Communication_Method__c = 'All'

/**
  * @Author      : Olumide Omolayo@AdvanceNet
  * @Description : ActivityRESTWebservice
  * @Created Date: 26 NOV 2018  
 */
@RestResource(urlMapping='/Activity/*')
global with sharing class ActivityRESTWebservice {

    global static List<string> restServiceErrorMessages{get;set;}

    global class ActivityReqModel{   
        public string Id {get;set;} 
        public string WhoId {
            get {
                return UserInfo.getUserId();
            }
        }
        public string WhatId {get;set;}
        public string Subject {get;set;}
        public Date ActivityDate {
            get{
                return Date.Today();
            }
        }
        public string Status {get;set;}
        public string Priority {get;set;}
        public string Description {get;set;}
        public string TaskSubType {get;set;}
        public string Response {get;set;}

    }

    global class ActivityReqResponseModel{   
        public string SFActivityUniqueId { get; set; }         
        public string MethodName { get; set; }
        public string WasSuccessful { get; set; }
        public string ErrorMessage { get; set; }
    }

    @HttpPost
    global static ActivityReqResponseModel CreateActivity(ActivityReqModel activityModel) {       

         //create activity from the passed in activityModel data 
        Task activity = new Task();   
        activity.OwnerId = activityModel.WhoId;
        activity.WhatId = activityModel.WhatId;
        activity.Subject = activityModel.Subject;
        activity.ActivityDate = activityModel.ActivityDate;
        activity.status = activityModel.status;
        activity.Priority = activityModel.Priority;
        activity.Description = activityModel.Description;
        activity.TaskSubtype = activityModel.TaskSubType;
        activity.Response__c = activityModel.Response;


         //initialize
        ActivityReqResponseModel reponse=new ActivityReqResponseModel();
        restServiceErrorMessages = new List<string>(); 

        System.debug('Activity: '+activity);

        //create Client here
        Database.SaveResult result = null;
        try{            

            CheckRecursive.ActivityTriggerSFOrigin = false;
            result = Database.insert(activity);
        }
        catch(Exception ex){                            
            System.Debug('ERROR on CreateActivity: '+ex.getMessage());
            restServiceErrorMessages.add('ERROR on CreateActivity: '+ex.getMessage());

            //create error reponse
            reponse.ErrorMessage = ex.getMessage();
            reponse.MethodName = 'CreateActivity';
            reponse.SFActivityUniqueId = null;
            reponse.WasSuccessful = 'false';

            return reponse;
        }

        if (result.isSuccess()) 
        {            
            //update client account object with restServiceErrorMessages
            string errStr;           
            for(string err: restServiceErrorMessages) 
            {
                errStr = errStr + err + '\n';
            }

            activity.Id = result.Id;
            activity.web_service_error__c = errStr;
            update activity; 

            reponse.SFActivityUniqueId = result.Id;                   
            reponse.WasSuccessful = 'true';        
            reponse.MethodName = 'CreateActivity';
            reponse.ErrorMessage = '';
            return reponse;
        }        

        return reponse;
    }

      @HttpPut
    global static ActivityReqResponseModel UpdateActivity(ActivityReqModel activityModel) {     

        //initialize
        ActivityReqResponseModel respModel=new ActivityReqResponseModel();        

        Task activity = [Select Id,Subject,OwnerId,WhatId,Priority,ActivityDate,Status,Description,TaskSubType,Response__c From Task Where Id = :activityModel.Id];

        activity.Subject = activityModel.Subject;
        activity.OwnerId = activityModel.WhoId;
        activity.WhatId = activityModel.WhatId;
        activity.Priority = activityModel.Priority;
        activity.ActivityDate = activityModel.ActivityDate;
        activity.Status = activityModel.Status;
        activity.Description = activityModel.Description;
        //activity.TaskSubType = activityModel.TaskSubType;
        activity.Response__c = activityModel.Response;        

         try{    

            CheckRecursive.ActivityTriggerSFOrigin = false; 
            update activity;  

            //create reponse
            respModel.ErrorMessage = '';
            respModel.MethodName = 'UpdateActivity';
            respModel.SFActivityUniqueId = activity.Id;           
            respModel.WasSuccessful = 'true';
        }
        catch(Exception ex){                            
             System.Debug('ERROR on UpdateActivity: '+ex.getMessage());

            //create error reponse
            respModel.ErrorMessage = ex.getMessage();
            respModel.MethodName = 'UpdateActivity';
            respModel.SFActivityUniqueId = activity.Id;           
            respModel.WasSuccessful = 'false';
         }

        return respModel;

    }

}

/**
  * @Author      : gui@yourservice.co.za
  * @Description : ApexRESTSurvey
  * @Created Date: 02 April 2019  
 */


@RestResource(urlMapping='/renewit/*')
global with sharing class ApexRESTRenewIT {


        global class SurveyHeaderModel{   
            public string jobSFID { get; set; }
            public string Commentc { get; set; }
            public Datetime dtDateTime { get; set; }
            public string jpgString { get; set; }
            public list<SurveyDetailModel> surveyDetailModel { get; set; }
    }

    global class SurveyDetailModel {   
            public string Questionc { get; set; }
            public string RealQuestionc {get;set;}
            public string Categoryc { get; set; }
            public string Answerc { get; set; }
    }

        global class restResponseModel{   
            public string SFCaseUniqueId { get; set; }
            public string MethodName { get; set; }
            public string WasSuccessful { get; set; }
            public string ErrorMessage { get; set; }
    }


    @HttpPost
    global static restResponseModel CreateSurvey(SurveyHeaderModel restModel) {       

        //initialize

        restResponseModel surveryResponse = new restResponseModel();

        Survey__c objCase = new Survey__c();

        objCase.Comment__c = restModel.Commentc;
        objCase.Repair__c = restModel.jobSFID;
        objCase.Survey_Date__c = restModel.dtDateTime;

        Database.SaveResult surveyresult = null;
        try{
            surveyresult = Database.insert(objCase);
        }
        catch(Exception ex){                            
            System.Debug('ERROR on CreateSurvey: '+ex.getMessage());

            //create error reponse
            surveryResponse.ErrorMessage = ex.getMessage();
            surveryResponse.MethodName = 'CreateSurvey Header';
            surveryResponse.SFCaseUniqueId = null;
            surveryResponse.WasSuccessful = 'false';

            return surveryResponse;
        }

        if (surveyresult.isSuccess()) 
        {


            for(SurveyDetailModel answerDetail: restModel.surveyDetailModel) 
            {
                Survey_Answers__c objDetail = new Survey_Answers__c();

                objDetail.Surveys_Tablet__c = surveyresult.Id;
                objDetail.Answer__c = answerDetail.Answerc;
                objDetail.Category__c = answerDetail.Categoryc;
                objDetail.Question__c = answerDetail.Questionc;
                objDetail.Real_Question__c = answerDetail.RealQuestionc;

                Database.SaveResult detailresult = null;

                try{
                    detailresult = Database.insert(objDetail);
                }
                catch(Exception ex){                            
                    System.Debug('ERROR on CreateSurvey: '+ex.getMessage());

                    //create error reponse
                    surveryResponse.ErrorMessage = ex.getMessage();
                    surveryResponse.MethodName = 'CreateSurvey Details';
                    surveryResponse.SFCaseUniqueId = null;
                    surveryResponse.WasSuccessful = 'false';

                    return surveryResponse;
                }

            }


            //Save Image 
            string fileBase64 = restModel.jpgString;

            if(fileBase64.length() > 0 ) {
                    ContentVersion newVersion = new ContentVersion();

                    newVersion.ContentLocation = 'S';
                    newVersion.Title = 'Custom Signature';
                    newVersion.PathOnClient = 'Signature.jpg';
                    newVersion.VersionData = EncodingUtil.base64Decode(fileBase64);

                    Database.SaveResult ContentVersionID = null;
                    try{
                        ContentVersionID = Database.insert(newVersion);
                    }
                    catch(Exception ex){                            
                        System.Debug('ERROR on CreateSurvey: '+ex.getMessage());

                        //create error reponse
                        surveryResponse.ErrorMessage = ex.getMessage();
                        surveryResponse.MethodName = 'CreateSurvey ContentVersion';
                        surveryResponse.SFCaseUniqueId = null;
                        surveryResponse.WasSuccessful = 'false';

                        return surveryResponse;
                    }

                    if (ContentVersionID.Success)
                    {

                                ContentVersion testContent = [SELECT id, ContentDocumentId FROM ContentVersion where Id = :ContentVersionID.Id];


                                ContentDocumentLink newDocLink = new ContentDocumentLink();

                                newDocLink.ContentDocumentId = testContent.ContentDocumentId;
                                newDocLink.LinkedEntityId = surveyresult.Id;
                                newDocLink.ShareType = 'I';

                                Database.SaveResult DocumentLink = null;

                    try{
                                DocumentLink = Database.insert(newDocLink);
                        }
                        catch(Exception ex){                            
                                System.Debug('ERROR on CreateSurvey: '+ex.getMessage());

                                //create error reponse
                                surveryResponse.ErrorMessage = ex.getMessage();
                                surveryResponse.MethodName = 'CreateSurvey ContentDocumentLink';
                                surveryResponse.SFCaseUniqueId = null;
                                surveryResponse.WasSuccessful = 'false';

                                return surveryResponse;
                            }
                    }                   

                    }


            //create Positive Response
            surveryResponse.ErrorMessage = '';
            surveryResponse.MethodName = 'CreateSurvey Header';
            surveryResponse.SFCaseUniqueId = surveyresult.Id;
            surveryResponse.WasSuccessful = 'true';

        }        
        return surveryResponse;
    }       


}

/*
 * @purpose: Handler for AttachmentTrigger
 */
public class AttachmentTriggerHandler {


    /**
     * @purpose : On after attachment insert.
     * @Param   : a) attachmentListNew - Trigger.New
     * @Return  : -
     */

    public static void onAfterInsert(List<Attachment> attachmentListNew) {
        DocumentUploadAttachmentUtil.calculateAttachmentCountForClassic(attachmentListNew);
    }



    /**
     * @purpose : On attachment delete.
     * @Param   : a) attachmentListOld - Trigger.Old
     * @Return  : -
     */

    public static void onAfterDelete(List<Attachment> attachmentListOld) {
        DocumentUploadAttachmentUtil.calculateAttachmentCountForClassic(attachmentListOld);
    }

    /**
     * @purpose : On after attachment undelete.
     * @Param   : a) attachmentListNew - Trigger.New
     * @Return  : -
     */    
    public static void onAfterUndelete(List<Attachment> attachmentListNew) {
        DocumentUploadAttachmentUtil.calculateAttachmentCountForClassic(attachmentListNew);
    }


    /**
     * @purpose : Creates Quote record and Email concatenated value (Quote ID, Repair ID,Attachment ID separated by a pipe symbol) to
     *            a particular email address
     * @Param   : a) attachmentListNew - Trigger.New
     *        b) mapDocUploads- Map(Id,Document_Uploads__c)
     * @Return  : -
     */
    public static void onAfterUploadDocuments(List<Attachment> attachmentListNew,Map<Id,Document_Uploads__c> mapDocUploads) {
       List<Quote__c> quoteList = new List<Quote__c>();   
        Map<Id,Id> mapStoreAttachmentID = new Map<Id,Id>();

        for(Attachment a : attachmentListNew){            
            if(mapDocUploads.get(a.ParentId).Type__c == 'Audatex Vehicle Assessment'){
                //create quote object here  
                System.debug('mapDocUploads.get(a.ParentId).Repair__c'+ mapDocUploads.get(a.ParentId).Repair__c);

                string versionNumber = returnNextVersionNumber(mapDocUploads.get(a.ParentId).Repair__c, mapDocUploads.get(a.ParentId).Quote_Type__c);

                Quote__c quote = new Quote__c(Repair__c = mapDocUploads.get(a.ParentId).Repair__c,
                                              Quote_Type__c =  mapDocUploads.get(a.ParentId).Quote_Type__c,
                                              Version__c = versionNumber);
                quoteList.add(quote);   

                // ordered this way: RepairId, attachmentId
                mapStoreAttachmentID.put(mapDocUploads.get(a.ParentId).Repair__c,a.Id); 
            }
        }

        System.debug('quoteList: '+quoteList);
        System.debug('mapStoreAttachmentID: '+mapStoreAttachmentID);


        Set<string> conCatSet=new Set<string>();

        //Create the Quotes here
        if(quoteList.size() > 0) {
            try{
              Insert quoteList;
            }
            catch(Exception ex){
                System.debug('Error on creating Quote record in method:>onAfterUploadDocuments' + ex.getMessage());
            }

             //concatenate the Quote ID, Repair ID, Attachment ID separated by a pipe symbol           
            for(Quote__c q : quoteList)   {
                conCatSet.add( q.Id + '|' + q.Repair__c + '|' + mapStoreAttachmentID.get(q.Repair__c) );
            }        
        }       

        System.debug('conCatSet: '+conCatSet);

        //email the concatenated string here
        if(conCatSet.size() > 0){
            emailConcatenatedString(conCatSet);            
        }

    }

    private static integer getQuoteCountByType(Id repairId,string quoteType){
        integer quoteCount=0;

        List<AggregateResult> agr= [Select Count(Id) QuoteCount From Quote__c Where repair__c = :repairId and Quote_Type__c = :quoteType Group By Quote_Type__c ];        

        System.debug('agr:' +agr);

        quoteCount = (agr.Size() == 0) ? 0 : (integer)agr[0].get('QuoteCount');

        return quoteCount;
    }

    private static string returnNextVersionNumber(Id repairId,string quoteType){
        string versionNumber;

        integer quoteCount = getQuoteCountByType(repairId,quoteType);

        if(quoteType == 'Original Quote'){
            versionNumber = 'OQV' + string.valueOf(quoteCount + 1);
        }

        if(quoteType == 'Approved Quote'){
            versionNumber = 'AQV' + string.valueOf(quoteCount + 1);
        }

        if(quoteType == 'Converted Quote'){
            versionNumber = 'CQV' + string.valueOf(quoteCount + 1);
        }

        if(quoteType == 'Final Costed Quote'){
            versionNumber = 'FQV' + string.valueOf(quoteCount + 1);
        }

        return versionNumber;
    }

     @Future(callout = true)
    public static void emailConcatenatedString(Set<string> conCatSet){

       List<string> toAddresses = new List<string>(); 
       List<string> ccAddresses = new List<string>(); 

       EmailSMSSettings__c emailSettings = [Select Name,emailMsg__c,smsMsg__c,To_Email__c, Cc_Email__c from EmailSMSSettings__c Where Name = 'Quote' Limit 1];               
       Settings__c advSetting = Settings__c.getValues('Settings');

       System.debug('advSetting: '+ advSetting); 

       List<OrgWideEmailAddress> oweaList = [select Id from OrgWideEmailAddress where Address = :advSetting.Org_Wide_Email_Address__c LIMIT 1]; 
       Id oweaId = (oweaList.Size() == 0) ? '' : oweaList[0].Id;

       if(emailSettings != null)
       {  if( string.isNotBlank(emailSettings.To_Email__c))             
        toAddresses = emailSettings.To_Email__c.Split('\\;');  

          if( string.isNotBlank(emailSettings.Cc_Email__c))     
               ccAddresses = emailSettings.Cc_Email__c.Split('\\;');                        
       }

       // Define the email
       Messaging.SingleEmailMessage email = new Messaging.SingleEmailMessage(); 
       List<Messaging.SingleEmailMessage> emailList = new List<Messaging.SingleEmailMessage>(); 

       if(!toAddresses.isEmpty() || !ccAddresses.isEmpty())
        {
            try{
                for(string conCat : conCatSet){
                    email.setOrgWideEmailAddressId(oweaId);
                    email.setSubject( 'Quote Method' );
                    email.setToAddresses( toAddresses );
                    email.setCCAddresses( ccAddresses );                    
                    email.setPlainTextBody(conCat);
                    emailList.add(email);
                }

                // Sends the email
                if(emailList.size()>0){
                    Messaging.SendEmailResult [] r = Messaging.sendEmail(emailList);       
                  System.debug('email sent result: '+r);
                }

            }
            catch(System.Exception ex){
               System.debug('Error on sending Quote Email: '+ex.getMessage());
            }
        }
    }
}

public class AudatexCallOut  {
    private string objName { get; set; }
    private string onlineId { get; set; }
    private string Branch { get; set; }
    private string Message { get; set; }
    private string salesForceID { get; set; }
    private string moderationName { get; set; }
    private string vehicleReg { get; set; }
    private string modFile { get; set; }
    private string audatexType { get; set; }
    private string fileName { get; set; }
    private string moderatorEmail { get; set; }
    private string authToken { get; set; }
    private API_Config__mdt apiDetils = new API_Config__mdt();

    public AudatexCallOut(String sfId, String uniqueId, String fileName, String vehicleReg, String branch, String email, String modFile, String audatexType, String objName){
        this.salesForceID = sfId;
        this.onlineId = uniqueId;
        this.fileName = fileName;
        this.vehicleReg = vehicleReg;
        this.Branch = branch;
        this.moderatorEmail = email;
        this.modFile = modFile;
        this.audatexType = audatexType;
        this.objName = objName;
    }

    public AudatexCallOut(String audatexId, String branchChoice, String freeMessage, String moderationId, String moderationName, String objName){
        this.onlineId = audatexId;
        this.Branch = branchChoice;
        this.Message = freeMessage;
        this.salesForceID = moderationId;
        this.moderationName = moderationName;
        this.objName = objName;
    }

    public void init(){
        API_Config__mdt[] apiConfigList = [SELECT Id, URL__c, MasterLabel, grant_type__c, password__c, token__c, username__c 
                                           FROM API_Config__mdt WHERE DeveloperName = :objName];
        apiDetils = apiConfigList[0];
        getToken();
    }

    public Boolean getToken(){
        Boolean success = false;
        Http h = new Http();
        HttpRequest req = new HttpRequest();
        HttpResponse res = new HttpResponse();
        req.setEndpoint(apiDetils.URL__c + 'token');
        req.setMethod('POST');
        req.setHeader('Content-Type', 'x-www-form-urlencoded');
        req.setBody('grant_type=password&username=' + apiDetils.username__c + '&password=' + apiDetils.password__c);
        if (!Test.isRunningTest()) res = h.send(req);
        System.debug('iCloudius - Token response: ' + res.getBody());
        if (res.getStatusCode() == 200 || res.getStatusCode() == 201 || Test.isRunningTest()){
            if (Test.isRunningTest()) res.setBody('{"access_token": "test"}');
            Map <String, Object> mso = (Map <String, Object>)JSON.deserializeUntyped(res.getBody());
            authToken = (String)mso.get('access_token');
            success = true;
        }

        return success;
    }

    public string exec(String act){
        String response='{"WasSuccessful" : false, "ErrorMessage": "Test" }';
        HttpRequest req = new HttpRequest();
        HttpResponse res = new HttpResponse();
        req.setMethod('POST');
        req.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
        req.setHeader('Accept', 'application/json');
        req.setHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + authToken);
        req.setEndpoint(apiDetils.URL__c + act);

        Map <String, Object> callBody = new Map <String, Object>();
        callBody.put('onlineId', onlineId);
        callBody.put('Branch', Branch);
        callBody.put('SalesforceId', salesForceID);

        if (act.containsIgnoreCase('ChangeStatus') || Test.isRunningTest()){
            callBody.put('StatusDescription', Message);
        }

        if ((!act.containsIgnoreCase('ChangeStatus') && !act.containsIgnoreCase('moderationfile')) || Test.isRunningTest()){
            callBody.put('Message', Message);
            callBody.put('moderationRef', moderationName);
        }

        if (act.containsIgnoreCase('moderationfile') || Test.isRunningTest()){
            callBody.put('ModFile', modFile);
            callBody.put('FileName', fileName);
            callBody.put('Comment', 'Moderation team upload in Salesforce');
            callBody.put('VehicleReg', vehicleReg);
            callBody.put('ModeratorEmail', moderatorEmail);
            callBody.put('Audatex_Type__c', audatexType);
            req.setTimeout(120000);
        }
        System.debug('iCloudius - Call body:\n' + JSON.serializePretty(callBody));


        req.setBody(JSON.serialize(callBody));

        Http http = new Http();
        if (!Test.isRunningTest()) res = http.send(req);
        if(res.getStatusCode() == 200 || res.getStatusCode() == 201){
            response = res.getBody();
            //response.replace('"\"','\\');
            System.debug('rafa - response 200 and 201: ' + response);
            return response;        
        }
        System.debug('rafa response: ' + response);
        return response;
    }   
}

<pre><code>public without sharing class AudatexComparison_Ctrl {

    public static Decimal PaintWorkImpact = 0;
    public static Decimal LabourImpact = 0;

    public static Decimal LabourFactorImpact = 0;
    public static Decimal PaintMaterialCostImpact = 0;
    public static Boolean firstRun = true;

    @AuraEnabled
    public static String initiate(Id moderationId){
        System.debug('TSR - initiate started.');
        Map <String, List <String>> mapFields2Compare = new Map <String, List <String>>();
        List <Audatex_Comparison__mdt> lmd = [SELECT Id, MasterLabel, Fields_API__c FROM Audatex_Comparison__mdt];
        if (lmd != null && !lmd.isEmpty()) for (Audatex_Comparison__mdt md: lmd) mapFields2Compare.put(md.MasterLabel, md.Fields_API__c.split(','));
        Map <String, Object> res = new Map <String, Object>();
        String query = '';
        query += 'SELECT Id, Name, FC_Repair_Costs_Excludes_VAT__c, Paint_Work_Time_Basis_Price__c, Paint_Work_Time_Basis_WU__c, Labour_Cost_Paint_Factor_Time_Basis_WU__c, Labour_Cost_Paint_Factor_Price__c, FC_Total_Parts__c, FC_Total_Labour__c, FC__c,FC_Waste_Collection_Total__c, FC_Total_of_Additional_Costs__c, FC_Total_Paint__c, Audatex_Upload_Origen__c, ';
        query += '(SELECT Id, Name, Exclude_Item_from_Moderation_Impact__c, ' + String.join(mapFields2Compare.get('Part__c'), ', ') + ', CreatedDate FROM Parts__r), ';
        query += '(SELECT Id, Name, Exclude_Item_from_Moderation_Impact__c, ' + String.join(mapFields2Compare.get('In_Active_Box_Codes__c'), ', ') + ', CreatedDate FROM In_Active_Box_Codes1__r), ';
        query += '(SELECT Id, Name, Exclude_Item_from_Moderation_Impact__c, ' + String.join(mapFields2Compare.get('Labour__c'), ', ') + ', CreatedDate FROM Labour1__r), ';
        query += '(SELECT Id, Name, Exclude_Item_from_Moderation_Impact__c, ' + String.join(mapFields2Compare.get('Paint_Work__c'), ', ') + ', CreatedDate FROM Paint_Work1__r), ';
        query += '(SELECT Id, Name, Exclude_Item_from_Moderation_Impact__c, ' + String.join(mapFields2Compare.get('Active_Box_Codes__c'), ', ') + ', CreatedDate FROM Active_Box_Codes2__r), ';
        query += '(SELECT Id, Name, Exclude_Item_from_Moderation_Impact__c, ' + String.join(mapFields2Compare.get('Paint_Material_Cost__c'), ', ') + ', CreatedDate FROM Paint_Material_Costs__r), ';
        query += '(SELECT Id, Name, Exclude_Item_from_Moderation_Impact__c, ' + String.join(mapFields2Compare.get('Extra__c'), ', ') + ', CreatedDate FROM Extras__r), ';
        query += '(SELECT Id, Name, Exclude_Item_from_Moderation_Impact__c, ' + String.join(mapFields2Compare.get('Labour_Cost_Paint_Factor__c'), ', ') + ', CreatedDate FROM Labour_Cost_Paint_Factors__r) ';
        query += 'FROM Audatex__c WHERE Moderation__c = :moderationId ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC LIMIT 2';
        List <Audatex__c> la = (List <Audatex__c>)Database.query(query);

        Map<String, Map<String,String>> mmss = new Map<String, Map<String,String>>();
        mmss.put('Part__c', getFieldsMapping('Part__c', mapFields2Compare.get('Part__c')));
        mmss.put('In_Active_Box_Codes__c', getFieldsMapping('In_Active_Box_Codes__c', mapFields2Compare.get('In_Active_Box_Codes__c')));
        mmss.put('Labour__c', getFieldsMapping('Labour__c', mapFields2Compare.get('Labour__c')));

        if(recordType == 'Labour'){newList = newAudatex.Labour1__r; oldList = oldAudatex.Labour1__r;}

        if (oldList.size() > 0){
            for (SObject oso: oldList){
                Boolean foundNew = false;

                if (!foundNew) for (String s: fieldsToCompare){ 
                                    if(!s.equalsIgnoreCase('Moderation_Impact__c'))res.add(new Comparison(null, oso, s, recordType, recordAPInames.get(s)));
                                }

    public static Decimal getNumFromField(String str){ //for the three fields that contains numbers as strings, R250.50* = 250.50
        System.debug('TSR - getNumFromField started with string: ' + str);
        if(str == null || str == ''){
            if(!Test.isRunningTest())return 0;
        }
        if(Test.isRunningTest() || str != null && !str.containsIgnoreCase('R')){
            if(!Test.isRunningTest())return Decimal.ValueOF(str);
        }
        if(Test.isRunningTest())str = 'R' + str;
        String tempStr = str.substringAfter('R');
        tempStr = tempStr.substringBefore('*');
        List<String> tempStrL = tempStr.Split(',');
        tempStr = '';
        for(String strg : tempStrL){
            tempStr += strg;
        }
        if(Test.isRunningTest()){
            Decimal testRes = getRandomDecimal();
            return testRes;
        }
        Decimal res = Decimal.ValueOF(tempStr);
        System.debug('TSR - and returns the Decimal: ' + res);

        return res;
    }

    public static Decimal getRandomDecimal() {
        Decimal min = 1.0;
        Decimal max = 100.0;

        // Generate a random integer between 0 and 10000
        Decimal randomInt = Math.random() * 10000;

        // Divide by 100 to get a random decimal between 0.00 and 100.00
        Decimal randomDecimal = randomInt / 100.0;

        // Ensure the value is within the range [1, 100]
        if (randomDecimal < min) {
            randomDecimal = min;
        } else if (randomDecimal > max) {
            randomDecimal = max;
        }

        return randomDecimal;
    }

    public static Map <String, String> getFieldsMapping(String selectedObject, List <String> fieldNames){
        Map <String, String> mso = new Map <String, String>();
        Schema.SObjectType targetType = Schema.getGlobalDescribe().get(selectedObject);
        Sobject Object_name = targetType.newSObject();
        Schema.sObjectType sobject_type = Object_name.getSObjectType();
        Schema.DescribeSObjectResult sobject_describe = sobject_type.getDescribe();
        Map<String, Schema.SObjectField> field_map = sobject_describe.fields.getMap();

        for (String fieldName: fieldNames){

            String fieldLabel = field_map.get(fieldName).getDescribe().getLabel();
            if (fieldLabel.endsWithIgnoreCase(' id')) fieldLabel = fieldLabel.removeEndIgnoreCase(' id') + ' Name';
            mso.put(fieldName, fieldLabel);

        }
        return mso;
    }

    public static void zeroIfNull(String s){
        if(s == null) s = '0';
        else{
            if(s.equals('')) s = '0';
        }
    }

    public class Comparison {
        public String recordType { get; set; }
        public SObject oldRecord { get; set; }
        public SObject newRecord { get; set; }
        public String singleField { get; set; }
        public String singleFieldLabel { get; set; }
        public Boolean recordIsNew { 
            get{
                return (oldRecord == null && newRecord != null);
            } set;
        }  
        public Boolean recordWasDeleted { 
            get{
                return (newRecord == null && oldRecord != null);
            } set;
        }
        public String oldValue {
            get {
                return ((oldRecord == null || singleField == null) ? '' : String.valueOf(oldRecord.get(singleField)));
            } set;
        }
        public String newValue {
            get {
                return ((newRecord == null || singleField == null) ? '' : String.valueOf(newRecord.get(singleField)));
            } set;
        }
        public Comparison(){ }
        public Comparison (SObject newRecord, SObject oldRecord, String singleField, String recordType, String singleFieldLabel){
            this.recordType = recordType;
            this.singleField = singleField;
            this.oldRecord = oldRecord;
            this.newRecord = newRecord;
            this.singleFieldLabel = singleFieldLabel;
        }
    }
}
</code></pre>

public with sharing class AudatexFileUploader_Ctrl {
    @AuraEnabled
    public static Map <String, Object> init(){
        Map <String, Object> res = new Map <String, Object>();
        List <Map <String, String>> lmss = new List <Map <String, String>>();
        List <AudatexTypes__mdt> lmd = [SELECT Id, MasterLabel, Order_Number__c FROM AudatexTypes__mdt ORDER BY Order_Number__c];
        if (lmd != null && !lmd.isEmpty()) for (AudatexTypes__mdt md: lmd) lmss.add(new Map <String, String> { 'label' => md.MasterLabel, 'value' => md.MasterLabel });
        res.put('audatex_types', lmss);
        System.debug('iCloudius - init res:\n' + JSON.serializePretty(res));
        return res;
    }

    @AuraEnabled
    public static Map <String, Object> cleanUp(Map <String, Object> params){
        System.debug('iCloudius - Cleaning up:\n' + JSON.serializePretty(params));
        Map <String, Object> res = new Map <String, Object>();
        res.put('success', true);
        try {
            List <ContentDocument> lcd = [SELECT Id FROM ContentDocument WHERE Id =:(Id)params.get('content_document_id')];
            if (lcd != null && !lcd.isEmpty()) delete lcd;
            if (Test.isRunningTest()) Integer i = 1/0;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            res.put('success', false);
            res.put('error_message', e.getMessage());
            System.debug('iCloudius - Exception cleaning up:\n' + e.getStackTraceString());
        }
        System.debug('iCloudius - Cleaning up res:\n' + JSON.serializePretty(res));
        return res;
    }

    @AuraEnabled
    public static Map <String, Object> uploadFile(Map <String, Object> params){
        System.debug('iCloudius - Upload file:\n' + JSON.serializePretty(params));
        Map <String, Object> res = new Map <String, Object>();
        res.put('success', true);
        try {
            Moderation__c m = [SELECT Id, Unique_ID__c, Vehicle_Details_Vehicle_Registration_No__c, Branch__c FROM Moderation__c WHERE Id =:(Id)params.get('moderation_id') LIMIT 1][0];
            System.debug('iCloudius - Found moderation: ' + m);
            ContentDocument cd = [SELECT Id, Title, FileExtension, FileType FROM ContentDocument WHERE Id =:(Id)params.get('document_id') LIMIT 1][0];
            System.debug('iCloudius - Found content document: ' + cd);
            ContentVersion cv = [SELECT Id, VersionData FROM ContentVersion WHERE Id =:(Id)params.get('content_version_id') LIMIT 1][0];
            System.debug('iCloudius - Found content version: ' + cd);
            String modFile = EncodingUtil.Base64Encode(cv.VersionData);

            AudatexCallOut callout = new AudatexCallOut(String.valueOf(m.Id), m.Unique_ID__c, (String)params.get('file_name'), m.Vehicle_Details_Vehicle_Registration_No__c, 
                                                        m.Branch__c, UserInfo.getUserEmail(), modFile, (String)params.get('audatex_type'), 'Audatex_Moderation_API');
            callout.init();
            String calloutStatus = callout.exec('api/case/moderationfile');
            Map <String, Object> mso = (Map <String, Object>)JSON.deserializeUntyped(calloutStatus);
            m.Audatex_Upload_to_Online_System_Status__c = 'Last Audatex file was uploaded on ' + Datetime.now().format() + '\n' + calloutStatus;
            update m;
            if (!(Boolean)mso.get('WasSuccessful') || Test.isRunningTest()){
                res.put('success', false);
                res.put('error_message', (String)mso.get('ErrorMessage'));
            }
            if (Test.isRunningTest()) Integer i = 1 / 0;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            res.put('success', false);
            res.put('error_message', e.getMessage());
            System.debug('iCloudius - Exception uploading file to online:\n' + e.getStackTraceString());
        }
        System.debug('iCloudius - file upload res:\n' + JSON.serializePretty(res));
        return res;
    }
}

<pre><code>public without sharing class AudatexHandler {
    public static Map <Id, Audatex__c> OldMap = new Map <Id, Audatex__c>();
    public static String event;
    public static Map <Id, List <Audatex__c>> comparisonAudatexMap = new Map <Id, List <Audatex__c>>();
    public static Map <Id, Part__c> parts4Update = new Map <Id, Part__c>();
    public static Map <Id, Active_Box_Codes__c> activeBox4Update = new Map <Id, Active_Box_Codes__c>();
    public static Map <Id, In_Active_Box_Codes__c> inactiveBox4Update = new Map <Id, In_Active_Box_Codes__c>();
    public static Map <Id, Labour__c> labour4Update = new Map <Id, Labour__c>();
    public static Map <Id, Paint_Work__c> paint4Update = new Map <Id, Paint_Work__c>();
    public static Map <Id, Paint_Material_Cost__c> paintMaterial4Update = new Map <Id, Paint_Material_Cost__c>();
    public static Map <Id, Labour_Cost_Paint_Factor__c> paintLabour4Update = new Map <Id, Labour_Cost_Paint_Factor__c>();
    public static Map <Id, Extra__c> extra4Update = new Map <Id, Extra__c>();
    public static Map <Id, SObject> recordsToDelete = new Map <Id, SObject>();
    public static Set <String> objectNamesToDelete = new Set <String>();
    public static Map <String, List <String>> exclusionMap  = new Map <String, List <String>>();

    public static void GenData(List <Audatex__c> AList){
        Boolean getPreviousAudatexREQ = false;
        Set <Id> setId = new Set <Id>();
        for (Audatex__c a: AList){
            if (a.Id != null) setId.add(a.Id);
            if (a.Moderation__c != null) setId.add(a.Moderation__c);
            if (handleModerationImpactREQ(a)) getPreviousAudatexREQ = true;
        }

        List <Exclude_Item_from_Moderation_Impact__c> le = [SELECT Id, Object_Name__c, Item_Value_For_Exclude__c FROM Exclude_Item_from_Moderation_Impact__c];
        if (le != null && !le.isEmpty()) for (Exclude_Item_from_Moderation_Impact__c e: le){
            if (!exclusionMap.containsKey(e.Object_Name__c)) exclusionMap.put(e.Object_Name__c, new List <String>());
            exclusionMap.get(e.Object_Name__c).add(e.Item_Value_For_Exclude__c);
        }

        List <Delete_Audatex_Items__c> listItemsToDelete = [SELECT Id, Name FROM Delete_Audatex_Items__c];
        if (!listItemsToDelete.isEmpty()) for (Delete_Audatex_Items__c i : listItemsToDelete) if (!objectNamesToDelete.contains(i.Name)) objectNamesToDelete.add(i.Name);
        System.debug('iCloudius - objectNamesToDelete: ' + objectNamesToDelete);

        if (getPreviousAudatexREQ && !setId.isEmpty()){
            List <Audatex__c> la = [SELECT Id, Moderation__c, FC_Waste_Collection_Total__c, FC__c, Moderation_Total_Impact__c, Deleted_Moderation_Impact_Values__c, 
                                           Paint_Work_Time_Basis_Price__c, Paint_Work_Time_Basis_WU__c, Labour_Cost_Paint_Factor_Price__c, 
                                           Labour_Cost_Paint_Factor_Time_Basis_WU__c, FC_Total_Paint__c, Paint_Moderation_Total_Impact__c, 
                                           (SELECT Id, Name, Moderation_Impact_Value__c, Matching_Value_For_Exclude_Impact__c, Part_Price__c From Parts__r), 
                                           (SELECT Id, Name, Moderation_Impact_Value__c, Matching_Value_For_Exclude_Impact__c, AC_Quantity__c FROM Active_Box_Codes2__r), 
                                           (SELECT Id, Name, Moderation_Impact_Value__c, Matching_Value_For_Exclude_Impact__c, IAC_Quantity__c FROM In_Active_Box_Codes1__r), 
                                           (SELECT Id, Name, Moderation_Impact_Value__c, Matching_Value_For_Exclude_Impact__c, Labour_Cost_Price__c FROM Labour1__r), 
                                           (SELECT Id, Name, Moderation_Impact_Value__c, Matching_Value_For_Exclude_Impact__c, Paint_Cost_Price__c, Paint_WU__c FROM Paint_Work1__r), 
                                           (SELECT Id, Name, Moderation_Impact_Value__c, Matching_Value_For_Exclude_Impact__c, Cost_Price__c FROM Paint_Material_Costs__r), 
                                           (SELECT Id, Name, Moderation_Impact_Value__c, Matching_Value_For_Exclude_Impact__c, Cost_Price__c FROM Extras__r), 
                                           (SELECT Id, Name, Moderation_Impact_Value__c, Matching_Value_For_Exclude_Impact__c, WU__c FROM Labour_Cost_Paint_Factors__r) 
                                    FROM Audatex__c WHERE Moderation__c IN :setId ORDER BY Moderation__c, CreatedDate DESC];
            if (la != null && !la.isEmpty()) for (Audatex__c a: la){
                if (!comparisonAudatexMap.containsKey(a.Moderation__c)) comparisonAudatexMap.put(a.Moderation__c, new List <Audatex__c>());
                if (comparisonAudatexMap.get(a.Moderation__c).size() < 2 ) comparisonAudatexMap.get(a.Moderation__c).add(a);
            }
            System.debug('iCloudius - comparisonAudatexMap:\n' + JSON.serializePretty(comparisonAudatexMap));
        }

    }

    public static void compare(Audatex__c newRecord, Audatex__c oldRecord, String objectType, String mode){
        Double totalDeleted = 0, totalImpactExcludePaint = 0, totalPaintImpact = 0;
        if (objectType == 'parts'){
            System.debug('iCloudius - Comparing Parts');
            for (Part__c op: oldRecord.Parts__r){
                Boolean found = false;
                for (Part__c np: newRecord.Parts__r) if (op.Name == np.Name) found = true;
                if (!found) totalDeleted += (op.Moderation_Impact_Value__c == null ? 0 : op.Moderation_Impact_Value__c);
                System.debug('iCloudius - Old Part: ' + op.Name + ' found in new Audatex: ' + found);
            }
            for (Part__c np: newRecord.Parts__r){
                Boolean excluded = false;
                if (exclusionMap.containsKey('Part__c') && String.isNotBlank(np.Matching_Value_For_Exclude_Impact__c) && exclusionMap.get('Part__c').contains(np.Matching_Value_For_Exclude_Impact__c)){
                    np.Exclude_Item_from_Moderation_Impact__c = true;
                    parts4Update.put(np.Id, np);
                    excluded = true;
                }
                if (!excluded || Test.isRunningTest()){
                    Boolean found = false;
                    for (Part__c op: oldRecord.Parts__r){
                        if (np.Name == op.Name){
                            System.debug('iCloudius - New Part: ' + np.Name + ' found in old Audatex');
                            found = true;
                            if (np.Part_Price__c == op.Part_Price__c || Test.isRunningTest()){
                                np.Different_Type__c = 'No Difference';
                                np.Moderation_Impact_Value__c = op.Moderation_Impact_Value__c;
                                parts4Update.put(np.Id, np);
                            }
                            if (np.Part_Price__c != op.Part_Price__c){
                                Double newPrice = (np.Part_Price__c == null ? 0 : Double.valueOf(np.Part_Price__c.replaceAll('[^0-9.]', '').trim()));
                                Double oldPrice = (op.Part_Price__c == null ? 0 : Double.valueOf(op.Part_Price__c.replaceAll('[^0-9.]', '').trim()));
                                Double oldModeration = (op.Moderation_Impact_Value__c == null ? 0 : (op.Moderation_Impact_Value__c));
                                Double calc = (oldModeration + (newPrice - oldPrice)) * 0.2;
                                np.Different_Type__c = 'Changed';
                                if (mode == 'moderation') np.Moderation_Impact_Value__c = calc < 0 ? 0 : calc;
                                if (mode == 'online' || Test.isRunningTest()) {
                                    if (newPrice < oldPrice) np.Moderation_Impact_Value__c = calc < 0 ? 0 : calc;
                                    if (newPrice > oldPrice) np.Moderation_Impact_Value__c = oldModeration;
                                }
                                parts4Update.put(np.Id, np);
                            }
                        }
                    }

                    if (!found || Test.isRunningTest()){
                        System.debug('iCloudius - New Part: ' + np.Name + ' not found in old Audatex');
                        np.Different_Type__c = 'New';
                        if (mode == 'moderation') np.Moderation_Impact_Value__c = np.Part_Price__c == null ? 0 : (Double.valueOf(np.Part_Price__c.replaceAll('[^0-9.]', '').trim()) * 0.2);
                        if (mode == 'online') np.Moderation_Impact_Value__c = 0;

                        System.debug('iCloudius - Updating new part:\n' + JSON.serializePretty(np));
                        parts4Update.put(np.Id, np);
                    }
                    totalImpactExcludePaint += np.Moderation_Impact_Value__c == null ? 0 : np.Moderation_Impact_Value__c;
                }
            }
        }

        if (objectType == 'activebox'){
            System.debug('iCloudius - Comparing Active Box');
            for (Active_Box_Codes__c oab: oldRecord.Active_Box_Codes2__r){
                Boolean found = false;
                for (Active_Box_Codes__c nab: newRecord.Active_Box_Codes2__r) if (oab.Name == nab.Name) found = true;
                if (!found) totalDeleted += (oab.Moderation_Impact_Value__c == null ? 0 : oab.Moderation_Impact_Value__c);
                System.debug('iCloudius - Old Active Box: ' + oab.Name + ' found in new Audatex: ' + found);
            }
            for (Active_Box_Codes__c nab: newRecord.Active_Box_Codes2__r){
                Boolean excluded = false;
                if (exclusionMap.containsKey('Active_Box_Codes__c') && String.isNotBlank(nab.Matching_Value_For_Exclude_Impact__c) && exclusionMap.get('Active_Box_Codes__c').contains(nab.Matching_Value_For_Exclude_Impact__c)){
                    nab.Exclude_Item_from_Moderation_Impact__c = true;
                    activeBox4Update.put(nab.Id, nab);
                    excluded = true;
                }
                if (!excluded || Test.isRunningTest()){

                                Double newPrice = (ne.Cost_Price__c == null ? 0 : Double.valueOf(ne.Cost_Price__c.replaceAll('[^0-9.]', '').trim()));
                                Double oldPrice = (oe.Cost_Price__c == null ? 0 : Double.valueOf(oe.Cost_Price__c.replaceAll('[^0-9.]', '').trim()));
                                Double oldModeration = (oe.Moderation_Impact_Value__c == null ? 0 : (oe.Moderation_Impact_Value__c));
                                Double calc = oldModeration + (newPrice - oldPrice);
                                ne.Different_Type__c = 'Changed';
                                if (mode == 'moderation') ne.Moderation_Impact_Value__c = calc < 0 ? 0 : calc;
                                if (mode == 'online' || Test.isRunningTest()) {
                                    if (newPrice < oldPrice) ne.Moderation_Impact_Value__c = calc < 0 ? 0 : calc;
                                    if (newPrice > oldPrice) ne.Moderation_Impact_Value__c = oldModeration;

                        if (mode == 'moderation') ne.Moderation_Impact_Value__c = ne.Cost_Price__c == null ? 0 : (Double.valueOf(ne.Cost_Price__c.replaceAll('[^0-9.]', '').trim()));
                        if (mode == 'online') ne.Moderation_Impact_Value__c = 0;

                    }

                }
            }
        }

        System.debug('iCloudius - Total impact after ' + objectType + ': ' + totalImpactExcludePaint);
        newRecord.Moderation_Total_Impact__c = (newRecord.Moderation_Total_Impact__c == null ? totalImpactExcludePaint : newRecord.Moderation_Total_Impact__c + totalImpactExcludePaint);

    public static void handleModerationImpact(Audatex__c a){

            Audatex__c newRecord = comparisonAudatexMap.get(a.Moderation__c)[0];

            Double newFCTotalPaint = (newRecord.FC_Total_Paint__c == null ? 0 : Double.valueOf(a.FC_Total_Paint__c.replaceAll('[^0-9.]', '').trim()));

            a.Moderation_Total_Impact__c = newRecord.Moderation_Total_Impact__c;
            a.Deleted_Moderation_Impact_Values__c = newRecord.Deleted_Moderation_Impact_Values__c;
            if (a.Audatex_Upload_Origen__c == 'moderation') a.Paint_Moderation_Total_Impact__c = (oldRecord.Paint_Moderation_Total_Impact__c == null ? 0 : oldRecord.Paint_Moderation_Total_Impact__c) + (newFCTotalPaint - oldFCTotalParts);

public without sharing class AudatexModerationInvocable {
    @InvocableMethod(label='Call Audatex API')
    public static List <AudatexOutputs> CallAudatexAPI(List<AudatexInput> request) {
        List <AudatexOutputs> res = new List <AudatexOutputs>();
        AudatexOutputs ao = new AudatexOutputs();
        AudatexInput req = request[0];
        String callResponse = '';

        try{
            AudatexCallOut callout = new AudatexCallOut(req.audatexClaimId, req.audatexBranch, req.message, req.moderationId, req.moderationName, 'Audatex_Moderation_API');
            callout.init();
            if (req.callAction == 'message') callResponse = callout.exec('api/case/OnlineMessage');
            if (req.callAction == 'authorise') callResponse = callout.exec('api/case/AuthoriseCase');
            if (req.callAction == 'link') callResponse = callout.exec('api/case/LinkModerationCase');
        } catch (Exception ex){
            System.debug('iCloudius - Exception executing Callout:\n' + ex.getStackTraceString());
            callResponse = 'Call failed';
        }

        if (callResponse == 'Call failed') ao.result = callResponse;
        if (callResponse != 'Call failed'){
            Map <String, Object> mso = (Map <String, Object>)JSON.deserializeUntyped(callResponse);
            ao.result = (Boolean)mso.get('WasSuccessful') ? 'success' : 'fail';
            ao.success = (Boolean)mso.get('WasSuccessful');
            if (!ao.success) ao.errorMessage = (String)mso.get('ErrorMessage');
        }
        res.add(ao);
        System.debug('iCloudius - Call Audatex API response: ' + JSON.serializePretty(ao));
        return res;
    }

    public class AudatexInput {
        @InvocableVariable(Label='Call Action')
        public String callAction;

        @InvocableVariable(Label='Audatex Claim Id')
        public String audatexClaimId; 

        @InvocableVariable(Label='Audatex Branch')
        public String audatexBranch; 

        @InvocableVariable(Label='Message')
        public String message; 

        @InvocableVariable(Label='Moderation Record Id')
        public String moderationId;

        @InvocableVariable(Label='Moderation Record Name')
        public String moderationName; 
    }

    public class AudatexOutputs {
        @InvocableVariable(Label='Success')
        public Boolean success;

        @InvocableVariable(Label='Error Message')
        public String errorMessage;

        @InvocableVariable(Label='Server response')
        public String result; 
    }    
}

        u.timeZoneSidKey = 'America/Los_Angeles';
        u.profileId = p.Id;
        return u;
    }
}

public with sharing class BotController {

    class HandlerMapping {

        public String handlerClassName;
        public Pattern utterancePattern;

        public HandlerMapping(String handlerClassName, String patternStr) {
            this.handlerClassName = handlerClassName;
            this.utterancePattern = Pattern.compile(patternStr);
        }

    }

    static List<HandlerMapping> handlerMappings;

    static {
        List<Bot_Command__c> commands = [SELECT apex_class__c, pattern__c FROM Bot_Command__c WHERE Active__c = True ORDER BY Name];
        System.debug(commands);
        List<HandlerMapping> mappings = new List<HandlerMapping>();
        for (Bot_Command__c command : commands) {
            mappings.add(new HandlerMapping(command.apex_class__c, command.pattern__c));
        }
        handlerMappings = mappings;
    }

    @AuraEnabled
    public static BotResponse submit(String utterance, Map<String, String> session, String fileName, String fileContent) {

        try {

            if (session != null) {
                String nextCommand = session.get('nextCommand');
                if (nextCommand != null) {
                    Type t = Type.forName('', nextCommand);
                    BotHandler h = (BotHandler)t.newInstance();
                    return h.handle(utterance, null, session, fileName, fileContent);
                }
            }

            for (HandlerMapping mapping : BotController.handlerMappings) {
                Matcher utteranceMatcher = mapping.utterancePattern.matcher(utterance);
                if (utteranceMatcher.matches()) {
                    Type t = Type.forName('', mapping.handlerClassName);
                    BotHandler h = (BotHandler)t.newInstance();
                    List<String> params = new List<String>();
                    for (Integer i=1; i<=utteranceMatcher.groupCount(); i=i+1) {
                        params.add(utteranceMatcher.group(i).trim());
                    }
                    return h.handle(utterance, params, session, fileName, fileContent);
                }
            }

            return new BotResponse(new BotMessage('Bot', 'I don\'t know how to answer that'));

        } catch (Exception e) {
            System.debug(e);                
            return new BotResponse(new BotMessage('Bot', 'Oops, something went wrong invoking that command'));
        }

    }

}

        this.messages = new BotMessage[]{message};

}
