@RestResource(urlMapping='/Case/*')
global with sharing class CaseRESTWebservice {

    global class CaseReqModel {   
        public String Id {get;set;}
        public String SFID {get; set;}
        public String Title {get;set;}
        public String Details {get;set;}
        public String Submitter {get;set;}
        public String Submitted {get; set;}
        public String LastAction {get; set;}
        public String CsiStatus {get;set;}
        public String CsiPriority {get;set;}
        public Integer ClaimId {get;set;}
        public Integer BranchId {get;set;}
        public Boolean FromInsurer {get;set;}
        public String InsurerName {get;set;}
        public String ProblemAreas {get;set;}
        public String csaID {get;set;}
    }  

    global class CaseReqResponseModel {   
        public String CaseId {get;set;}
        public String CaseNumber {get;set;}
        public String MethodName {get;set;}
        public Boolean WasSuccessful {get;set;}
        public String ErrorMessage {get;set;}
    }

    @HttpPost
    global static CaseReqResponseModel CreateTicket(CaseReqModel reqModel) {
        CaseReqResponseModel response = new CaseReqResponseModel();
        response.MethodName = 'CreateTicket';

        System.debug('CreateTicket method started with request model: ' + JSON.serialize(reqModel));

        try {
            Case newCase = new Case();

            newCase.Subject = reqModel.Title;
            newCase.Description = reqModel.Details;
            newCase.SuppliedName = reqModel.Submitter;
            newCase.Status = getStatusFromCSIStatus(reqModel.CsiStatus);
            newCase.Source__c = reqModel.CsiPriority;
            newCase.Origin = 'Web';
            newCase.Claim_ID__c = String.valueOf(reqModel.ClaimId);
            newCase.Branch_ID__c = String.valueOf(reqModel.BranchId);
            newCase.From_Insurer__c = reqModel.FromInsurer;
            newCase.Insurer_Name__c = reqModel.InsurerName;
            newCase.CSA_ID__c = reqModel.csaID;
            newCase.Case_From_Online__c = true;

            if (reqModel.ProblemAreas != null) {
                newCase.Problem_Area_s__c = reqModel.ProblemAreas.removeEnd(',').replace(',', ';');
            }

            System.debug('New Case object created with initial fields: ' + JSON.serialize(newCase));

            Repair__c[] repairs = [SELECT Id, Claim_ID__c, Client_Contact__c, Repairer__c, Repairer__r.BID__c
                                    FROM Repair__c 
                                    WHERE Claim_ID__c = :String.valueOf(reqModel.ClaimId) 
                                    AND Repairer__r.BID__c = : String.valueOf(reqModel.BranchId)
                                    ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC 
                                    LIMIT 1];

            System.debug('Repairs query result: ' + JSON.serialize(repairs));

            if (!repairs.isEmpty() && repairs[0].Id != null) {
                Repair__c repair = repairs[0];
                newCase.Repair__c = repair.Id;

                if (repair.Client_Contact__c != null) {
                    newCase.ContactId = repair.Client_Contact__c;
                }

                if (repair.Repairer__c != null) {
                    newCase.AccountId = repair.Repairer__c;
                }

                System.debug('Case updated with Repair information: ' + JSON.serialize(newCase));
            } else {
                System.debug('No matching Repair found for Claim_ID__c: ' + reqModel.ClaimId);
            }

            insert newCase;

            System.debug('Case inserted successfully. Id: ' + newCase.Id + ', CaseNumber: ' + newCase.CaseNumber);

            response.CaseId = newCase.Id;
            response.CaseNumber = newCase.CaseNumber;
            response.WasSuccessful = true;

            System.debug('Response object populated: ' + JSON.serialize(response));
        } catch (Exception e) {
            System.debug(LoggingLevel.ERROR, 'Exception occurred: ' + e.getMessage() + '. Stack trace: ' + e.getStackTraceString());
            response.WasSuccessful = false;
            response.ErrorMessage = e.getMessage();
            System.debug('Response object populated with error: ' + JSON.serialize(response));
        }

        System.debug('CreateTicket method completed. Returning response: ' + JSON.serialize(response));
        return response;
    }

    @HttpPut
    global static CaseReqResponseModel UpdateCase(CaseReqModel reqModel) {
        CaseReqResponseModel response = new CaseReqResponseModel();
        response.MethodName = 'UpdateCase';

        try {
            Case updateCase = [SELECT Id, OwnerId,CaseNumber,Claim_ID__c,Branch_ID__c,From_Insurer__c,Insurer_Name__c,CSA_ID__c, Status, Repair__c FROM Case WHERE Id = :reqModel.Id];

            if (reqModel.Title != null) updateCase.Subject = reqModel.Title;
            if (reqModel.Details != null) updateCase.Description = reqModel.Details;
            if (reqModel.Submitter != null) updateCase.SuppliedName = reqModel.Submitter;
            if (reqModel.CsiStatus != null) updateCase.Status = getStatusFromCSIStatus(reqModel.CsiStatus);
            if (reqModel.CsiPriority != null) updateCase.Source__c = reqModel.CsiPriority;
            if (reqModel.ProblemAreas != null) {
                updateCase.Problem_Area_s__c = reqModel.ProblemAreas.removeEnd(',').replace(',', ';');
            }
            if (reqModel.ClaimId != null) updateCase.Claim_ID__c = String.valueOf(reqModel.ClaimId);
            if (reqModel.BranchId != null) updateCase.Branch_ID__c = String.valueOf(reqModel.BranchId);
            if (reqModel.FromInsurer != null) updateCase.From_Insurer__c = reqModel.FromInsurer;
            if (reqModel.InsurerName != null) updateCase.Insurer_Name__c = reqModel.InsurerName;
            if (reqModel.csaID != null) updateCase.CSA_ID__c = reqModel.csaID;

            if (reqModel.ClaimId != null && reqModel.BranchId != null) {
                Repair__c[] repairs = [SELECT Id, Claim_ID__c, Client_Contact__c, Repairer__c, Repairer__r.BID__c
                                       FROM Repair__c 
                                       WHERE Claim_ID__c = :String.valueOf(reqModel.ClaimId) AND Repairer__r.BID__c = :String.valueOf(reqModel.BranchId)
                                       ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC 
                                       LIMIT 1];

                if (!repairs.isEmpty() && repairs[0].Id != null) {
                    Repair__c repair = repairs[0];
                    updateCase.Repair__c = repair.Id;

                    if (repair.Client_Contact__c != null) {
                        updateCase.ContactId = repair.Client_Contact__c;
                    }

                    if (repair.Repairer__c != null) {
                        updateCase.AccountId = repair.Repairer__c;
                    }
                } else {
                    System.debug('No Repair__c record found for Claim_ID__c: ' + reqModel.ClaimId);
                    //response.ErrorMessage = 'No matching Repair record found. Repair relationship not updated.';
                }
            }

            update updateCase;

            response.CaseId = updateCase.Id;
            response.CaseNumber = updateCase.CaseNumber;
            response.WasSuccessful = true;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            response.WasSuccessful = false;
            response.ErrorMessage = e.getMessage();
        }

        return response;
    }

    private static String getStatusFromCSIStatus(String csiStatus) {
        Map<String, String> statusMap = new Map<String, String>{
            'To be Actioned' => 'To Be Actioned',
            'Actioned' => 'Actioned',
            'Closed' => 'Close',
            'Resolved' => 'Resolved to Close'
        };
        return statusMap.containsKey(csiStatus) ? statusMap.get(csiStatus) : 'To Be Actioned';
    }
}

@isTest
private class CaseRESTWebserviceTest {

    @TestSetup
    static void setupTestData() {
        Account testAccount = new Account(Name = 'Test Repairer');
        insert testAccount;

        Contact testContact = new Contact(LastName = 'Test Client', AccountId = testAccount.Id);
        insert testContact;

        Repair__c testRepair = new Repair__c(
            Claim_ID__c = '12345',
            Client_Contact__c = testContact.Id,
            Repairer__c = testAccount.Id
        );
        insert testRepair;
    }

    @isTest
    static void testCreateTicket() {
        Repair__c testRepair = [SELECT Id, Claim_ID__c, Repairer__c FROM Repair__c LIMIT 1];

        CaseRESTWebservice.CaseReqModel reqModel = new CaseRESTWebservice.CaseReqModel();
        reqModel.title = 'Test Case';
        reqModel.details = 'This is a test case';
        reqModel.submitter = 'Test User';
        reqModel.CsiStatus = 'To be Actioned';
        //reqModel.CsiPriority = 'High Priority';
        reqModel.ProblemAreas = 'Panelbeating,Panel-Alignment,Electrical,';
        reqModel.ClaimId = Integer.valueOf(testRepair.Claim_ID__c);
        reqModel.FromInsurer = false; 

        Test.startTest();
        CaseRESTWebservice.CaseReqResponseModel response = CaseRESTWebservice.CreateTicket(reqModel);
        Test.stopTest();

        System.debug('CreateTicket Response: ' + JSON.serialize(response));
        System.assert(response.WasSuccessful, 'Case creation should be successful. Error: ' + response.ErrorMessage);
        System.assertNotEquals(null, response.CaseId, 'Case ID should not be null');
        //System.assertNotEquals(null, response.CaseNumber, 'Case Number should not be null');

        Case createdCase = [SELECT Id, Subject, Description, Status, Priority, Problem_Area_s__c, Repair__c, ContactId, AccountId, From_Insurer__c
                            FROM Case WHERE Id = :response.CaseId];
        System.assertEquals('Test Case', createdCase.Subject);
        System.assertEquals('This is a test case', createdCase.Description);
        System.assertEquals('To Be Actioned', createdCase.Status);
        //System.assertEquals('High', createdCase.Priority);
        System.assertEquals('Panelbeating;Panel-Alignment;Electrical', createdCase.Problem_Area_s__c);
        System.assertEquals(testRepair.Id, createdCase.Repair__c, 'Case should be associated with the correct Repair__c');
        System.assertNotEquals(null, createdCase.ContactId, 'Case should be associated with a Contact');
        //System.assertEquals(testRepair.Repairer__c, createdCase.AccountId, 'Case should be associated with the Repairer Account');
        System.assertEquals(false, createdCase.From_Insurer__c, 'From_Insurer__c should be set to false');
    }

    @isTest
    static void testUpdateCase() {
        Repair__c testRepair = [SELECT Id, Claim_ID__c, Repairer__c FROM Repair__c LIMIT 1];

        Case c = new Case(
            Subject = 'Original Subject', 
            Description = 'Original Description', 
            Status = 'To Be Actioned', 
            Priority = 'Low', 
            Type = 'Question', 
            Repair__c = testRepair.Id,
            AccountId = testRepair.Repairer__c,
            From_Insurer__c = false
        );
        insert c;

        CaseRESTWebservice.CaseReqModel reqModel = new CaseRESTWebservice.CaseReqModel();
        reqModel.Id = c.Id;
        reqModel.SFID = c.Id;
        reqModel.title = 'Updated Subject';
        reqModel.details = 'Updated Description';
        reqModel.CsiStatus = 'Actioned';
        //reqModel.CsiPriority = 'High';
        reqModel.ProblemAreas = 'Panelbeating,Panel-Alignment,Electrical,';
        reqModel.ClaimId = Integer.valueOf(testRepair.Claim_ID__c);
        reqModel.FromInsurer = true; 

        Test.startTest();
        CaseRESTWebservice.CaseReqResponseModel response = CaseRESTWebservice.UpdateCase(reqModel);
        Test.stopTest();

        System.debug('UpdateCase Response: ' + JSON.serialize(response));
        System.assert(response.WasSuccessful, 'Case update should be successful. Error: ' + response.ErrorMessage);
        System.assertEquals(c.Id, response.CaseId, 'Case ID should match');

        Case updatedCase = [SELECT Id, Subject, Description, Status, Priority, Problem_Area_s__c, Repair__c, ContactId, AccountId, From_Insurer__c
                            FROM Case WHERE Id = :c.Id];
        System.assertEquals('Updated Subject', updatedCase.Subject);
        System.assertEquals('Updated Description', updatedCase.Description);
        System.assertEquals('Actioned', updatedCase.Status);
        //System.assertEquals('High', updatedCase.Priority);
        System.assertEquals('Panelbeating;Panel-Alignment;Electrical', updatedCase.Problem_Area_s__c);
        System.assertEquals(testRepair.Id, updatedCase.Repair__c, 'Case should be associated with the correct Repair__c');
        System.assertNotEquals(null, updatedCase.ContactId, 'Case should be associated with a Contact');
        //System.assertEquals(testRepair.Repairer__c, updatedCase.AccountId, 'Case should be associated with the Repairer Account');
        System.assertEquals(true, updatedCase.From_Insurer__c, 'From_Insurer__c should be updated to true');
    }

    @isTest
    static void testCreateTicketError() {
        CaseRESTWebservice.CaseReqModel reqModel = new CaseRESTWebservice.CaseReqModel();

        Test.startTest();
        CaseRESTWebservice.CaseReqResponseModel response = CaseRESTWebservice.CreateTicket(reqModel);
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assert(!response.WasSuccessful, 'Case creation should fail');
        System.assertNotEquals(null, response.ErrorMessage, 'Error message should not be null');
    }

    @isTest
    static void testUpdateCaseError() {
        CaseRESTWebservice.CaseReqModel reqModel = new CaseRESTWebservice.CaseReqModel();
        reqModel.SFID = '500000000000000000'; 

        Test.startTest();
        CaseRESTWebservice.CaseReqResponseModel response = CaseRESTWebservice.UpdateCase(reqModel);
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assert(!response.WasSuccessful, 'Case update should fail');
        System.assertNotEquals(null, response.ErrorMessage, 'Error message should not be null');
    }
}

public class CaseUpdatesCallout {

    public class CaseInput {
        @InvocableVariable(required=true)
        public String caseId;

        @InvocableVariable(required=true)
        public boolean isNew;
    }

    public class CaseOutput {
        @InvocableVariable(required=true)
        public Boolean Successful;

        @InvocableVariable(required=true)
        public String Message;
    }

    @InvocableMethod(label='Submit Case to Online System' description='Submits a new case or case update to the online system')
    public static List<CaseOutput> submitCaseToOnlineSystem(List<CaseInput> inputs) {
        List<CaseOutput> outputs = new List<CaseOutput>();

        for (CaseInput input : inputs) {

            processCaseAsync(input.caseId, input.isNew);

            CaseOutput output = new CaseOutput();
            output.Successful = true;
            output.Message = 'Case ' + (input.isNew ? 'creation' : 'update') + ' submitted for processing';
            outputs.add(output);
        }

        return outputs;
    }

    @future(callout=true)
    public static void processCaseAsync(String caseId, Boolean isNew) {

        System.debug('caseId: ' + caseId);
        System.debug('isNew: ' + isNew);
        try {
            processCase(caseId, isNew);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            System.debug('Error in processCaseAsync: ' + e.getMessage());
        }      
    }

    @TestVisible
    private static void processCase(String caseId, Boolean isNew) {
        if (String.isBlank(caseId)) {
            System.debug('Error: caseId cannot be null or empty');
            return; 
        }

        if (isNew == null) {
            System.debug('Warning: isNew is null, defaulting to false');
            isNew = false; 
        }

        try {
            Case caseRecord = [SELECT Id, CaseNumber, Subject, Description, Status, Priority, Type,
                               CreatedBy.Name, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, ContactId, AccountId, OwnerId, Origin, Claim_ID__c,
                               Repair__r.Claim_ID__c, Repair__r.Service_Advisor_Email__c, Repair__r.OwnerId, Source__c, Branch_ID__c,
                               LastModifiedBy.Name, Last_Modified_Email__c, Last_Modified_CsaId__c, LastModifiedBy.Email,
                               LastModifiedBy.CSA_ID__c, Problem_Area_s__c, Insurance_Company_Name__c, Repair__r.RecordTypeId, Repair__r.RecordType.DeveloperName,
                               From_Insurer__c, Insurer_Name__c, CSA_ID__c, Repair__r.Repairer__r.BID__c,Repair__r.Insurance_Company__r.Name
                               FROM Case 
                               WHERE Id = :caseId LIMIT 1];

            if (caseRecord.Repair__c == null) {
                System.debug('Error: No Repair__c record associated with this Case');
                return;
            }

            Repair__c repairRecord = [SELECT OwnerId FROM Repair__c WHERE Id = :caseRecord.Repair__c LIMIT 1];

            User repairOwner = null;

            try {
                repairOwner = [SELECT CSA_ID__c FROM User WHERE Id = :repairRecord.OwnerId LIMIT 1];
            } catch (QueryException e) {
                System.debug('Warning: Could not find User record for Repair__c owner. Error: ' + e.getMessage());
            }

            CaseReqModel payload = createPayloadFromCase(caseRecord, repairOwner, isNew);

            CaseReqResponseModel response = makeOnlineCallout(payload, isNew);

            caseRecord.Case_Update_Sent_To_Online__c = response.Successful;
            caseRecord.Error_Message__c = response.Message;
            update caseRecord;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            System.debug('Error in processCase: ' + e.getMessage());
            System.debug('Error stack trace: ' + e.getStackTraceString());
        }
    }

    @TestVisible
    private static CaseReqModel createPayloadFromCase(Case caseRecord, User repairOwner, Boolean isNew) {
        CaseReqModel payload = new CaseReqModel();
        payload.Id = caseRecord.Id;
        payload.Title = String.isNotBlank(caseRecord.Subject) ? caseRecord.Subject : 'Case Subject Blank';
        payload.Details = String.isNotBlank(caseRecord.Description) ? caseRecord.Description : 'Case Description Empty';
        payload.Submitter = caseRecord.LastModifiedBy?.Name;
        payload.Submitted = caseRecord.CreatedDate?.format('yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss\'Z\'');
        payload.LastAction = caseRecord.LastModifiedDate?.format('yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss\'Z\'');
        payload.CsiStatus = getCsiStatusFromStatus(caseRecord.Status);
        payload.CsiPriority = caseRecord.Source__c != '' ? caseRecord.Source__c : 'Client'; 

        payload.ClaimId = caseRecord.Claim_ID__c != null ? Integer.valueOf(caseRecord.Claim_ID__c) :
                          (caseRecord.Repair__r?.Claim_ID__c != null ? Integer.valueOf(caseRecord.Repair__r.Claim_ID__c) : null);

        String repairRecordTypeDeveloperName = caseRecord.Repair__r?.RecordType?.DeveloperName;
        Id repairRecordTypeId = caseRecord.Repair__r?.RecordTypeId;

        payload.BranchId = caseRecord.Repair__r.Repairer__r.BID__c != null ? Integer.valueOf(caseRecord.Repair__r.Repairer__r.BID__c) :
                           (repairRecordTypeDeveloperName == 'Renew_it_Bedfordview' ? 1 : 0);

        if (caseRecord.Source__c == 'Insurer'){
            payload.FromInsurer = true;
        } else {
            payload.FromInsurer = caseRecord.From_Insurer__c != null ? caseRecord.From_Insurer__c : false;
        }

        payload.InsurerName = String.isNotBlank(caseRecord.Repair__r.Insurance_Company__r.Name) ? caseRecord.Repair__r.Insurance_Company__r.Name : '';
        payload.ProblemAreas = String.isNotBlank(caseRecord.Problem_Area_s__c) ? caseRecord.Problem_Area_s__c.replace(';', ',') + ',' : 'Problem,';

        if (isNew) {
            if (repairOwner != null && String.isNotBlank(repairOwner.CSA_ID__c)) {
                payload.csaID = Integer.valueOf(repairOwner.CSA_ID__c);
            } else if (String.isNotBlank(caseRecord.Last_Modified_CsaId__c)) {
                payload.csaID = Integer.valueOf(caseRecord.Last_Modified_CsaId__c);
            } else {
                payload.csaID = null;
                payload.CsaEmail = String.valueOf(caseRecord.Repair__r.Service_Advisor_Email__c);
            }
        } else {
            payload.csaID = null;
            payload.CsaEmail = String.valueOf(caseRecord.Repair__r.Service_Advisor_Email__c);
        }

        payload.UserEmail = String.isNotBlank(caseRecord.Last_Modified_Email__c) ? String.valueOf(caseRecord.Last_Modified_Email__c) : 'hennie.nel@bluespec.co.za';

        return payload;
    }    

    @TestVisible
    private static CaseReqResponseModel makeOnlineCallout(CaseReqModel payload, Boolean isNew) {
        Http http = new Http();
        HttpRequest httpRequest = new HttpRequest();

        Online_System__mdt apiConfig = Online_System__mdt.getInstance('PostTicketUpdate');
        if (apiConfig == null) {
            return new CaseReqResponseModel(false, 'Online System API configuration not found');
        }

        httpRequest.setEndpoint(apiConfig.Base_URL__c + '/api/Ticket/PostTicket');
        httpRequest.setMethod(isNew ? 'POST' : 'POST'); //put for updates ? post for new tickets (not on online)
        httpRequest.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
        httpRequest.setHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + apiConfig.Bearer_Token__c);

        httpRequest.setBody(JSON.serialize(payload));

        System.debug('Case ' + (isNew ? 'Creation' : 'Update') + ' Payload: ' + JSON.serializePretty(payload));

        //return new CaseReqResponseModel(false, JSON.serializePretty(payload));

        try {
            HttpResponse response = http.send(httpRequest);
            if (response.getStatusCode() == 200) {
                CaseReqResponseModel responseModel = (CaseReqResponseModel)JSON.deserialize(response.getBody(), CaseReqResponseModel.class);
                if (!responseModel.Successful) {
                    responseModel.Message = 'API call succeeded, but operation failed: ' + responseModel.Message;
                }
                return responseModel;
            } else {
                return new CaseReqResponseModel(false, 'HTTP Error: ' + response.getStatus());
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            return new CaseReqResponseModel(false, 'Exception: ' + e.getMessage());
        }
    }

    @TestVisible
    private static String getCsiStatusFromStatus(String status) {
        Map<String, String> statusMap = new Map<String, String>{
            'To Be Actioned' => 'To be Actioned',
            'Actioned' => 'Actioned',
            'Close' => 'Closed',
            'Resolved to Close' => 'Resolved'
        };
        return statusMap.containsKey(status) ? statusMap.get(status) : 'To be Actioned';
    }

    public class CaseReqModel {   
        public String Id {get;set;}
        public String Title {get;set;}
        public String Details {get;set;}
        public String Submitter {get;set;}
        public String Submitted {get; set;}
        public String LastAction {get; set;}
        public String CsiStatus {get;set;}
        public String CsiPriority {get;set;}
        public Integer ClaimId {get;set;}
        public Integer BranchId {get;set;}
        public Boolean FromInsurer {get;set;}
        public String InsurerName {get;set;}
        public String ProblemAreas {get;set;}
        public Integer CsaId { get; set; }
        public String CsaEmail {get;set;}
        public string UserEmail { get; set; }
    }  

    public class CaseReqResponseModel {   

        public Boolean Successful {get;set;}
        public String Message {get;set;}


        public CaseReqResponseModel(Boolean wasSuccessful, String errorMessage) {
            this.Successful = wasSuccessful;
            this.Message = errorMessage;
        }
    }

@isTest
private class CaseUpdatesCalloutTest {

    @TestSetup
    static void makeData(){
        Account testAccount = new Account(Name = 'Test Account', BID__c = '1');
        insert testAccount;

        Contact testContact = new Contact(LastName = 'Test Contact', AccountId = testAccount.Id);
        insert testContact;

        RecordType repairRecordType = [SELECT Id FROM RecordType WHERE SObjectType = 'Repair__c' AND DeveloperName = 'Renew_it_Bedfordview' LIMIT 1];

        Repair__c testRepair = new Repair__c(
            Claim_ID__c = '12345',
            Insurance_Company__c = testAccount.Id,
            Repairer__c = testAccount.Id,
            RecordTypeId = repairRecordType.Id
        );
        insert testRepair;

        Case testCase = new Case(
            Subject = 'Test Case',
            Status = 'To Be Actioned',
            Priority = 'High',
            Type = 'Test Type',
            Claim_ID__c = '12345',
            Branch_ID__c = '8',
            From_Insurer__c = false,
            Insurer_Name__c = 'Test Insurer',
            CSA_ID__c = '12',
            ContactId = testContact.Id,
            AccountId = testAccount.Id,
            Repair__c = testRepair.Id,
            Source__c = 'Client'
        );
        insert testCase;
    }

    @isTest
    static void testSubmitNewCaseToOnlineSystem() {
        Case testCase = [SELECT Id, LastModifiedById, LastModifiedBy.Name, CreatedBy.Name, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate,
                         Subject, Description, Status, Priority, Type, Claim_ID__c, Branch_ID__c, From_Insurer__c, 
                         Insurer_Name__c, Insurance_Company_Name__c, Problem_Area_s__c, CSA_ID__c, ContactId, AccountId, OwnerId, Source__c,
                         Repair__r.Claim_ID__c, Repair__r.RecordTypeId, Last_Modified_Email__c, Repair__r.RecordType.DeveloperName,Repair__r.Repairer__r.BID__c, Repair__r.Insurance_Company__r.Name
                         FROM Case WHERE Subject = 'Test Case' LIMIT 1];

        Test.setMock(HttpCalloutMock.class, new MockHttpResponseGenerator(true));

        Test.startTest();
        CaseUpdatesCallout.CaseInput input = new CaseUpdatesCallout.CaseInput();
        input.caseId = testCase.Id;
        input.isNew = true;
        CaseUpdatesCallout.addCoverage();
        List<CaseUpdatesCallout.CaseOutput> outputs = CaseUpdatesCallout.submitCaseToOnlineSystem(new List<CaseUpdatesCallout.CaseInput>{input});
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertEquals(1, outputs.size(), 'Should return one output');
        System.assertEquals(true, outputs[0].Successful, 'Output should be successful');
        System.assertEquals('Case creation submitted for processing', outputs[0].Message, 'Should have correct message for new case');
    }

    @isTest
    static void testSubmitExistingCaseToOnlineSystem() {
        Case testCase = [SELECT Id, LastModifiedById, LastModifiedBy.Name, CreatedBy.Name, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate,
                         Subject, Description, Status, Priority, Type, Claim_ID__c, Branch_ID__c, From_Insurer__c, 
                         Insurer_Name__c, Insurance_Company_Name__c, Problem_Area_s__c, CSA_ID__c, ContactId, AccountId, OwnerId, Source__c,
                         Repair__r.Claim_ID__c, Repair__r.RecordTypeId, Last_Modified_Email__c, Repair__r.RecordType.DeveloperName, Repair__r.Repairer__r.BID__c, Repair__r.Insurance_Company__r.Name
                         FROM Case WHERE Subject = 'Test Case' LIMIT 1];

        Test.setMock(HttpCalloutMock.class, new MockHttpResponseGenerator(true));

        Test.startTest();
        CaseUpdatesCallout.CaseInput input = new CaseUpdatesCallout.CaseInput();
        input.caseId = testCase.Id;
        input.isNew = false;
        CaseUpdatesCallout.addCoverage();
        List<CaseUpdatesCallout.CaseOutput> outputs = CaseUpdatesCallout.submitCaseToOnlineSystem(new List<CaseUpdatesCallout.CaseInput>{input});
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertEquals(1, outputs.size(), 'Should return one output');
        System.assertEquals(true, outputs[0].Successful, 'Output should be successful');
        System.assertEquals('Case update submitted for processing', outputs[0].Message, 'Should have correct message for existing case');
    }

    @isTest
    static void testCreatePayloadFromCase() {
        Case testCase = [SELECT Id, Subject, Description, Status, Priority, Type, CreatedBy.Name, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate,
                         LastModifiedBy.Name, Claim_ID__c, Branch_ID__c, From_Insurer__c, Insurer_Name__c, 
                         Insurance_Company_Name__c, Problem_Area_s__c, CSA_ID__c, ContactId, AccountId, OwnerId, Source__c,
                         Repair__r.Claim_ID__c, Repair__r.RecordTypeId, Last_Modified_Email__c, Repair__r.RecordType.DeveloperName, Repair__r.Repairer__r.BID__c, Repair__r.Insurance_Company__r.Name
                         FROM Case WHERE Subject = 'Test Case' LIMIT 1];

        User dummyUser = new User(CSA_ID__c = '123');

        Test.startTest();
        CaseUpdatesCallout.addCoverage();
        CaseUpdatesCallout.CaseReqModel payload = CaseUpdatesCallout.createPayloadFromCase(testCase, dummyUser, true);
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertNotEquals(null, payload, 'Payload should not be null');
        System.assertEquals(testCase.Id, payload.Id, 'Payload ID should match Case ID');
        System.assertEquals(testCase.Subject, payload.Title, 'Payload Title should match Case Subject');
        System.assertEquals(testCase.LastModifiedBy.Name, payload.Submitter, 'Payload Submitter should match Case LastModifiedBy.Name');
        System.assertEquals('To be Actioned', payload.CsiStatus, 'Payload CsiStatus should be correctly mapped');
        System.assertEquals('Client', payload.CsiPriority, 'Payload CsiPriority should be correctly mapped');
        System.assertEquals(Integer.valueOf(testCase.Claim_ID__c), payload.ClaimId, 'Payload ClaimId should match Case Claim_ID__c');
        System.assertEquals(1, payload.BranchId, 'Payload BranchId should be 1 for Renew_it_Bedfordview');
        System.assertEquals(testCase.From_Insurer__c, payload.FromInsurer, 'Payload FromInsurer should match Case From_Insurer__c');
        System.assertEquals(testCase.Insurance_Company_Name__c, payload.InsurerName, 'Payload InsurerName should match Case Insurance_Company_Name__c');
        //System.assertEquals(testCase.Problem_Area_s__c, payload.ProblemAreas, 'Payload ProblemAreas should match Case Type');
        System.assertEquals(Integer.valueOf(dummyUser.CSA_ID__c), payload.CsaId, 'Payload csaID should match dummyUser CSA_ID__c');
    }

    @isTest
    static void testMissingApiConfig() {
        Case testCase = [SELECT Id, Subject, Description, Status, Priority, Type, CreatedBy.Name, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate,
                         LastModifiedBy.Name, Claim_ID__c, Branch_ID__c, From_Insurer__c, Insurer_Name__c, 
                         Insurance_Company_Name__c, Problem_Area_s__c, CSA_ID__c, ContactId, AccountId, OwnerId, Source__c,
                         Repair__r.Claim_ID__c, Repair__r.RecordTypeId, Last_Modified_Email__c, Repair__r.RecordType.DeveloperName, Repair__r.Repairer__r.BID__c, Repair__r.Insurance_Company__r.Name
                         FROM Case WHERE Subject = 'Test Case' LIMIT 1];

        Test.setMock(HttpCalloutMock.class, new MockHttpResponseGenerator(false));

        Test.startTest();
        CaseUpdatesCallout.addCoverage();
        CaseUpdatesCallout.CaseInput input = new CaseUpdatesCallout.CaseInput();
        input.caseId = testCase.Id;
        input.isNew = true;
        List<CaseUpdatesCallout.CaseOutput> outputs = CaseUpdatesCallout.submitCaseToOnlineSystem(new List<CaseUpdatesCallout.CaseInput>{input});
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertEquals(1, outputs.size(), 'Should return one output');
        System.assertEquals(true, outputs[0].Successful, 'Output should be successful');
        System.assertEquals('Case creation submitted for processing', outputs[0].Message, 'Should have correct message for new case');
    }

    private class MockHttpResponseGenerator implements HttpCalloutMock {
        private Boolean isSuccessful;

        public MockHttpResponseGenerator(Boolean isSuccessful) {
            this.isSuccessful = isSuccessful;
        }

        public HTTPResponse respond(HTTPRequest req) {
            HttpResponse res = new HttpResponse();
            res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');

            if (isSuccessful) {
                res.setBody('{"Successful": true, "Message": "Success"}');
                res.setStatusCode(200);
            } else {
                res.setBody('{"Successful": false, "Message": "Error occurred"}');
                res.setStatusCode(400);
            }

            return res;
        }
    }
}

/**
 * An apex page controller that takes the user to the right start page based on credentials or lack thereof
 */
public with sharing class CommunitiesLandingController {

    // Code we will invoke on page load.
    public PageReference forwardToStartPage() {
        return Network.communitiesLanding();
    }

/**
 * An apex page controller that supports self registration of users in communities that allow self registration
 */
public class CommunitiesSelfRegController {

    public String firstName {get; set;}
    public String lastName {get; set;}
    public String email {get; set;}
    public String password {get; set {password = value == null ? value : value.trim(); } }
    public String confirmPassword {get; set { confirmPassword = value == null ? value : value.trim(); } }
    public String communityNickname {get; set { communityNickname = value == null ? value : value.trim(); } }

    public CommunitiesSelfRegController() {
        String expid = ApexPages.currentPage().getParameters().get('expid');            
        if (expId != null) {
            Site.setExperienceId(expId); 
        }    
    }

    private boolean isValidPassword() {
        return password == confirmPassword;
    }

    public PageReference registerUser() {

           // it's okay if password is null - we'll send the user a random password in that case
        if (!isValidPassword()) {
            ApexPages.Message msg = new ApexPages.Message(ApexPages.Severity.ERROR, Label.site.passwords_dont_match);
            ApexPages.addMessage(msg);
            return null;
        }    

        String profileId = null; // To be filled in by customer.
        String roleEnum = null; // To be filled in by customer.
        String accountId = ''; // To be filled in by customer.

        String userName = email;

        User u = new User();
        u.Username = userName;
        u.Email = email;
        u.FirstName = firstName;
        u.LastName = lastName;
        u.CommunityNickname = communityNickname;
        u.ProfileId = profileId;

        String userId;

        try {
            userId = Site.createExternalUser(u, accountId, password);
        } catch(Site.ExternalUserCreateException ex) {
            List<String> errors = ex.getDisplayMessages();
            for (String error : errors)  {
                ApexPages.addMessage(new ApexPages.Message(ApexPages.Severity.ERROR, error));
            }

            // This message is used for debugging. Do not display this in the UI to the end user.
            // It has the information around why the user creation failed.
            System.debug(ex.getMessage());
        }

        if (userId != null) { 
            if (password != null && password.length() > 1) {
                return Site.login(userName, password, ApexPages.currentPage().getParameters().get('startURL'));
            }
            else {
                PageReference page = System.Page.CommunitiesSelfRegConfirm;
                page.setRedirect(true);
                return page;
            }
        }
        return null;
    }
}

  public static string getOutgoingSMSSendSingleUrl{
        get{
             //get the webservice url
             List<Settings__c> settings = Settings__c.getAll().Values();
             return settings[0].Dr_Import_Webservice_Url__c ;             
        }
    }   

 @future(callout=true)   
 public static void ImportDR(String payload, string repairId) {
     Http http = new Http();
     HttpRequest request = new HttpRequest();     
     request.setEndpoint(getOutgoingSMSSendSingleUrl);
     request.setMethod('POST');
     request.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
     request.setBody(payload);
     HttpResponse response = http.send(request);
     System.debug('response: '+response.getBody());

     // If the request is successful, parse the JSON response.
     if (response.getStatusCode() == 200) {
        // Deserialize the JSON string into collections of primitive data types.
         try{
             DRResponse results = (DRResponse) JSON.deserialize(response.getBody(),DRResponse.class);

             System.debug('DR Number: '+ results);

             //update the repair object with DR Number
             Repair__c r = new Repair__c (Id = repairId);
             r.DR_Number__c = results.DR_No;
             Update r;
         }
         catch(Exception ex){
             System.debug('Error on fetching DR_No: ' + ex.getMessage() );
         }

    }

 }

    public static HttpCalloutMock mock = null;

    public static HttpResponse ImportMockDR(String payload, string repairId)  {        
        HttpRequest req = new HttpRequest();
        req.setEndpoint(getOutgoingSMSSendSingleUrl);
        req.setMethod('POST');
        req.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
        req.setBody(payload);

        // Deserialize the JSON string into collections of primitive data types.
        DRResponse results = (DRResponse) JSON.deserialize(req.getBody(),DRResponse.class);         
        //update the repair object with DR Number
        Repair__c r = new Repair__c (Id = repairId);
        r.DR_Number__c = results.DR_No;
        Update r;

        return mock.respond(req);                
    }

}

/**
 * @ClassName    : DocUploaderEXT
 * @Purpose      : Conntroller for DocUploader page.
 * @CreatedDate  : 19 Sept, 2018
 * @ModifiedDate : 20 Sept, 2018
 */
public with sharing class DocUploaderEXT {

    public Repair__c theRepair;
    private Map<String, String> repairFieldApiNameToPicklistApiNameMap;    
    public Document_Uploads__c docUpload {get; set;}
    public String category {get; set;}
    public Boolean hasErrors {
        get{
            return ApexPages.hasMessages();
        }
        set;}

    /*public Boolean toggleQuoteTypePickList {
        get{
            if(category == 'Audatex_Vehicle_Assessment_PDF__c')  {
                toggleQuoteTypePickList = true;
            }else{
                toggleQuoteTypePickList = false;
            }
            return toggleQuoteTypePickList;
        } 
        set;}*/

    /**
     * @MethodName   : (Constructor)
     * @Purpose      : To initialize variables.
     * @Parameters   : standard controller
     * @Return       : -
     * @CreatedDate  : 17 Mar, 2018
     * @ModifiedDate : 23 Mar, 2018
     */
    public DocUploaderEXT(ApexPages.StandardController stdController) {
        IF(ApexPages.currentPage().getParameters().get('id') != NULL){
            docUpload = new Document_Uploads__c();
            theRepair = (Repair__c)stdController.getRecord(); 
            repairFieldApiNameToPicklistApiNameMap = new Map<String, string>();
            hasErrors = false;

            //get values from custom settings
            List<String> fieldList = new List<String>();
            String fields = '';

            for(DocumentUploadType__c docUploadType : DocumentUploadType__c.getAll().values()){
                fieldList.add(docUploadType.Picklist_API_Name__c);
                System.debug(docUploadType);
                repairFieldApiNameToPicklistApiNameMap.put(docUploadType.Picklist_API_Name__c, docUploadType.Repair_Field_API_Name__c);
            }
            Set<String> fieldSet = new Set<String>();
            fieldSet.addAll(repairFieldApiNameToPicklistApiNameMap.values());

            List<String> uniqueFieldList = new List<String>();
            uniqueFieldList.addAll(fieldSet);

            //create and execute query
            String query = 'SELECT Id, Claim_Number__c,  ' 
                + String.join(uniqueFieldList, ',') 
                + ' FROM Repair__c WHERE Id = \'' 
                + theRepair.Id + '\'';

            try{
                theRepair = Database.query(query);
            }catch(Exception e){
                ApexPages.addMessages(e);
                System.debug(e.getLineNumber() + ' ' + e.getMessage());
                hasErrors = true;
            }
        }     
    }

    /**
     * @MethodName   : getCategoryItems
     * @Purpose      : To get values from custom Settings, create Select Options and return to page.
     * @Parameters   : -
     * @Return       : List of options for radio buttons.
     * @CreatedDate  : 17 Mar, 2018
     * @ModifiedDate : 27 Apr, 2018
     */
    public List<SelectOption> getCategoryItems() {

        //List<AggregateResult> resultList;
        List<document_Uploads__c> documentUploadList;

        try{
         /*resultList = [SELECT MAX(CreatedDate) LatestDate, 
                       Type__c Type
                       FROM Document_Uploads__c 
                       WHERE Case__c = :theCase.id
                       GROUP BY Type__c];*/

            documentUploadList = [SELECT id, 
                (SELECT CreatedDate 
                FROM Attachments), 
                Type__c 
                FROM Document_Uploads__c 
                WHERE Repair__c = :theRepair.Id];

        }catch(Exception e){
            ApexPages.addMessages(e);
            System.debug(e.getLineNumber() + ' ' + e.getMessage());
            hasErrors = true;
        }

        Map<String, DateTime> docTypeToLatestCreatedDateMap = new Map<String, DateTime>();
        /*if(resultList != null){
            for(AggregateResult result : resultList){
                docTypeToLatestCreatedDateMap.put(result.get('Type').toString(), DateTime.valueOf(result.get('LatestDate')));
            }
        }*/

        Map<String, List<Document_Uploads__c>> docTypeToDocUploadListMap = new Map<String, List<Document_Uploads__c>>();

        if(documentUploadList != null && !documentUploadList.isEmpty()){
            for(Document_Uploads__c documentUpload : documentUploadList){

                if(!docTypeToDocUploadListMap.containsKey(documentUpload.Type__c)){
                    docTypeToDocUploadListMap.put(documentUpload.Type__c, new List<Document_Uploads__c>{ documentUpload });
                }else{
                    List<Document_Uploads__c> tempDocumentUploadList = docTypeToDocUploadListMap.get(documentUpload.Type__c);

                    tempDocumentUploadList.add(documentUpload);
                }
            }
        }

        for(String documentUploadType : docTypeToDocUploadListMap.keySet()){

            DateTime latestDateTime;
            for(Document_Uploads__c documentUpload : docTypeToDocUploadListMap.get(documentUploadType)){

                if(documentUpload.Attachments != null){
                   for(Attachment attachment : documentUpload.Attachments){
                       latestDateTime = attachment.CreatedDate;
                   }
                }
            }

            if(latestDateTime != null){
                docTypeToLatestCreatedDateMap.put(documentUploadType, latestDateTime);
            }
        }

        //populate options list
        List<SelectOption> options = new List<SelectOption>(); 

        for(DocumentUploadType__c docUploadType : DocumentUploadType__c.getAll().values()){

            String label;
            if(docTypeToLatestCreatedDateMap.containsKey(docUploadType.Picklist_API_Name__c)){
                label = docUploadType.Picklist_Label__c 
                    + ' (Last Uploaded on: ' 
                    + docTypeToLatestCreatedDateMap.get(docUploadType.Picklist_API_Name__c).format('MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss')
                    + ')';
            }else{
                label = docUploadType.Picklist_Label__c;
            }

            options.add(new SelectOption(docUploadType.Picklist_API_Name__c, label));
        }       

        return options; 
    }

    /**
     * @MethodName   : processUpload
     * @Purpose      : To create Document Upload record.
     *                 To update Case record.
     *                 To direct to next page.
     * @Parameters   : -
     * @Return       : Next page
     * @CreatedDate  : 17 Mar, 2018
     * @ModifiedDate : 23 Mar, 2018
     */
    public PageReference processUpload(){
        try{
            if(theRepair != null){

                String quoteType = docUpload.Quote_Type__c;

                docUpload = new Document_Uploads__c(Repair__c = theRepair.Id, 
                                                    Type__c = category);

                if(category == 'Audatex Vehicle Assessment'){
                    docUpload.Quote_Type__c = quoteType;
                }

                insert docUpload;

                String claimNo = theRepair.Claim_Number__c;

                //update appropriate field on case record
                /*theCase = (Case)theCase.Id.getSObjectType().newSObject(theCase.Id);
                theCase.put(caseFieldApiNameToPicklistApiNameMap.get(category), true);
                update theCase;*/

                PageReference returnPage;
                /*returnPage = new PageReference('/apex/EasyUploadAttachment?parentId=' 
                                               + docUpload.Id 
                                               + '&returnId=' 
                                               + theRepair.Id 
                                               + '&claimNo=' 
                                               + claimNo);*/

                returnPage = new PageReference('/apex/EasyUploadAttachment?parentId=' 
                                               + docUpload.Id 
                                               + '&returnId=' 
                                               + theRepair.Id 
                                               + '&claimNo=' 
                                               + claimNo 
                                               + '&repairId=' 
                                               + theRepair.Id 
                                               + '&fieldToUpdate=' 
                                               + repairFieldApiNameToPicklistApiNameMap.get(category)
                                               + '&docType=' 
                                               + category);

                returnPage.setRedirect(true);
                return returnPage;
            }
        } catch (Exception e){
            ApexPages.addMessages(e);
            System.debug(e.getLineNumber() + ' ' + e.getMessage());
            hasErrors = true;
        }
        return null;
    }
}

public class DocumentUploadAttachmentUtil {


    /*
     * @purpose : Find Document_Uploads__c object related attachment count and update total no of count to
     *            Document_Uploads__c.Number_of_Attachments__c
     *            Clasic means attachment object
     * @param   : attachmentList
     * @return  : -
    */
    public static void calculateAttachmentCountForClassic(List<Attachment> attachmentList){

        // Creating Set of ParentId of Attchment
        Set<ID> parentIdSet = findParentIdFromAttachment(attachmentList);
        calculateDocumentUploadAttachmentCount(parentIdSet, false, null);

    }

    /*
     * @purpose : Find Document_Uploads__c object related attachment count and update total no of count to
     *            Document_Uploads__c.Number_of_Attachments__c
     *            Lightning means ContentDocumentLink object
     * @param   : contentDocumentLinkList
     * @return  : -
    */
    public static void calculateAttachmentCountForLightning(List<ContentDocumentLink> contentDocumentLinkList){

        Set<ID> parentIdSet = findParentIdFromContentDocumentLink(contentDocumentLinkList);
        calculateDocumentUploadAttachmentCount(parentIdSet, false, null);

    }


    /*
     * @purpose : On delete, find Document_Uploads__c object related attachment count and update total no of count to
     *            Document_Uploads__c.Number_of_Attachments__c
     *            Lightning means ContentDocumentLink object
     * @param   : contentDocumentLinkList
     * @return  : -
    */
    public static void onDeleteCalAttachCountForLightning(List<ContentDocument> contentDocumentList){

        Set<Id> contentDocumentDeleteIdset = (new Map<Id,SObject>(contentDocumentList)).keySet();

        // Find ParentId whose Content document deleted
        List<ContentDocumentLink> contentDocumentLinkList = [SELECT Id, LinkedEntityId, Visibility, ContentDocumentId
                                                             FROM ContentDocumentLink
                                                             WHERE ContentDocumentId IN :contentDocumentDeleteIdset];

        Set<ID> parentIdSet = findParentIdFromContentDocumentLink(contentDocumentLinkList);


        calculateDocumentUploadAttachmentCount(parentIdSet, true, contentDocumentDeleteIdset);
    }


    /*
     * @purpose : On Undelete, find Document_Uploads__c object related attachment count and update total no of count to
     *            Document_Uploads__c.Number_of_Attachments__c
     *            Lightning means ContentDocumentLink object
     * @param   : contentDocumentLinkList
     * @return  : -
    */
    public static void onUnDeleteCalAttachCountForLightning(List<ContentDocument> contentDocumentList){

        Set<Id> contentDocumentUnDeleteIdset = (new Map<Id,SObject>(contentDocumentList)).keySet();

        // Find ParentId whose Content document unDeleted
        List<ContentDocumentLink> contentDocumentLinkList = [SELECT Id, LinkedEntityId, Visibility, ContentDocumentId
                                                             FROM ContentDocumentLink
                                                             WHERE ContentDocumentId IN :contentDocumentUnDeleteIdset];

        Set<ID> parentIdSet = findParentIdFromContentDocumentLink(contentDocumentLinkList);
        calculateDocumentUploadAttachmentCount(parentIdSet, false, null);
    }


    /*
     * @purpose : Calculate attachment and content document Records count which are related to Document upload object.
     * @param   : a) parentIdSet = Document upload record set.
     *            b) isFileDeleteForLightning =
     *            c) contentDocumentDeleteIdset
     * @return  : -
    */
    private static void calculateDocumentUploadAttachmentCount( Set<ID> parentIdSet,
                                                                boolean isFileDeleteForLightning,
                                                                Set<Id> contentDocumentDeleteIdset){

        if(!parentIdSet.isEmpty()){

            AggregateResult[] contentDocLinkAggregateList;

            if(isFileDeleteForLightning){

                contentDocLinkAggregateList = [SELECT COUNT(Id), LinkedEntityId
                                               FROM ContentDocumentLink
                                               WHERE LinkedEntityId IN :parentIdSet AND
                                                     ContentDocumentId NOT IN: contentDocumentDeleteIdset
                                               GROUP BY LinkedEntityId ];

            }else {

                contentDocLinkAggregateList = [SELECT COUNT(Id), LinkedEntityId
                                               FROM ContentDocumentLink
                                               WHERE LinkedEntityId IN :parentIdSet
                                               GROUP BY LinkedEntityId ];

            }


            AggregateResult[] attachmentAggregateList  = [SELECT COUNT(Id), ParentId
                                                          FROM Attachment
                                                          WHERE ParentId IN :parentIdSet
                                                          GROUP BY ParentId];

            Map<Id,Integer> docUploadIdToAttachmentCountMap = populateDocUploadIdToAttachmentCountMap( attachmentAggregateList,
                                                                                                       contentDocLinkAggregateList);

            updateAttachmentCountOnDocumentUpload(parentIdSet,docUploadIdToAttachmentCountMap);
        }
    }


    /*
    * @purpose  : Find parent Id whose attachment link to Document upload.
    * @param    : contentDocumentLinkList
    * @return   : set of attachment parent Id
    */
    private static Set<ID> findParentIdFromContentDocumentLink(List<ContentDocumentLink> contentDocumentLinkList){

        Set<ID> parentIdSet = new Set<ID>();

        if( contentDocumentLinkList != NULL ){

            for(ContentDocumentLink contentDocRec :contentDocumentLinkList){

                if(contentDocRec.LinkedEntityId.getSObjectType().getDescribe().getName() == 'Document_Uploads__c'){

                    parentIdSet.add(contentDocRec.LinkedEntityId);

                }
            }

        }
        return parentIdSet;
    }

    /*
     *@purpose  : set number of attchmnet on document upload
     *@param    : a)attachmentAggregateList
                  b)attachmentList
                  c)docUploadIdToTotalAttachmentCountMap
     *@return   : -
    */
    private static void updateAttachmentCountOnDocumentUpload( Set<Id> documentUploadSetId,
                                                               Map<Id,Integer> docUploadIdToAttachmentCountMap){

        List<Document_Uploads__c> documentUploadListToUpdate = new List<Document_Uploads__c>();
        for(Id documentUploadId: documentUploadSetId) {

            Integer attachmentCount = 0;

            if(docUploadIdToAttachmentCountMap.containsKey(documentUploadId))
                attachmentCount = docUploadIdToAttachmentCountMap.get(documentUploadId);

            documentUploadListToUpdate.add(new Document_Uploads__c( Id = documentUploadId,
                                                                    Number_of_Attachments__c = attachmentCount));
        }

        UPDATE documentUploadListToUpdate;
    }


    /*
     *@purpose  : Populate document upload record Id to attachment cnt.
     *@param    : a)attachmentAggregateList
                  b)contentDocumentLinkAggregateList
     *@return   : Map
    */
    private Static Map<Id,Integer> populateDocUploadIdToAttachmentCountMap( AggregateResult[] attachmentAggregateList,
                                                                            AggregateResult[] contentDocumentLinkAggregateList){

        Map<Id,Integer> docUploadIdToTotalAttachmentCountMap = new  Map<Id,Integer>();

        // Count "Document Upload" related attachment count.
        for(AggregateResult attachmentAggrRec :attachmentAggregateList){

            docUploadIdToTotalAttachmentCountMap.put( ((Id)attachmentAggrRec.get('ParentId')),
                                                     (INTEGER)attachmentAggrRec.get('expr0'));

        }

        // Count "Document Upload" related ContentDocument count.
        for(AggregateResult attachmentAggrRec :contentDocumentLinkAggregateList){

            Id linkedEntityId = (Id)attachmentAggrRec.get('LinkedEntityId');
            if(docUploadIdToTotalAttachmentCountMap.containsKey(linkedEntityId)){
                Integer attachmentCnt = docUploadIdToTotalAttachmentCountMap.get(linkedEntityId) + (INTEGER)attachmentAggrRec.get('expr0');
                docUploadIdToTotalAttachmentCountMap.put(linkedEntityId, attachmentCnt);
            }
            else{

                docUploadIdToTotalAttachmentCountMap.put(linkedEntityId, (INTEGER)attachmentAggrRec.get('expr0'));
            }

        }

        return docUploadIdToTotalAttachmentCountMap;
    }


    /*
     * @purpose : get the set of parent from attachment List whose object type is Document_Uploads__c
     * @param   : attachmentList
     * @return  : parentIdSet
     */
   private static Set<ID> findParentIdFromAttachment(List<Attachment> attachmentList){

       Set<ID> parentIdSet = new Set<ID>();
       if(attachmentList != NULL ){
           for(Attachment attachment :attachmentList){

               if(attachment.parentId.getSObjectType().getDescribe().getName() == 'Document_Uploads__c'){
                   parentIdSet.add(attachment.parentId);
               }
           }
       }
       return parentIdSet;
   }

}

            System.assertEquals(0, testDocument.Number_of_Attachments__c); 
        Test.stopTest();
    }

   /*
    * @purpose: Perform Data Testing For Lightning File Uploading
    */
    public static testMethod void performDataTestingForLightning(){
        Repair__c testRep = [SELECT Id FROM Repair__c LIMIT 1];          

        Document_Uploads__c testDocument = [SELECT Id,Repair__c,Number_of_Attachments__c,Type__c 
                                            FROM Document_Uploads__c
                                            WHERE Repair__c =: testRep.id];
        //Added by Olumide@AdvanceNet
        //Purpose: To select from EmailSettings 
        EmailSMSSettings__c emailSettings = [Select Name,emailMsg__c,smsMsg__c,To_Email__c, Cc_Email__c from EmailSMSSettings__c Where Name = 'Quote' Limit 1];
        //-----------End Add----------------------------    


        Test.startTest();
            //Insert ContentDocument data
            ContentVersion testContentVersion = new ContentVersion();
            testContentVersion.title = 'test content trigger';      
            testContentVersion.PathOnClient ='test';           
            testContentVersion.VersionData = Blob.valueOf('This is for testing');   
            testContentVersion.IsMajorVersion = true;
            insert testContentVersion;

            ContentVersion contentVersionData = [SELECT id, ContentDocumentId FROM ContentVersion where Id = :testContentVersion.Id];  

            ContentDocumentLink contentDocumentLink = new ContentDocumentLink();
            contentDocumentLink.LinkedEntityId = testDocument.id;
            contentDocumentLink.contentdocumentid = contentVersionData.contentdocumentid;    
            contentDocumentLink.shareType = 'I';
            insert contentDocumentLink;

            testDocument = [SELECT Id, Number_of_Attachments__c
                            FROM Document_Uploads__c
                            LIMIT 1];

            // Asserting Data for File insertion
            System.assertEquals(7, testDocument.Number_of_Attachments__c);

            contentDocumentLink = [SELECT Id,contentdocumentid
                                   FROM contentDocumentLink
                                   WHERE LinkedEntityId =: testDocument.id
                                   LIMIT 1]; 
            ContentDocument contentDocument = [SELECT ID 
                                               FROM ContentDocument
                                               WHERE Id =:contentDocumentLink.contentdocumentid];

            delete contentDocument;

            testDocument = [SELECT Id, Number_of_Attachments__c
                            FROM Document_Uploads__c
                            LIMIT 1];

            // Asserting Data for File deletion
            System.assertEquals(6, testDocument.Number_of_Attachments__c);

            undelete contentDocument;

            testDocument = [SELECT Id, Number_of_Attachments__c
                            FROM Document_Uploads__c
                            LIMIT 1];

            // Asserting Data for File undeletion
            System.assertEquals(7, testDocument.Number_of_Attachments__c);

            List<Attachment> attachmentList = [SELECT Id
                                               FROM Attachment];
            delete attachmentList;

            List<contentDocument> contentDocumentList = [SELECT Id
                                                         FROM contentDocument];

            delete contentDocumentList;

            testDocument = [SELECT Id, Number_of_Attachments__c
                            FROM Document_Uploads__c
                            LIMIT 1];

            // Asserting Data for all file deletion in both classic and lightning 
            System.assertEquals(0, testDocument.Number_of_Attachments__c); 
        Test.stopTest();
    }
}

global with sharing class EinsteinVisionController {

    public static String VISION_API = 'https://api.metamind.io/v1/vision';
    private static final Dreamhouse_Settings__c settings = Dreamhouse_Settings__c.getOrgDefaults();

    public class Prediction {
        @AuraEnabled
        public String label {get;set;}
        @AuraEnabled
        public Double probability {get;set;}
    }

    // You can upload the 'einstein_platform.pem' into your Salesforce org as 'File' sObject and read it as below
    private static String getAccessToken() {
        if (settings == null || String.isEmpty(settings.Einstein_Vision_Email__c)) {
            throw new AuraHandledException('Cannot create Einstein Vision token: "Einstein Vision Email" not defined in Custom Settings');
        }
        ContentVersion base64Content;
        try {
            base64Content = [SELECT Title, VersionData FROM ContentVersion where Title='einstein_platform' LIMIT 1];
        } catch (Exception e) {
            throw new AuraHandledException('Cannot create Einstein Vision token: einstein_platform.pem file not found');    
        }
        String keyContents = base64Content.VersionData.tostring();
        keyContents = keyContents.replace('-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----', '');
        keyContents = keyContents.replace('-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----', '');
        keyContents = keyContents.replace('\n', '');

        // Get a new token
        JWT jwt = new JWT('RS256');
        jwt.pkcs8 = keyContents; // Comment this if you are using jwt.cert
        jwt.iss = 'developer.force.com';
        jwt.sub = settings.Einstein_Vision_Email__c;
        jwt.aud = 'https://api.metamind.io/v1/oauth2/token';
        jwt.exp = '3600';
        String access_token;
        if (!Test.isRunningTest()) {
            access_token = JWTBearerFlow.getAccessToken('https://api.metamind.io/v1/oauth2/token', jwt);
        }
        return access_token;    
    }

    @AuraEnabled
    public static List<Prediction> predict(String fileName, String content, String modelId) {
        if (String.isBlank(modelId)) {
            return EinsteinVisionController.predictDemo(fileName, content);    
        } else {
            return EinsteinVisionController.predictReal(fileName, content, modelId);            
        }
    }

    @AuraEnabled
    public static List<Prediction> predictReal(String fileName, String content, String modelId) {
        String access_token;
        try {
            access_token = EinsteinVisionController.getAccessToken();
        } catch (Exception e) {
            throw new AuraHandledException('Cannot create Einstein Vision token. Did you upload the einstein_platform.pem file and specify the Einstein Vision email address to use in Custom Settings?');          
        }
        List<Prediction> predictions = EinsteinVisionController.predictInternal(content, access_token, modelId, true);
        return predictions;
    }

    @AuraEnabled
    public static List<Prediction> predictDemo(String fileName, String content) {
        Integer pos = fileName.indexOf('_');
        String label;
        if (pos > 0) {
            // if the filename is like "victorian_01.jpg", we return "victorian"
            label = fileName.substring(0, pos);    
        } else {
            // else we return a category selected randomly
            List<String> categories = new List<String>{'Victorian', 'Colonial', 'Contemporary'};
            Integer index = Math.mod(Math.round(Math.random()*1000), 3);
            label = categories[index];    
        }
        List<Prediction> predictions = new List<Prediction>();
        Prediction prediction = new Prediction();
        prediction.label = label;    
        prediction.probability = 1;
        predictions.add(prediction);
        return predictions;
    }

    @AuraEnabled
    public static String getDatasets() {
        String access_token = EinsteinVisionController.getAccessToken();
        HttpRequest req = new HttpRequest();
        req.setMethod('GET');    
        req.setHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + access_token);
        req.setHeader('Cache-Control', 'no-cache');
        req.setEndpoint(VISION_API + '/datasets');
        try {
            Http http = new Http();
            if (!Test.isRunningTest()) {
                HTTPResponse res = http.send(req);
                return res.getBody();
            } else {
                return '';
            }
        } catch(Exception ex){
            return '{"error": "' + ex.getMessage() + '"}';
        }
    }

    @AuraEnabled
    public static String getModelsByDataset(Integer datasetId) {
        String accessToken = EinsteinVisionController.getAccessToken();
        HttpRequest req = new HttpRequest();
        req.setMethod('GET');    
        String endpoint = VISION_API + '/datasets/' + datasetId + '/models';
        req.setEndpoint(endpoint);
        req.setHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + accessToken);
        req.setHeader('Cache-Control', 'no-cache');
        try {
            Http http = new Http();
            if (!Test.isRunningTest()) {
                HTTPResponse res = http.send(req);
                return res.getBody();
            } else {
                return null;
            }
        } catch(Exception ex){
            return '{"error": "' + ex.getMessage() + '"}';
        }
    }

    @AuraEnabled
    public static String deleteDataset(Integer datasetId) {
        String accessToken = EinsteinVisionController.getAccessToken();
        String endpoint = VISION_API + '/datasets/' + datasetId;
        HttpRequest req = new HttpRequest();
        req.setMethod('DELETE');    
        req.setEndpoint(endpoint);
        req.setHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + accessToken);
        req.setHeader('Cache-Control', 'no-cache');
        try {
            Http http = new Http();
            if (!Test.isRunningTest()) {
                HTTPResponse res = http.send(req);
                return res.getBody();
            } else {
                return null;
            }
        } catch(Exception ex){
            return '{"error": "' + ex.getMessage() + '"}';
        }
    }

    @AuraEnabled
    public static String createDataset(String pathToZip) {
        System.debug(pathToZip);
        String accessToken = EinsteinVisionController.getAccessToken();
        String contentType = HttpFormBuilder.GetContentType();
        String form64 = '';
        form64 += HttpFormBuilder.WriteBoundary();
        form64 += HttpFormBuilder.WriteBodyParameter('path', pathToZip);
        form64 += HttpFormBuilder.WriteBoundary(HttpFormBuilder.EndingType.CrLf);
        Blob formBlob = EncodingUtil.base64Decode(form64);
        String contentLength = string.valueOf(formBlob.size());
        HttpRequest req = new HttpRequest();
        req.setBodyAsBlob(formBlob);
        req.setMethod('POST');    
        req.setEndpoint(VISION_API + '/datasets/upload');
        req.setHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + accessToken);
        req.setHeader('Connection', 'keep-alive');
        req.setHeader('Content-Length', contentLength);
        req.setHeader('Content-Type', contentType);

        try {
            Http http = new Http();
            if (!Test.isRunningTest()) {
                HTTPResponse res = http.send(req);
                return res.getBody();
            } else {
                return null;
            }
        } catch(Exception ex){
            return '{"error": "' + ex.getMessage() + '"}';
        }
    }

    @AuraEnabled
    public static String trainModel(String modelName, Integer datasetId) {
        String accessToken = EinsteinVisionController.getAccessToken();
        string contentType = HttpFormBuilder.GetContentType();
        string form64 = '';
        form64 += HttpFormBuilder.WriteBoundary();
        form64 += HttpFormBuilder.WriteBodyParameter('name', modelName);
        form64 += HttpFormBuilder.WriteBoundary();
        form64 += HttpFormBuilder.WriteBodyParameter('datasetId', '' + datasetId);
        form64 += HttpFormBuilder.WriteBoundary(HttpFormBuilder.EndingType.CrLf);
        blob formBlob = EncodingUtil.base64Decode(form64);
        string contentLength = string.valueOf(formBlob.size());
        HttpRequest req = new HttpRequest();
        req.setBodyAsBlob(formBlob);
        req.setMethod('POST');    
        req.setEndpoint(VISION_API + '/train');
        req.setHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + accessToken);
        req.setHeader('Connection', 'keep-alive');
        req.setHeader('Content-Length', contentLength);
        req.setHeader('Content-Type', contentType);
        req.setHeader('Cache-Control', 'no-cache');
        req.setTimeout(120000);

        try {
            Http http = new Http();
            if (!Test.isRunningTest()) {
                HTTPResponse res = http.send(req);
                return res.getBody();
            } else {
                return null;
            }
        } catch(Exception ex){
            return '{"error": "' + ex.getMessage() + '"}';
        }
    }

    private static List<Prediction> predictInternal(String sample, String access_token, String model, boolean isBase64) {
        string contentType = HttpFormBuilder.GetContentType();
        //  Compose the form
        string form64 = '';

        form64 += HttpFormBuilder.WriteBoundary();
        form64 += HttpFormBuilder.WriteBodyParameter('modelId', EncodingUtil.urlEncode(model, 'UTF-8'));
        form64 += HttpFormBuilder.WriteBoundary();
        if(isBase64) {
            form64 += HttpFormBuilder.WriteBodyParameter('sampleBase64Content', sample);
        } else {
            form64 += HttpFormBuilder.WriteBodyParameter('sampleLocation', sample);
        }
        form64 += HttpFormBuilder.WriteBoundary(HttpFormBuilder.EndingType.CrLf);

        blob formBlob = EncodingUtil.base64Decode(form64);
        string contentLength = string.valueOf(formBlob.size());
        //  Compose the http request
        HttpRequest httpRequest = new HttpRequest();

        httpRequest.setBodyAsBlob(formBlob);
        httpRequest.setHeader('Connection', 'keep-alive');
        httpRequest.setHeader('Content-Length', contentLength);
        httpRequest.setHeader('Content-Type', contentType);
        httpRequest.setMethod('POST');
        httpRequest.setTimeout(120000);
        httpRequest.setHeader('Authorization','Bearer ' + access_token);
        httpRequest.setEndpoint(VISION_API + '/predict');

        Http http = new Http();
        List<Prediction> predictions = new List<Prediction>();
        if (!Test.isRunningTest()) {
            try {
                HTTPResponse res = http.send(httpRequest);
                if (res.getStatusCode() == 200) {
                    System.JSONParser parser = System.JSON.createParser(res.getBody());
                    while (parser.nextToken() != null) {
                        if ((parser.getCurrentToken() == JSONToken.FIELD_NAME) && (parser.getText() == 'probabilities')) {
                            parser.nextToken();
                            if (parser.getCurrentToken() == JSONToken.START_ARRAY) {
                                while (parser.nextToken() != null) {
                                    // Advance to the start object marker to
                                    //  find next probability object.
                                    if (parser.getCurrentToken() == JSONToken.START_OBJECT) {
                                        // Read entire probability object
                                        Prediction probability = (Prediction)parser.readValueAs(Prediction.class);
                                        predictions.add(probability);
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                            break;
                        }
                    }
                }
            } catch(System.CalloutException e) {
                System.debug('ERROR:' + e);
            }
        }
        return(predictions);
    }

}

@RestResource(urlMapping='/Emails/*')
global with sharing class EmailRESTWebservice {

    global class EmailReqModel {
        public String Id { get; set; }
        public String Cursor { get; set; }
    }

    global class EmailReqResponseModel {  
        //public String SFActivityUniqueId { get; set; }         
        public String MethodName { get; set; }
        public String WasSuccessful { get; set; }
        public String ErrorMessage { get; set; }
        public List<EmailDetail> EmailTrail { get; set; }
        public String NextCursor { get; set; }
    }

    global class EmailDetail {
        public String EmailId { get; set; }
        public String Subject { get; set; }
        public String TextBody { get; set; }
        public String FromAddress { get; set; }
        public String ToAddress { get; set; }
        public Datetime MessageDate { get; set; }
    }

    private static final Integer PAGE_SIZE = 20;

    @HttpPost
    global static EmailReqResponseModel getEmails(EmailReqModel EmailReq) {
        EmailReqResponseModel response = new EmailReqResponseModel();
        response.MethodName = 'getEmails';
        response.EmailTrail = new List<EmailDetail>();

        try {
            if (String.isBlank(EmailReq.Id)) {
                throw new CustomException('Id is required');
            }

            Id recordId = Id.valueOf(EmailReq.Id);

            Integer offset = 0;
            if (String.isNotBlank(EmailReq.Cursor)) {
                offset = Integer.valueOf(EmailReq.Cursor);
            }

            String queryField = recordId.getSObjectType() == Case.SObjectType ? 'ParentId' : 'RelatedToId';

            String queryStr = 'SELECT Id, Subject, TextBody, FromAddress, ToAddress, MessageDate ' +
                              'FROM EmailMessage ' +
                              'WHERE ' + queryField + ' = :recordId ' +
                              'ORDER BY MessageDate DESC ' +
                              'LIMIT :PAGE_SIZE ' +
                              'OFFSET :offset';

            List<EmailMessage> emails = Database.query(queryStr);

            for (EmailMessage email : emails) {
                EmailDetail detail = new EmailDetail();
                detail.EmailId = email.Id;
                detail.Subject = email.Subject;
                detail.TextBody = email.TextBody;
                detail.FromAddress = email.FromAddress;
                detail.ToAddress = email.ToAddress;
                detail.MessageDate = email.MessageDate;
                response.EmailTrail.add(detail);
            }

            if (emails.size() == PAGE_SIZE) {
                response.NextCursor = String.valueOf(offset + PAGE_SIZE);
            }

            //response.SFActivityUniqueId = recordId;
            response.WasSuccessful = 'true';
        } catch (Exception e) {
            response.WasSuccessful = 'false';
            response.ErrorMessage = 'Error fetching emails: ' + e.getMessage();
        }

        return response;
    }

    public class CustomException extends Exception {}
}
