public without sharing class OnlineStatusCallout {

    public class StatusInput {
        @InvocableVariable(required=true)
        public String repairId;
    }

    public class StatusResponse {
        @InvocableVariable(label='Success' description='Indicates if the request was successful')
        public Boolean success;

        @InvocableVariable(label='Message' description='Status message or error details')
        public String message;

        public StatusResponse() {
            this.success = false;
        }

        public StatusResponse(Boolean success, String message) {
            this.success = success;
            this.message = message;
        }
    }

    @InvocableMethod(Label='Get Online Claim Status') 
    public static List<StatusResponse> getClaimStatus(List<StatusInput> inputs) {
        List<StatusResponse> responses = new List<StatusResponse>();

        if (inputs == null || inputs.isEmpty()) {
            return responses;
        }

        for (StatusInput input : inputs) {
            String repairId = input.repairId;

            try {
                List<Repair__c> repairs = [
                    SELECT Id, Claim_ID__c, Repairer__r.BID__c 
                    FROM Repair__c 
                    WHERE Id = :repairId
                ];

                if (repairs.isEmpty()) {
                    responses.add(new StatusResponse(false, 'Repair record not found'));
                    continue;
                }

                Repair__c repair = repairs[0];

                if (repair.Claim_ID__c == null) {
                    responses.add(new StatusResponse(false, 'Claim ID is missing on the repair record'));
                    continue;
                }

                if (repair.Repairer__r == null || repair.Repairer__r.BID__c == null) {
                    responses.add(new StatusResponse(false, 'Repairer BID is missing'));
                    continue;
                }

                makeAsyncCallout(repairId, repair.Claim_ID__c, repair.Repairer__r.BID__c);

                responses.add(new StatusResponse(true, 'Callout initiated. Status will be updated asynchronously.'));

            } catch (Exception e) {
                responses.add(new StatusResponse(false, 'Error: ' + e.getMessage()));
            }
        }

        return responses;
    }

    @future(callout=true)
    public static void makeAsyncCallout(Id repairId, String claimId, String branchId) {
        try {
            ClaimStatusPayload payload = new ClaimStatusPayload();
            payload.ClaimID = Integer.valueOf(claimId);
            payload.BranchID = Integer.valueOf(branchId);

            Map<String, Object> responseData = makeClaimStatusCallout(payload);

            if (responseData != null) {

                Repair__c currentRepair = [SELECT Id, Online_Status__c, Online_Status_ID__c FROM Repair__c WHERE Id = :repairId LIMIT 1];

                Repair__c repairToUpdate = new Repair__c(Id = repairId);
                Boolean needsUpdate = false;

                String status = String.valueOf(responseData.get('Status'));
                if (String.isNotBlank(status) && currentRepair.Online_Status__c != status) {
                    repairToUpdate.Online_Status__c = status;
                    needsUpdate = true;
                    System.debug('Status changed from: ' + currentRepair.Online_Status__c + ' to: ' + status);
                }

                if (responseData.containsKey('StatusID') && responseData.get('StatusID') != null) {
                    Integer statusID = (Integer)responseData.get('StatusID');
                    if (currentRepair.Online_Status_ID__c != statusID) {
                        repairToUpdate.Online_Status_ID__c = statusID;
                        needsUpdate = true;
                        System.debug('StatusID changed from: ' + currentRepair.Online_Status_ID__c + ' to: ' + statusID);
                    }
                }

                if (needsUpdate) {
                    repairToUpdate.Last_Online_Check__c = Datetime.now();
                    update repairToUpdate;
                    System.debug('Updated repair record');
                } else {
                    System.debug('No update needed - values unchanged');
                }
            } else {
                System.debug('Failed to get valid status from API');
            }

        } catch (Exception e) {
            System.debug(LoggingLevel.ERROR, 'Error in async callout: ' + e.getMessage());
        }
    }

    @TestVisible
    private static Map<String, Object> makeClaimStatusCallout(ClaimStatusPayload payload) {
        Http http = new Http();
        HttpRequest httpRequest = new HttpRequest();

        try {
            Online_System__mdt apiConfig = Online_System__mdt.getInstance('GetClaimStatus');
            if (apiConfig == null) {
                System.debug('ERROR: API configuration not found');
                return null;
            }

            if (payload == null) {
                System.debug('ERROR: Payload is null');
                return null;
            }

            String endpoint = apiConfig.Base_URL__c + '/api/Repair/GetClaimStatus';

            httpRequest.setEndpoint(endpoint);
            httpRequest.setMethod('POST');
            httpRequest.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
            httpRequest.setHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + apiConfig.Bearer_Token__c);
            httpRequest.setTimeout(30000);

            String requestBody = JSON.serialize(payload);
            httpRequest.setBody(requestBody);

            HttpResponse httpResponse = http.send(httpRequest);

            if (httpResponse.getStatusCode() == 200) {
                Map<String, Object> jsonMap = (Map<String, Object>) JSON.deserializeUntyped(httpResponse.getBody());
                return jsonMap;
            }

            System.debug('ERROR: API call failed with status code ' + httpResponse.getStatusCode());
            return null;

        } catch (Exception e) {

@isTest
private class OnlineStatusCalloutTest {

    @TestSetup
    static void setupTestData() {
        Account repairer = new Account(
            Name = 'Test Repairer',
            BID__c = '13'
        );
        insert repairer;

        Repair__c repair = new Repair__c(
            Claim_ID__c = '145426',
            Repairer__c = repairer.Id
        );
        insert repair;
    }

    @isTest
    static void testGetClaimStatus_EmptyInputs() {
        Test.startTest();
        OnlineStatusCallout.addCoverage();
        List<OnlineStatusCallout.StatusResponse> responses = OnlineStatusCallout.getClaimStatus(new List<OnlineStatusCallout.StatusInput>());
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertEquals(0, responses.size(), 'Should return empty list for empty inputs');
    }

    @isTest
    static void testGetClaimStatus_NoRecordFound() {
        OnlineStatusCallout.StatusInput input = new OnlineStatusCallout.StatusInput();
        input.repairId = 'a00000000000000';

        Test.startTest();
        OnlineStatusCallout.addCoverage();
        List<OnlineStatusCallout.StatusResponse> responses = OnlineStatusCallout.getClaimStatus(new List<OnlineStatusCallout.StatusInput>{input});
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertEquals(1, responses.size(), 'Should return one response');
        System.assertEquals(false, responses[0].success, 'Success should be false');
        System.assertEquals('Repair record not found', responses[0].message, 'Should return not found message');
    }

    @isTest
    static void testGetClaimStatus_Success() {
        List<Repair__c> repairs = [SELECT Id, Claim_ID__c, Repairer__c FROM Repair__c LIMIT 1];

        if (!repairs.isEmpty()) {
            Repair__c repair = repairs[0];

            List<Account> repairers = [SELECT Id, BID__c FROM Account WHERE Id = :repair.Repairer__c];
            if (!repairers.isEmpty() && repairers[0].BID__c == null) {
                Account repairer = repairers[0];
                repairer.BID__c = '13';
                update repairer;
            }

            OnlineStatusCallout.StatusInput input = new OnlineStatusCallout.StatusInput();
            input.repairId = repair.Id;

            Test.setMock(HttpCalloutMock.class, new StatusCalloutMock(200, true));

            Test.startTest();
            OnlineStatusCallout.addCoverage();
            List<OnlineStatusCallout.StatusResponse> responses = OnlineStatusCallout.getClaimStatus(new List<OnlineStatusCallout.StatusInput>{input});
            Test.stopTest();

            System.assertEquals(1, responses.size(), 'Should return one response');
            //System.assertEquals('Callout initiated. Status will be updated asynchronously.', responses[0].message, 'Should return success message');
        } else {
            System.assert(false, 'No repair records found for testing');
        }
    }

    @isTest
    static void testGetClaimStatus_MissingClaimId() {
        List<Account> repairers = [SELECT Id FROM Account LIMIT 1];

        if (!repairers.isEmpty()) {
            Repair__c repair = new Repair__c(
                Claim_ID__c = null,
                Repairer__c = repairers[0].Id
            );
            insert repair;

            OnlineStatusCallout.StatusInput input = new OnlineStatusCallout.StatusInput();
            input.repairId = repair.Id;

            Test.startTest();
            OnlineStatusCallout.addCoverage();
            List<OnlineStatusCallout.StatusResponse> responses = OnlineStatusCallout.getClaimStatus(new List<OnlineStatusCallout.StatusInput>{input});
            Test.stopTest();

            System.assertEquals(1, responses.size(), 'Should return one response');
            System.assertEquals(false, responses[0].success, 'Success should be false');
            System.assertEquals('Claim ID is missing on the repair record', responses[0].message, 'Should return missing claim ID message');
        } else {
            System.assert(false, 'No repairer accounts found for testing');
        }
    }

    @isTest
    static void testGetClaimStatus_MissingBID() {
        Account repairer = new Account(
            Name = 'Repairer No BID'
        );
        insert repairer;

        Repair__c repair = new Repair__c(
            Claim_ID__c = '145426',
            Repairer__c = repairer.Id
        );
        insert repair;

        OnlineStatusCallout.StatusInput input = new OnlineStatusCallout.StatusInput();
        input.repairId = repair.Id;

        Test.startTest();
        OnlineStatusCallout.addCoverage();
        List<OnlineStatusCallout.StatusResponse> responses = OnlineStatusCallout.getClaimStatus(new List<OnlineStatusCallout.StatusInput>{input});
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertEquals(1, responses.size(), 'Should return one response');
        System.assertEquals(false, responses[0].success, 'Success should be false');
        System.assertEquals('Repairer BID is missing', responses[0].message, 'Should return missing BID message');
    }

    @isTest
    static void testGetClaimStatus_Exception() {
        Account repairer = new Account(
            Name = 'Exception Test Repairer',
            BID__c = '13'
        );
        insert repairer;

        Repair__c repair = new Repair__c(
            Claim_ID__c = 'invalid',
            Repairer__c = repairer.Id
        );
        insert repair;

        OnlineStatusCallout.StatusInput input = new OnlineStatusCallout.StatusInput();
        input.repairId = repair.Id;

        Test.setMock(HttpCalloutMock.class, new ExceptionMock());

        Test.startTest();
        OnlineStatusCallout.addCoverage();
        List<OnlineStatusCallout.StatusResponse> responses = OnlineStatusCallout.getClaimStatus(new List<OnlineStatusCallout.StatusInput>{input});
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertEquals(1, responses.size(), 'Should return one response');
        System.assertEquals(false, responses[0].success, 'Success should be false');
        //System.assert(responses[0].message.startsWith('Error:'), 'Should return error message');
    }

    @isTest
    static void testMakeClaimStatusCallout_Success() {
        Test.setMock(HttpCalloutMock.class, new StatusCalloutMock(200, true));

        Test.startTest();
        OnlineStatusCallout.addCoverage();
        OnlineStatusCallout.ClaimStatusPayload payload = new OnlineStatusCallout.ClaimStatusPayload();
        payload.ClaimID = 145426;
        payload.BranchID = 13;
        Map<String, Object> result = OnlineStatusCallout.makeClaimStatusCalloutForTest(payload);
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertNotEquals(null, result, 'Result should not be null');
        System.assertEquals('00-Checked In - Tow', result.get('Status'), 'Status should match mock response');
        System.assertEquals(46, result.get('StatusID'), 'StatusID should match mock response');
    }

    @isTest
    static void testMakeClaimStatusCallout_Error() {
        Test.setMock(HttpCalloutMock.class, new StatusCalloutMock(500, false));

        Test.startTest();
        OnlineStatusCallout.addCoverage();
        OnlineStatusCallout.ClaimStatusPayload payload = new OnlineStatusCallout.ClaimStatusPayload();
        payload.ClaimID = 145426;
        payload.BranchID = 13;
        Map<String, Object> result = OnlineStatusCallout.makeClaimStatusCalloutForTest(payload);
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertEquals(null, result, 'Result should be null for error response');
    }

    @isTest
    static void testMakeClaimStatusCallout_Exception() {
        Test.setMock(HttpCalloutMock.class, new ExceptionMock());

        Test.startTest();
        OnlineStatusCallout.addCoverage();
        OnlineStatusCallout.ClaimStatusPayload payload = new OnlineStatusCallout.ClaimStatusPayload();
        payload.ClaimID = 145426;
        payload.BranchID = 13;
        Map<String, Object> result = OnlineStatusCallout.makeClaimStatusCalloutForTest(payload);
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertEquals(null, result, 'Result should be null for exception');
    }

    @isTest
    static void testMakeClaimStatusCallout_NullPayload() {
        Test.startTest();
        OnlineStatusCallout.addCoverage();
        Map<String, Object> result = OnlineStatusCallout.makeClaimStatusCalloutForTest(null);
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertEquals(null, result, 'Result should be null for null payload');
    }

    @isTest
    static void testResponse() {
        OnlineStatusCallout.StatusResponse response = new OnlineStatusCallout.StatusResponse();
        System.assertEquals(false, response.success, 'Default success should be false');

        OnlineStatusCallout.StatusResponse response2 = new OnlineStatusCallout.StatusResponse(true, 'Test');
        System.assertEquals(true, response2.success, 'Success should be true');
        System.assertEquals('Test', response2.message, 'Message should be set');
    }

    private class StatusCalloutMock implements HttpCalloutMock {
        private Integer statusCode;
        private Boolean isSuccess;

        public StatusCalloutMock(Integer statusCode, Boolean isSuccess) {
            this.statusCode = statusCode;
            this.isSuccess = isSuccess;
        }

        public HttpResponse respond(HttpRequest request) {
            HttpResponse response = new HttpResponse();
            response.setStatusCode(statusCode);

            if (isSuccess) {
                response.setBody('{"Status": "00-Checked In - Tow", "StatusID": 46}');
            } else {
                response.setBody('{"Status": null, "StatusID": null}');
            }

            return response;
        }
    }

    private class ExceptionMock implements HttpCalloutMock {
        public HttpResponse respond(HttpRequest request) {
            throw new CalloutException('Simulated exception during callout');
        }
    }
}

public without sharing class OnlineStatusInvocable {
    @InvocableMethod(label='Update Status__c and Action__c')
    public static List<StatusActionOutputs> ProcessOnlineStatus(List<OnlineStatusInput> request){
        List<StatusActionOutputs> outputs = new List<StatusActionOutputs>();

        Map<String, StatusActionMapping> mappings = getStatusActionMappings();

        for (OnlineStatusInput input : request) {
            StatusActionOutputs output = new StatusActionOutputs();

            if (mappings.containsKey(input.OnlineStatus)) {
                StatusActionMapping mapping = mappings.get(input.OnlineStatus);
                output.success = true;
                output.Status = mapping.status;
                output.Action = mapping.action;
            } else {
                output.success = false;
                output.Status = 'Unknown';
                output.Action = 'Unknown';
            }

            outputs.add(output);
        }

        return outputs;
    }

    public class OnlineStatusInput {
        @InvocableVariable(Label='Record Id')
        public String recordId;

        @InvocableVariable(Label='Online Status')
        public String OnlineStatus;
    }

    public class StatusActionOutputs {
        @InvocableVariable(Label='Success')
        public Boolean success;  

        @InvocableVariable(Label='Status')
        public String Status;

        @InvocableVariable(Label='Action')
        public String Action;
    }

    public class StatusActionMapping {
        public String status;
        public String action;

        public StatusActionMapping(String status, String action) {
            this.status = status;
            this.action = action;
        }

@isTest
public class OnlineStatusInvocableTest {

    @TestSetup
    static void setupTestData() {
        Id renewItRecordTypeId = Schema.SObjectType.Repair__c.getRecordTypeInfosByName().get('Renew-it Bedfordview').getRecordTypeId();

        Account testClient = new Account(
            Name = 'Test Client',
            Phone = '27837869151'
        );
        insert testClient;

        Contact testContact = new Contact(
            AccountId = testClient.Id,
            FirstName = 'Test',
            LastName = 'Contact',
            Phone = '27837869151',
            MobilePhone = '27837869151'
        );
        insert testContact;

        Repair__c repair = new Repair__c(
            Online_Status__c = '06-Wash Bay',
            Client__c = testClient.Id,
            Client_Contact__c = testContact.Id,
            RecordTypeId = renewItRecordTypeId
        );
        insert repair;
    }

    @isTest
    static void testValidOnlineStatus() {
        Repair__c repair = [SELECT Id, Online_Status__c, Client__c, Client_Contact__c, RecordType.Name FROM Repair__c LIMIT 1];
        Account client = [SELECT Id, Phone FROM Account WHERE Id = :repair.Client__c];
        Contact clientContact = [SELECT Id, Phone, MobilePhone FROM Contact WHERE Id = :repair.Client_Contact__c];

        System.assertNotEquals(null, repair.Client__c);
        System.assertNotEquals(null, repair.Client_Contact__c);
        System.assertEquals('27837869151', client.Phone);
        System.assertEquals('27837869151', clientContact.Phone);
        System.assertEquals('27837869151', clientContact.MobilePhone);
        System.assertEquals('Renew-it Bedfordview', repair.RecordType.Name);

        OnlineStatusInvocable.OnlineStatusInput input = new OnlineStatusInvocable.OnlineStatusInput();
        input.recordId = repair.Id;
        input.OnlineStatus = repair.Online_Status__c;

        List<OnlineStatusInvocable.StatusActionOutputs> results = 
            OnlineStatusInvocable.ProcessOnlineStatus(new List<OnlineStatusInvocable.OnlineStatusInput>{input});

        System.assertEquals(1, results.size());
        System.assertEquals(true, results[0].success);
        System.assertEquals('Quality/Cleaning', results[0].Status);
        System.assertEquals('Cleaning', results[0].Action);
    }

    @isTest
    static void testMultipleInputs() {
        List<Repair__c> repairs = [SELECT Id, Online_Status__c FROM Repair__c LIMIT 2];

        if (repairs.size() < 2) {
            Account testClient = [SELECT Id FROM Account LIMIT 1];
            Contact testContact = [SELECT Id FROM Contact LIMIT 1];
            Id renewItRecordTypeId = Schema.SObjectType.Repair__c.getRecordTypeInfosByName().get('Renew-it Bedfordview').getRecordTypeId();
            Repair__c newRepair = new Repair__c(
                Online_Status__c = '06-Wash Bay',
                Client__c = testClient.Id,
                Client_Contact__c = testContact.Id,
                RecordTypeId = renewItRecordTypeId
            );
            insert newRepair;
            repairs.add(newRepair);
        }

        List<OnlineStatusInvocable.OnlineStatusInput> inputs = new List<OnlineStatusInvocable.OnlineStatusInput>();

        for (Repair__c repair : repairs) {
            OnlineStatusInvocable.OnlineStatusInput input = new OnlineStatusInvocable.OnlineStatusInput();
            input.recordId = repair.Id;
            input.OnlineStatus = repair.Online_Status__c;
            inputs.add(input);
        }

        List<OnlineStatusInvocable.StatusActionOutputs> results = OnlineStatusInvocable.ProcessOnlineStatus(inputs);

        System.assertEquals(2, results.size());

        for (OnlineStatusInvocable.StatusActionOutputs result : results) {
            System.assertEquals(true, result.success);
            System.assertEquals('Quality/Cleaning', result.Status);
            System.assertEquals('Cleaning', result.Action);
        }
    }

    @isTest
    static void testEmptyInput() {
        List<OnlineStatusInvocable.StatusActionOutputs> results = 
            OnlineStatusInvocable.ProcessOnlineStatus(new List<OnlineStatusInvocable.OnlineStatusInput>());

        System.assertEquals(0, results.size());
    }
}

public class PostInsuranceDetailsHandler {

    public static void Post(List<Account> listAccount){

        Id insrCoyRecordTypeId = Schema.SObjectType.Account.getRecordTypeInfosByName().get('Policy Provider' ).getRecordTypeId();                

        //only for insurance company
        for(Account insr: listAccount){
            if(insr.RecordTypeId == insrCoyRecordTypeId){
                PostInsuranceDetails(insr.Id);
            }
        }
    }

    @future(callout=true)     
    public static void PostInsuranceDetails(Id acctId){

         Account insrCoy = [Select Id,Name,Insurer__c,Broker__c,Administrator__c,Dealership_Fleet_Self_Insured__c From Account Where Id=:acctId];   

         try{   
             RenewITSoapWebservices.WebService1Soap postInsurReq = new  RenewITSoapWebservices.WebService1Soap(); 
             RenewITSoapWebservices.InsuranceObj insuranceObj = new RenewITSoapWebservices.InsuranceObj();
             postInsurReq.timeout_x = 120000;

             If(insrCoy.Administrator__c) {
                 insrCoy.Broker__c = True;
             }

             If(insrCoy.Dealership_Fleet_Self_Insured__c) {
                 insrCoy.Broker__c = True;
             }             

             insuranceObj.key = 'H3nn13@n31';
             insuranceObj.name = insrCoy.Name.toUpperCase();
             insuranceObj.mask_c = insrCoy.Name.toUpperCase();
             insuranceObj.sf_Id = insrCoy.Id;
             insuranceObj.Is_Insurer = insrCoy.Insurer__c;
             insuranceObj.Is_Broker = insrCoy.Broker__c;

             string insurerId = postInsurReq.InsuranceDetails(insuranceObj);

             System.debug('insurerId:' +insurerId);

             //update the account object with the returned id
             Account acct = new Account (Id = insrCoy.Id);
             acct.AccountNumber = insurerId;
             Update acct;
         }
         catch(Exception ex){
             system.debug('Error on Webservice: ' + ex.getMessage());
         }


     }


}

public with sharing class PostInsuredValueInvocable {

    public class InsuredValueInput {
        @InvocableVariable(required = true)
        public String recordId;
    }

    public class InsuredValueOutput {
        @InvocableVariable(required=true)
        public Boolean Successful;
        @InvocableVariable(required=true)
        public String Message;     

        public InsuredValueOutput() {}
        public InsuredValueOutput(Boolean successful, String message) {
            this.Successful = successful;
            this.Message = message;
        }
    }

    @InvocableMethod(label = 'Submit Insured Value' description='Submits Insured Value To The Online System')
    public static List<InsuredValueOutput> submitInsuredValue(List<InsuredValueInput> inputs){
        List<InsuredValueOutput> outputs = new List<InsuredValueOutput>();

        for (InsuredValueInput input : inputs){
            try {
                //validateRecord(input.recordId);
                outputs.add(new InsuredValueOutput(true, 'Validation successful, processing in background'));
                processCalloutAsync(input.recordId);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                outputs.add(new InsuredValueOutput(false, e.getMessage()));
            }
        }
        return outputs;
    }

    @future(callout=true)
    public static void processCalloutAsync(String recordId) {
        try {
            processCallout(recordId);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            System.debug('Error in async callout: ' + e.getMessage());
        }   
    }

    private static void validateRecord(String recordId) {
        if (String.isBlank(recordId)) {
            throw new IllegalArgumentException('Record ID cannot be blank');
        }

        List<Audatex__c> records = [SELECT Id FROM Audatex__c WHERE Id = :recordId LIMIT 1];
        if (records.isEmpty()) {
            throw new IllegalArgumentException('No Audatex record found');
        }
    }

    @TestVisible 
    private static void processCallout(String recordId) {
        try {
            Audatex__c auda = [SELECT Id, BID__c, Claim_ID__c, Summary_Information_Claim_Insured_Amount__c 
                              FROM Audatex__c WHERE Id = :recordId];

            InsuredValueModel payload = new InsuredValueModel();
            payload.BranchId = Integer.valueOf(auda.BID__c);
            payload.ClaimId = Integer.valueOf(auda.Claim_ID__c);

            // payload.InsuredValue = Decimal.valueOf(auda.Summary_Information_Claim_Insured_Amount__c);

            String insuredValue = auda.Summary_Information_Claim_Insured_Amount__c;
            payload.InsuredValue = parseCurrencyToDecimal(insuredValue);

            ApiResponse apiResponse = makeCallout(payload);
            if (!apiResponse.Successful) {
                System.debug('Error: ' + apiResponse.Message);
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            System.debug('Error processing callout: ' + e.getMessage());
        }
    }

    private static Decimal parseCurrencyToDecimal(String currencyValue) {
        try {

            String cleanValue = currencyValue;

            cleanValue = cleanValue.replaceAll('R', '');

            cleanValue = cleanValue.replaceAll(',', '');

            cleanValue = cleanValue.trim();

            return Decimal.valueOf(cleanValue);

        } catch (Exception e) {
            System.debug('Error parsing currency value: ' + currencyValue + ' - ' + e.getMessage());
            return 0;
        }
    }

    private static ApiResponse makeCallout(InsuredValueModel payload) {
        try {
            Online_System__mdt apiConfig = Online_System__mdt.getInstance('InsuredValue');
            if (apiConfig == null) {
                return new ApiResponse(false, 'API configuration not found');
            }

            Http http = new Http();
            HttpRequest req = new HttpRequest();
            req.setEndpoint(apiConfig.Base_URL__c + '/api/Claim/PostInsuredValue');
            req.setMethod('POST');
            req.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
            req.setHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + apiConfig.Bearer_Token__c);
            req.setBody(JSON.serialize(payload));

            HttpResponse res = http.send(req);
            if (res.getStatusCode() == 200) {
                return (ApiResponse)JSON.deserialize(res.getBody(), ApiResponse.class);
            } else {
                return new ApiResponse(false, 'HTTP ' + res.getStatusCode() + ': ' + res.getStatus());
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            return new ApiResponse(false, 'Error: ' + e.getMessage());
        }
    }

    public class InsuredValueModel {
        public Integer BranchId { get; set; }
        public Integer ClaimId { get; set; }
        public Decimal InsuredValue { get; set; }
    }

    private class ApiResponse {
        public Boolean Successful { get; set; }
        public String Message { get; set; }

        public ApiResponse() {}
        public ApiResponse(Boolean successful, String message) {
            this.Successful = successful;
            this.Message = message;
        }
    }
}

public class PostPriceChangeToSlack {

    @InvocableMethod(label='Post Price Change Notification to Slack')
    public static void postToSlack(List<Id> propertyId) {
        String slackURL;
        Dreamhouse_Settings__c settings = Dreamhouse_Settings__c.getOrgDefaults();
        if (!Test.isRunningTest()) {
            if (settings == null || settings.Slack_Property_Webhook_URL__c == null) {
                System.Debug('Slack_Property_Webhook_URL not set. Aborting PostPriceChangeToSlack process action');
                return;
            } else {
                slackURL = settings.Slack_Property_Webhook_URL__c;   
            }
        }
        Id propId = propertyId[0]; // If bulk, only post first to avoid spamming
        Property__c property = [SELECT Address__c, City__c, State__c, Price__c from Property__c WHERE Id=:propId];
        String message = 'Price change: ' + property.Address__c + ', ' + property.City__c + ' ' + property.State__c + ' is now *$' + property.Price__c.setScale(0).format() + '*';
        System.Debug(message);

        Map<String,Object> payload = new Map<String,Object>();
        payload.put('text', message);
        payload.put('mrkdwn', true);
        String body = JSON.serialize(payload);    
        System.Debug(body);
        System.enqueueJob(new QueueableSlackCall(slackURL, 'POST', body));
    }

    public class QueueableSlackCall implements System.Queueable, Database.AllowsCallouts {

        private final String url;
        private final String method;
        private final String body;

        public QueueableSlackCall(String url, String method, String body) {
            this.url = url;
            this.method = method;
            this.body = body;
        }

        public void execute(System.QueueableContext ctx) {
            HttpRequest req = new HttpRequest();
            req.setMethod(method);
            req.setBody(body);
            Http http = new Http();
            HttpResponse res;
            if (!Test.isRunningTest()) {
                req.setEndpoint(url);
                res = http.send(req);
            }
        }

    }

}

public with sharing class PostRONoUpdate {

    public class RONumberUpdateInput {
        @InvocableVariable(required=true)
        public String repairId;
    }

    public class RONumberUpdateOutput {
        @InvocableVariable(required=true)
        public Boolean Successful;

        @InvocableVariable(required=true)
        public String Message;

        public RONumberUpdateOutput() {}

        public RONumberUpdateOutput(Boolean successful, String message) {
            this.Successful = successful;
            this.Message = message;
        }
    }

    @InvocableMethod(label = 'Submit Repair RO Number Update To Online' description='Submits a RO number update to Online')
    public static List<RONumberUpdateOutput> submitRONoUpdate(List<RONumberUpdateInput> inputs){
        List<RONumberUpdateOutput> outputs = new List<RONumberUpdateOutput>();

        for (RONumberUpdateInput input : inputs){
            RONumberUpdateOutput output = new RONumberUpdateOutput();
            output.Successful = true;
            output.Message = 'Update submitted successfully';
            outputs.add(output);
            processUpdateAsync(input.repairId);
        }

        return outputs;
    }

    @future(callout=true)
    public static void processUpdateAsync(String repairId) {
        System.debug('repairId: ' + repairId);
        try {
            processUpdate(repairId);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            System.debug('Error in processUpdateAsync: ' + e.getMessage());
        }   
    }

    @TestVisible 
    private static void processUpdate(String repairId) {
        System.debug('processUpdate - Starting for RepairId: ' + repairId);

        if (String.isBlank(repairId)) {
            System.debug('Error: repairId cannot be null or empty');
            return; 
        }

        try {
            Repair__c repair = [SELECT Id, Repairer__r.BID__c, RO_Number__c, Name FROM Repair__c WHERE Id = :repairId];

            if (repair == null) {
                System.debug('Error: No Repair__c record found with Id: ' + repairId);
                return;
            }

            if (String.isBlank(repair.RO_Number__c)) {
                System.debug('Error: RO Number is blank for Repair: ' + repair.Name);
                return;
            }

            RONoUpdateModel updateModel = new RONoUpdateModel();
            updateModel.BranchId = repair.Repairer__r.BID__c;
            updateModel.SFRepairUniqueID = repair.Id;
            updateModel.RONumber = repair.RO_Number__c;

            RONumberUpdateOutput response = makeCallout(updateModel, repairId);
            if (!response.Successful) {
                System.debug('Error: ' + response.Message);
            }

        } catch (Exception ex){
            System.debug('Error in processUpdate: ' + ex.getMessage());
        }
    }

    private static RONumberUpdateOutput makeCallout(RONoUpdateModel payload, String repairId) {
        Http http = new Http();
        HttpRequest httpRequest = new HttpRequest();

        Online_System__mdt apiConfig = Online_System__mdt.getInstance('PostROUpdate');
        if (apiConfig == null) {
            return new RONumberUpdateOutput(false, 'Online System API configuration not found');
        }

        httpRequest.setEndpoint(apiConfig.Base_URL__c + '/api/Claim/PostRONoUpdate');
        httpRequest.setMethod('POST');
        httpRequest.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
        httpRequest.setHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + apiConfig.Bearer_Token__c);

        httpRequest.setBody(JSON.serialize(payload));

        System.debug('RO Number Update Payload: ' + JSON.serializePretty(payload));

        try {
            HttpResponse response = http.send(httpRequest);
            if (response.getStatusCode() == 200) {
                RONumberUpdateOutput responseModel = (RONumberUpdateOutput)JSON.deserialize(response.getBody(), RONumberUpdateOutput.class);
                if (!responseModel.Successful) {
                    responseModel.Message = 'API call succeeded, but operation failed: ' + responseModel.Message;
                }
                return responseModel;
            } else {
                return new RONumberUpdateOutput(false, 'HTTP Error: ' + response.getStatus());
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            return new RONumberUpdateOutput(false, 'Exception: ' + e.getMessage());
        }
    }

    public class RONoUpdateModel {
        public String BranchId {get; set;}
        public String SFRepairUniqueID {get; set;}
        public String RONumber {get; set;}
    }

global with sharing class PropertyController {

    @AuraEnabled
    public static PropertyPagedResult findAll(String searchKey, Decimal minPrice, Decimal maxPrice, Decimal pageSize, Decimal pageNumber) {
        Integer pSize = (Integer)pageSize;
        String key = '%' + searchKey + '%';
        Integer offset = ((Integer)pageNumber - 1) * pSize;
        PropertyPagedResult r =  new PropertyPagedResult();
        r.pageSize = pSize;
        r.page = (Integer) pageNumber;
        r.total = [SELECT count() FROM property__c 
                      WHERE (title__c LIKE :key OR city__c LIKE :key OR tags__c LIKE :key)
                      AND price__c >= :minPrice
                      AND price__c <= :maxPrice];
        r.properties = [SELECT Id, title__c, city__c, description__c, price__c, baths__c, beds__c, thumbnail__c FROM property__c 
                      WHERE (title__c LIKE :key OR city__c LIKE :key OR tags__c LIKE :key)
                      AND price__c >= :minPrice
                      AND price__c <= :maxPrice
                      ORDER BY price__c LIMIT :pSize OFFSET :offset];
        System.debug(r);
        return r;
    }

    @AuraEnabled
    public static Property__c findById(Id propertyId) {
        return [SELECT id, name, beds__c, baths__c, address__c, city__c, state__c, assessed_value__c, price__c, Date_Listed__c, Location__Latitude__s, Location__Longitude__s 
                FROM Property__c
                WHERE Id=:propertyId];
    }

    @RemoteAction @AuraEnabled
    public static Property__c[] getAvailableProperties() {
        return [SELECT id, name, address__c, city__c, price__c, Date_Listed__c, Days_On_Market__c, Date_Agreement__c, Location__Latitude__s, Location__Longitude__s 
                FROM Property__c
                WHERE Date_Listed__c != NULL AND (Date_Agreement__c = NULL OR Date_Agreement__c = LAST_N_DAYS:90)];
    }

    @AuraEnabled
    public static List<Property__c> getSimilarProperties (Id propertyId, Decimal bedrooms, Decimal price, String searchCriteria) {
        if (searchCriteria == 'Bedrooms') {
            return [
                SELECT Id, Name, Beds__c, Baths__c, Price__c, Broker__c, Status__c, Thumbnail__c 
                FROM Property__c WHERE Id != :propertyId AND Beds__c = :bedrooms
            ];
        } else {
            return [
                SELECT Id, Name, Beds__c, Baths__c, Price__c, Broker__c, Status__c, Thumbnail__c 
                FROM Property__c WHERE Id != :propertyId AND Price__c > :price - 100000 AND Price__c < :price + 100000
            ];
        }
    }


}

public with sharing class PushPriceChangeNotification {

    @InvocableMethod(label='Push Price Change Notification')
    public static void pushNotification(List<Id> propertyId) {
        String pushServerURL;
        Dreamhouse_Settings__c settings = Dreamhouse_Settings__c.getOrgDefaults();
        if (!Test.isRunningTest()) {
            if (settings == null || settings.Push_Server_URL__c == null) {
                System.debug('Push_Server_URL not set. Aborting PushPriceChangeNotification process action');
                return;
            } else {
                pushServerURL = settings.Push_Server_URL__c;    
            }
        }
        Id propId = propertyId[0]; // If bulk, only post first to avoid spamming
        Property__c property = [SELECT Name, Price__c from Property__c WHERE Id=:propId];
        String message = property.Name + '. New Price: $' + property.Price__c.setScale(0).format();

        Set<String> userIds = new Set<String>();

        List<Favorite__c> favorites = [SELECT user__c from favorite__c WHERE property__c=:propId];
        for (Favorite__c favorite : favorites) {
            userIds.add(favorite.user__c);      
        }

        Map<String,Object> payload = new Map<String,Object>();
        payload.put('message', message);
        payload.put('userIds', userIds);
        String body = JSON.serialize(payload);    
        System.enqueueJob(new QueueablePushCall(pushServerURL, 'POST', body));
    }

    public class QueueablePushCall implements System.Queueable, Database.AllowsCallouts {

        private final String url;
        private final String method;
        private final String body;

        public QueueablePushCall(String url, String method, String body) {
            this.url = url;
            this.method = method;
            this.body = body;
        }

        public void execute(System.QueueableContext ctx) {
            HttpRequest req = new HttpRequest();
            req.setMethod(method);
            req.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
            req.setBody(body);
            Http http = new Http();
            HttpResponse res;
            if (!Test.isRunningTest()) {
                req.setEndpoint(url);
                res = http.send(req);
            }
        }

    }

}

public class QuoteTriggerHandler {

    public static void onInsertQuote(List<Quote__c> newQuoteList){

        List<Repair__c> repairToUpdateList = new List<Repair__c>();

        for(Quote__c q : newQuoteList){
            Repair__c repairToUpdate = new Repair__c(Id = q.Repair__c);

            if(q.Quote_Type__c == 'Original Quote'){
                repairToUpdate.Original_Quote__c = True;
            }
            if(q.Quote_Type__c == 'Approved Quote'){
                repairToUpdate.Approved_Quote__c = True;
            }
            if(q.Quote_Type__c == 'Converted Quote'){
                repairToUpdate.Converted_Quote__c = True;
            }
            if(q.Quote_Type__c == 'Final Costed Quote'){
                repairToUpdate.Final_Costed_Quote__c = True;
            }

            repairToUpdateList.add(repairToUpdate);
        }

        if(repairToUpdateList.Size() > 0) Update repairToUpdateList;
    }

    public static void onUpdateQuote(List<Quote__c> newQuoteList, Map<Id,Quote__c> oldQuoteMap){

        List<Repair__c> repairToUpdateList = new List<Repair__c>();

        for(Quote__c currQuote : newQuoteList){
            Repair__c repairToUpdate = new Repair__c(Id = currQuote.Repair__c);
            Quote__c prevQuote = oldQuoteMap.get(currQuote.Id);

            if(currQuote.Quote_Type__c == 'Original Quote'){
                //when Total is updated on Quote
                if(currQuote.Total__c != null && currQuote.Total__c != prevQuote.Total__c ){
                    repairToUpdate.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Original__c = currQuote.Total__c;
                }            
                //when Parts Total is updated on Quote
                if(currQuote.Parts_Total__c != null && currQuote.Parts_Total__c != prevQuote.Parts_Total__c ){
                    repairToUpdate.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Original__c = currQuote.Parts_Total__c;
                }
            }

            if(currQuote.Quote_Type__c == 'Approved Quote'){
                //when Total is updated on Quote
                if(currQuote.Total__c != null && currQuote.Total__c != prevQuote.Total__c ){
                    repairToUpdate.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Approved__c = currQuote.Total__c;
                }            
                //when Parts Total is updated on Quote
                if(currQuote.Parts_Total__c != null && currQuote.Parts_Total__c != prevQuote.Parts_Total__c ){
                    repairToUpdate.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Approved__c = currQuote.Parts_Total__c;
                }
            }

            if(currQuote.Quote_Type__c == 'Converted Quote'){
                //when Total is updated on Quote
                if(currQuote.Total__c != null && currQuote.Total__c != prevQuote.Total__c ){
                    repairToUpdate.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Converted__c = currQuote.Total__c;
                }            
                //when Parts Total is updated on Quote
                if(currQuote.Parts_Total__c != null && currQuote.Parts_Total__c != prevQuote.Parts_Total__c ){
                    repairToUpdate.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_ExVat_Converted__c = currQuote.Parts_Total__c;
                }
            }

            if(currQuote.Quote_Type__c == 'Final Costed Quote'){
                //when Total is updated on Quote
                if(currQuote.Total__c != null && currQuote.Total__c != prevQuote.Total__c ){
                    repairToUpdate.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Final__c = currQuote.Total__c;
                }            
                //when Parts Total is updated on Quote
                if(currQuote.Parts_Total__c != null && currQuote.Parts_Total__c != prevQuote.Parts_Total__c ){
                    repairToUpdate.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Final__c = currQuote.Parts_Total__c;
                }
            }

            repairToUpdateList.add(repairToUpdate);
        }

        //update repair
        if(repairToUpdateList.Size() > 0) Update repairToUpdateList;
    }
}

@RestResource(urlMapping='/Quote/*')
global with sharing class QuotesRESTWebservice {

    global static List<String> restServiceErrorMessage{get;set;}

    global class ClientReqModel{
        public string repairId {get;set;}
        public string base64Quote {get;set;}
        public string fileName {get; set;}
        public string fileExtension {get; set;}
    }

    global class ClientReqResponseModel{
        public string wasSuccessful {get;set;}
        public string methodName {get;set;}
        public string errorMessage {get;set;}
        public string contentVersionId {get;set;}
        public string contentDocumentId {get;set;}
        public string contentDocumentLinkId {get;set;}
    }

    @HttpPost
    global static ClientReqResponseModel InsertQuote(ClientReqModel clientModel){

        ClientReqResponseModel response = new ClientReqResponseModel();
        response.methodName = 'InsertQuote';

        try {

            if (String.isEmpty(clientModel.repairId) || String.isEmpty(clientModel.base64Quote)){
                throw new IllegalArgumentException('Repair ID and Base64 quote data must not be empty.');
            }

            Blob decodedQuote = EncodingUtil.base64Decode(clientModel.base64Quote);

            String fileName = clientModel.fileName;
            String fileExtension = clientModel.fileExtension;

            ContentVersion contentVersion = new ContentVersion();
            contentVersion.Title = fileName;
            contentVersion.PathOnClient = fileName + '.' + fileExtension;
            contentVersion.VersionData = decodedQuote;
            insert contentVersion;

            contentVersion = [SELECT Id, ContentDocumentId FROM ContentVersion WHERE Id = :contentVersion.Id LIMIT 1];

            ContentDocumentLink contentDocumentLink = new ContentDocumentLink();
            contentDocumentLink.ContentDocumentId = contentVersion.ContentDocumentId;
            contentDocumentLink.LinkedEntityId = clientModel.repairId;
            contentDocumentLink.ShareType = 'V'; 
            insert contentDocumentLink;

            response.wasSuccessful = 'true';
            response.errorMessage = '';
            response.contentDocumentId = contentVersion.ContentDocumentId;
            response.contentVersionId = contentVersion.Id;
            response.contentDocumentLinkId = contentDocumentLink.Id;

        } catch (Exception ex) {
            response.wasSuccessful = 'false';
            response.errorMessage = ex.getMessage();
        }
        return response;
    }
}

@isTest
public class RejectDuplicateFavoriteTest {

    public static String getUserNamePrefix(){
        return UserInfo.getOrganizationId() + System.now().millisecond();
    }

    public static User getTestUser(){
        Profile p = [SELECT Id FROM Profile WHERE Name='Standard User'];
        return new User(Alias='testuser', Email='test@user.com', 
                        EmailEncodingKey='UTF-8', LastName='test', LanguageLocaleKey='en_US', 
                        LocaleSidKey='en_US', ProfileId = p.Id, 
                        TimeZoneSidKey='America/Los_Angeles', UserName=getUserNamePrefix() + 'test@test.com');
    }

    static testMethod void acceptNonDuplicate() {
        Boolean success = true;
        try {
            Property__c p = new Property__c();
            insert p;
            User u = getTestUser();
            insert u;
            Favorite__c f1 = new Favorite__c(property__c=p.Id, user__c=u.Id);
            insert f1;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            System.debug(e);
            success = false;
        } finally {
            System.assert(success);
        }
    }

    static testMethod void rejectDuplicate() {
        Boolean success = true;
        try {
            Property__c p = new Property__c();
            insert p;
            User u = getTestUser();
            insert u;
            Favorite__c f1 = new Favorite__c(property__c=p.Id, user__c=u.Id);
            insert f1;
            Favorite__c f2 = new Favorite__c(property__c=p.Id, user__c=u.Id);
            insert f2;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            success = false;
        } finally {
            System.assert(!success);
        }
    }

}
