    @HttpPost
    global static RepairReqResponseModel CreateRepair(RepairReqModel repModel) { 

        if (repModel == null) {
            RepairReqResponseModel response = new RepairReqResponseModel();
            response.ErrorMessage = 'Invalid input: repModel is null';
            response.MethodName = 'CreateRepair';
            response.SFRepairUniqueId = null;
            response.WasSuccessful = 'false';
            return response;
        }

        if (repModel.Branch == 'Renew-it Bedfordview' || repModel.Branch == 'Renew-it Rivonia') {
            String currentUserEmail = UserInfo.getUserEmail();
            if (isBlockedEmail(currentUserEmail)) {
                RepairReqResponseModel response = new RepairReqResponseModel();
                response.ErrorMessage = 'User is not authorized to create repairs for Renew-it Bedfordview or Rivonia';
                response.MethodName = 'CreateRepair';
                response.SFRepairUniqueId = null;
                response.WasSuccessful = 'false';
                return response;
            }
        }

        Repair__c repair = new Repair__c();

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Vehicle_under_manufacturer_warranty)){
            repair.Vehicle_under_manufacturer_warranty__c = repModel.Vehicle_under_manufacturer_warranty; 
        }

        if (repModel.ClaimID != null){
            repair.Claim_ID__c = String.valueOf(repModel.ClaimID);
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Rectification_Comeback_Warranty_Repair)){
            repair.Rectification_Comeback_Warranty_Repair__c = repModel.Rectification_Comeback_Warranty_Repair; 
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Describe_briefly_the_area_type_of_repair)){
            repair.Describe_briefly_the_area_type_of_repair__c = repModel.Describe_briefly_the_area_type_of_repair; 
        }

        if (repModel.Branch_Entry_Method == 'Driveable' || repModel.Branch_Entry_Method == 'Non-Driveable'){    
            repair.Branch_Entry_Method__c = repModel.Branch_Entry_Method;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Insurer)){
            repair.Insurance_Company_text__c = repModel.Insurer;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Current_KM_s_on_Vehicle)){
            repair.Current_KM_s_on_Vehicle__c = repModel.Current_KM_s_on_Vehicle; 
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Estimator) && repModel.Estimator.startsWith('003')){
            repair.Estimator_Contact__c = repModel.Estimator;
        } else if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Estimator) && repModel.Estimator.startsWith('005')){
            repair.Estimator__c = repModel.Estimator;
        }

        if (repModel.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization != null || repModel.AwaitingAdditionalAuth != null){
            repair.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization__c = repModel.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization ?? repModel.AwaitingAdditionalAuth ?? false;
        }

        if (string.isNotBlank(repModel.Towing_Company)){
            repair.Towing_Company_Name__c = repModel.Towing_Company;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Upsell)){
            repair.Upsell__c = repModel.Upsell; 
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Unrelated_Damage_information)){
            repair.Unrelated_Damage_information__c = repModel.Unrelated_Damage_information;        
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Policy_Number)){
            repair.Policy_Number__c = repModel.Policy_Number; 
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Claim_Number)){
            repair.Claim_Number__c = repModel.Claim_Number; 
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Other_Information)){
            repair.Other_Information__c = repModel.Other_Information; 
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Vehicle)){
            repair.Vehicle__c = repModel.Vehicle;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Service_Advisor_Email)){
            repair.Service_Advisor_Email__c = repModel.Service_Advisor_Email;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Service_Advisor_Test)){
            repair.Service_Advisor_Test__c = repModel.Service_Advisor_Test;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Service_Advisor) && repModel.Service_Advisor.length() >= 3) {
            String serviceadvisorIdPrefix = repModel.Service_Advisor.substring(0, 3);

            if (serviceadvisorIdPrefix == '003') {  
                repair.Service_Advisor_cont__c = repModel.Service_Advisor;
            } else if (serviceadvisorIdPrefix == '001') { 
                repair.Service_Advisor__c = repModel.Service_Advisor;
            } else {
                System.debug('Warning: Invalid Service Advisor ID: ' + repModel.Service_Advisor);
            }
        } else {
            System.debug('Warning: Service Advisor ID is invalid or too short: ' + repModel.Service_Advisor);
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Client) && repModel.Client.length() >= 3) {
            String clientIdPrefix = repModel.Client.substring(0, 3);

            if (clientIdPrefix == '003') {  
                repair.Client_Contact__c = repModel.Client;
            } else if (clientIdPrefix == '001') { 
                Account personAccount = [SELECT PersonContactId FROM Account WHERE Id = :repModel.Client LIMIT 1];
                if (personAccount != null && personAccount.PersonContactId != null) {
                    repair.Client_Contact__c = personAccount.PersonContactId;
                } else {
                    System.debug('Warning: Invalid Person Account or PersonContactId not found: ' + repModel.Client);
                }
            } else {
                System.debug('Warning: Invalid Client ID prefix: ' + clientIdPrefix);
            }
        } else {
            System.debug('Warning: Client ID is invalid or too short: ' + repModel.Client);
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.EstimatorText)){
            repair.Estimator_Text__c = repModel.EstimatorText;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.ServiceAdvisor)){
            repair.Service_Advisor_Text__c = repModel.ServiceAdvisor;
        }

        if (repModel.Insurance_Company != null && repModel.Insurance_Company.startsWith('001')) {
            repair.Insurance_Company__c = repModel.Insurance_Company;
        } else if (repModel.Insurance_Company != null) {
            System.debug('Warning: Insurance Company ID is not a valid Account ID: ' + repModel.Insurance_Company);
        }

        if (String.isNotEmpty(repModel.Broker)){
            repair.Broker_text__c = repModel.Broker;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.ClaimHandler)) {
            repair.Claim_s_Handler_Text__c = repModel.ClaimHandler;
        } else if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Claim_Administrator)) {
            repair.Claim_s_Handler_Text__c = repModel.Claim_Administrator;
        }

        if (repModel.Claim_Administrator != null) {
            if (repModel.Claim_Administrator.startsWith('003')) {
                repair.Claim_Handler_Cont__c = repModel.Claim_Administrator;
            } else if (repModel.Claim_Administrator.startsWith('001')) {
                List<Account> personAccounts = [SELECT PersonContactId 
                                                FROM Account 
                                                WHERE Id = :repModel.Claim_Administrator 
                                                AND IsPersonAccount = true 
                                                LIMIT 1];

                if (!personAccounts.isEmpty() && personAccounts[0].PersonContactId != null) {
                    repair.Claim_Handler_Cont__c = personAccounts[0].PersonContactId;
                } else {
                    repair.Claim_Administrator__c = repModel.Claim_Administrator;
                    System.debug('Warning: Account is not a PersonAccount or PersonContactId is null: ' + repModel.Claim_Administrator);
                }
            } else {
                System.debug('Warning: Claim Administrator ID is not a valid Contact ID or Account ID: ' + repModel.Claim_Administrator);
            }
        } else {
            System.debug('Warning: Claim Administrator is null');
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.FleetDealership)) {
            repair.FleetDealershipSelfInsured__c = repModel.FleetDealership;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.DR_Number)) {
            repair.DR_Number__c = repModel.DR_Number;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.RO_Number)) {
            repair.RO_Number__c = repModel.RO_Number;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Action)) {
            repair.Action__c = repModel.Action;
        }

        if (repModel.Speedbump != null) {
            repair.Speedbump__c = repModel.Speedbump;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Speedbump_Reasons)){
            repair.Speedbump_Reasons__c = repModel.Speedbump_Reasons;
            repair.Speedbump__c = true;
        }

        if (repModel.Stock_Yard != null){
            repair.Stock_Yard__c = String.valueOf(repModel.Stock_Yard);
        }

        if (string.isNotBlank(repModel.Stock_Yard_Status)){
            repair.Stock_Yard_Status__c = String.valueOf(repModel.Stock_Yard_Status);
        }

        if (repModel.BackOrder != null) {
            repair.Car_Collected_Awaiting_Backorder_Parts__c = repModel.BackOrder ?? false;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.ParentId)){
            repair.Parent_Repair__c = repModel.ParentId;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.RepairType)){
            repair.Repair_Type__c = repModel.RepairType;
        }

        if (repModel.Not_Proceeding != null){
            repair.Not_Proceeding__c = repModel.Not_Proceeding;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Not_Proceeding_Reasons)){
            repair.Not_Proceeding_Reasons__c = repModel.Not_Proceeding_Reasons;
            repair.Not_Proceeding__c = true;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Status)) {
            if (repModel.Status.contains('-')){
                repair.Online_Status__c = repModel.Status;
            } else {
                repair.Status__c = repModel.Status;
            }
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Vehicle_Location)){
            repair.Vehicle_Location__c = repModel.Vehicle_Location; 
        }

        repair.Original_Quote__c = repModel.Original_Quote;
        repair.Approved_Quote__c = repModel.Approved_Quote;
        repair.Converted_Quote__c = repModel.Converted_Quote;
        repair.Final_Costed_Quote__c = repModel.Final_Costed_Quote;
        repair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Original__c = repModel.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Original;
        repair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Original__c = repModel.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Original;
        repair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Approved__c = repModel.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Approved;
        repair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Approved__c = repModel.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Approved;
        repair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Converted__c = repModel.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Converted;
        repair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_ExVat_Converted__c = repModel.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_ExVat_Converted;
        repair.PreCost_Parts_Ex_Markup_ExVat_Converted__c = repModel.PreCost_Parts_Ex_Markup_ExVat_Converted;
        repair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Final__c = repModel.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Final;
        repair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Final__c = repModel.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Final;
        repair.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Final__c = repModel.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Final;
        repair.Audatex_Vehicle_Assessment__c = repModel.Audatex_Vehicle_Assessment;
        repair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Invoiced__c = repModel.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Invoiced;
        repair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Invoiced__c = repModel.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Invoiced;
        repair.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Invoiced__c = repModel.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Invoiced;
        repair.Actual_Invoice_Date__c = repModel.Actual_Invoice_Date;
        repair.Excess_Value__c = repModel.Excess_Value;   
        repair.Excess_Paid__c = repModel.Excess_Paid;  
        repair.Shop_Allocation__c = repModel.Shop_Allocation;  
        repair.Client_Booking_Date__c = repModel.Client_Booking_Date;  
        repair.Parts_Received_Value_Creditors__c = repModel.Parts_Received_Value_Creditors;  
        repair.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization__c = repModel.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization;  
        repair.Finals_Costing_Sent__c = repModel.Final_Costing_Sent;  
        repair.Finals_Costing_Sent_Date__c = repModel.Final_Costing_Sent_Date;  
        repair.Invoice_Sent__c = repModel.Invoice_Sent;  
        repair.Invoice_Sent_Date__c = repModel.Invoice_Sent_Date;  
        repair.RecordTypeId = getRecordTypeId(repModel.Branch);

        RepairReqResponseModel reponse=new RepairReqResponseModel();
        restServiceErrorMessages = new List<string>(); 

        System.debug('Repair: '+repair);        
        String repModelStr = JSON.serialize(repModel);
        System.debug('repModelStr: '+ JSON.serializePretty(repModelStr));

        Database.SaveResult result = null;
        try{
            System.debug('Repair object:'+ repair);
            CheckRecursive.RepairTriggerSFOrigin = false;
            result = Database.insert(repair);

        }
        catch(Exception ex){   

            System.Debug('ERROR on CreateRepair: '+ex.getMessage());
            restServiceErrorMessages.add('ERROR on CreateRepair: '+ex.getMessage());
            reponse.ErrorMessage = ex.getMessage();
            reponse.MethodName = 'CreateRepair';
            reponse.SFRepairUniqueId = null;
            reponse.WasSuccessful = 'false';
            return reponse;
        }        
        if (result.isSuccess()) 
        {            
            string errStr = '';           
            for(string err: restServiceErrorMessages) 
            {
                errStr = errStr + err + '\n';
            }

            repair.Id = result.Id;
            repair.web_service_error__c = errStr;

            update repair; 

            reponse.SFRepairUniqueId = result.Id;
            reponse.RepairName = [SELECT Name FROM repair__c WHERE Id = :result.Id].Name;
            reponse.WasSuccessful = 'true';        
            reponse.MethodName = 'CreateRepair';
            reponse.ErrorMessage = '';
            return reponse;
        }        
        return reponse;     
    }

    @HttpPut
    global static RepairReqResponseModel UpdateRepair(RepairReqModel repModel) {     

        RepairReqResponseModel respModel = new RepairReqResponseModel(); 

        if (repModel == null) {
            respModel.ErrorMessage = 'Invalid input: repModel is null';
            respModel.MethodName = 'UpdateRepair';
            respModel.SFRepairUniqueId = null;
            respModel.WasSuccessful = 'false';
            return respModel;
        }

        if (repModel.Branch == 'Renew-it Bedfordview' || repModel.Branch == 'Renew-it Rivonia') {
            String currentUserEmail = UserInfo.getUserEmail();
            if (isBlockedEmail(currentUserEmail)) {
                respModel.ErrorMessage = 'User is not authorized to update repairs for Renew-it Bedfordview or Rivonia';
                respModel.MethodName = 'UpdateRepair';
                respModel.SFRepairUniqueId = repModel.Id;
                respModel.WasSuccessful = 'false';
                return respModel;
            }
        }

        Repair__c repair;

        try {
            repair = [SELECT Name, Vehicle_under_manufacturer_warranty__c, Rectification_Comeback_Warranty_Repair__c,
                            Describe_briefly_the_area_type_of_repair__c, Branch_Entry_Method__c, Current_KM_s_on_Vehicle__c,
                            Upsell__c, Unrelated_Damage_information__c, Client__c, Insurance_Company__c, Broker__c,
                            Claim_Administrator__c, Policy_Number__c, Claim_Number__c, Other_Information__c, Vehicle__c,
                            DR_Number__c, RO_Number__c, Action__c, Speedbump__c, Status__c, Vehicle_Location__c, Estimator__c,
                            Service_Advisor__c, Service_Advisor_Email__c, Service_Advisor_Test__c, Claims_Handler__c,
                            Original_Quote__c, Approved_Quote__c, Converted_Quote__c,
                            Final_Costed_Quote__c, Speedbump_Reasons__c, Not_Proceeding__c, Not_Proceeding_Reasons__c,
                            Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Original__c, Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Original__c,
                            Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Approved__c, Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Approved__c,
                            Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Converted__c, Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_ExVat_Converted__c,
                            PreCost_Parts_Ex_Markup_ExVat_Converted__c, Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Final__c,
                            Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Final__c, Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Final__c,
                            Audatex_Vehicle_Assessment__c, Repairer__c, Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Invoiced__c,
                            Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Invoiced__c, Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Invoiced__c,
                            Actual_Invoice_Date__c, Excess_Value__c, Excess_Paid__c, Shop_Allocation__c, Client_Booking_Date__c,
                            Parts_Received_Value_Creditors__c, Finals_Costing_Sent__c, Finals_Costing_Sent_Date__c,
                            Invoice_Sent__c, Invoice_Sent_Date__c, Broker_text__c, Insurance_Company_text__c,
                            Awaiting_Additional_Authorization__c, Online_Status__c, Claim_s_Handler_Text__c,
                            Estimator_Text__c,Estimator_Contact__c,Claim_ID__c, Service_Advisor_Text__c, Client_Contact__c, Claim_Handler_Cont__c,
                            Service_Advisor_cont__c, Parent_Repair__c, Car_Collected_Awaiting_Backorder_Parts__c, Repair_Type__c, Towing_Company_Name__c,FleetDealershipSelfInsured__c, Stock_Yard__c, Stock_Yard_Status__c
                            FROM Repair__c
                            WHERE Id = :repModel.Id];

        } catch (QueryException e) {
            respModel.ErrorMessage = 'Repair record not found: ' + e.getMessage();
            respModel.MethodName = 'UpdateRepair';
            respModel.SFRepairUniqueId = repModel.Id;
            respModel.WasSuccessful = 'false';
            return respModel;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Vehicle_under_manufacturer_warranty)){
            repair.Vehicle_under_manufacturer_warranty__c = repModel.Vehicle_under_manufacturer_warranty; 
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Rectification_Comeback_Warranty_Repair)){
            repair.Rectification_Comeback_Warranty_Repair__c = repModel.Rectification_Comeback_Warranty_Repair; 
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Describe_briefly_the_area_type_of_repair)){
            repair.Describe_briefly_the_area_type_of_repair__c = repModel.Describe_briefly_the_area_type_of_repair; 
        }

        if (repModel.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization != null || repModel.AwaitingAdditionalAuth != null){
            repair.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization__c = repModel.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization ?? repModel.AwaitingAdditionalAuth ?? false;
        }

        if (repModel.BackOrder != null) {
            repair.Car_Collected_Awaiting_Backorder_Parts__c = repModel.BackOrder ?? false;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Towing_Company)){
            repair.Towing_Company_Name__c = repModel.Towing_Company;
        }

        if (repModel.Stock_Yard != null){
            repair.Stock_Yard__c = String.valueOf(repModel.Stock_Yard);
        }

        if (string.isNotBlank(repModel.Stock_Yard_Status)){
            repair.Stock_Yard_Status__c = String.valueOf(repModel.Stock_Yard_Status);
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Branch_Entry_Method) && (repModel.Branch_Entry_Method == 'Driveable' || repModel.Branch_Entry_Method == 'Non-Driveable')) {    
            repair.Branch_Entry_Method__c = repModel.Branch_Entry_Method;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Current_KM_s_on_Vehicle)){
            repair.Current_KM_s_on_Vehicle__c = repModel.Current_KM_s_on_Vehicle; 
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.ParentId)){
            repair.Parent_Repair__c = repModel.ParentId;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.RepairType)){
            repair.Repair_Type__c = repModel.RepairType;
        }

        if (repModel.ClaimID != null){
            repair.Claim_ID__c = String.valueOf(repModel.ClaimID);
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Upsell)){
            repair.Upsell__c = repModel.Upsell; 
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Unrelated_Damage_information)){
            repair.Unrelated_Damage_information__c = repModel.Unrelated_Damage_information; 
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Policy_Number)){
            repair.Policy_Number__c = repModel.Policy_Number; 
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Claim_Number)){
            repair.Claim_Number__c = repModel.Claim_Number; 
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Other_Information)){
            repair.Other_Information__c = repModel.Other_Information;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Vehicle)){
            repair.Vehicle__c = repModel.Vehicle;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Estimator) && repModel.Estimator.startsWith('003')){
            repair.Estimator_Contact__c = repModel.Estimator;
        } else if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Estimator) && repModel.Estimator.startsWith('005')){
            repair.Estimator__c = repModel.Estimator;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.EstimatorText)){
            repair.Estimator_Text__c = repModel.EstimatorText;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Service_Advisor_Email)){
            repair.Service_Advisor_Email__c = repModel.Service_Advisor_Email;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Service_Advisor_Test)){
            repair.Service_Advisor_Test__c = repModel.Service_Advisor_Test;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Claims_Handler) && repModel.Claims_Handler.startsWith('005')){
            repair.Claims_Handler__c = repModel.Claims_Handler;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.ClaimHandler)) {
            repair.Claim_s_Handler_Text__c = repModel.ClaimHandler;
        } else if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Claim_Administrator)) {
            repair.Claim_s_Handler_Text__c = repModel.Claim_Administrator;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.EstimatorText)){
            repair.Estimator_Text__c = repModel.EstimatorText;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.ServiceAdvisor)){
            repair.Service_Advisor_Text__c = repModel.ServiceAdvisor;
        }

        if (String.isNotEmpty(repModel.Broker)){
            repair.Broker_text__c = repModel.Broker;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Insurer)){
            repair.Insurance_Company_text__c = repModel.Insurer;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Client)) {
            String clientIdPrefix = repModel.Client.substring(0, 3);

            if (clientIdPrefix == '003') {  
                repair.Client_Contact__c = repModel.Client;
            } else if (clientIdPrefix == '001') { 
                Account personAccount = [SELECT PersonContactId FROM Account WHERE Id = :repModel.Client LIMIT 1];
                if (personAccount != null && personAccount.PersonContactId != null) {
                    repair.Client_Contact__c = personAccount.PersonContactId;
                } else {
                    throw new IllegalArgumentException('Invalid Person Account or PersonContactId not found');
                }
            } else {
                throw new IllegalArgumentException('Invalid Client ID format');
            }
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Insurance_Company) && repModel.Insurance_Company.startsWith('001')) {
            repair.Insurance_Company__c = repModel.Insurance_Company;
        } else if (repModel.Insurance_Company != null) {
            System.debug('Warning: Insurance Company ID is not a valid Account ID: ' + repModel.Insurance_Company);
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Claim_Administrator)) {
            if (repModel.Claim_Administrator.startsWith('003')) {
                repair.Claim_Handler_Cont__c = repModel.Claim_Administrator;
            } else if (repModel.Claim_Administrator.startsWith('001')) {
                List<Account> personAccounts = [SELECT PersonContactId 
                                                FROM Account 
                                                WHERE Id = :repModel.Claim_Administrator 
                                                AND IsPersonAccount = true 
                                                LIMIT 1];

                if (!personAccounts.isEmpty() && personAccounts[0].PersonContactId != null) {
                    repair.Claim_Handler_Cont__c = personAccounts[0].PersonContactId;
                } else {
                    repair.Claim_Administrator__c = repModel.Claim_Administrator;
                    System.debug('Warning: Account is not a PersonAccount or PersonContactId is null: ' + repModel.Claim_Administrator);
                }
            } else {
                System.debug('Warning: Claim Administrator ID is not a valid Contact ID or Account ID: ' + repModel.Claim_Administrator);
            }
        } else {
            System.debug('Warning: Claim Administrator is null');
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.DR_Number)){
            repair.DR_Number__c = repModel.DR_Number; 
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.RO_Number)){
            repair.RO_Number__c = repModel.RO_Number; 
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Action)){
            repair.Action__c = repModel.Action;        
        }

        if (repModel.Speedbump != null){
            repair.Speedbump__c = repModel.Speedbump; 
        }

        if (repModel.Not_Proceeding != null){
            repair.Not_Proceeding__c = repModel.Not_Proceeding;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Speedbump_Reasons)){
            repair.Speedbump_Reasons__c = repModel.Speedbump_Reasons;
            repair.Speedbump__c = true; 
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Not_Proceeding_Reasons)){
            repair.Not_Proceeding_Reasons__c = repModel.Not_Proceeding_Reasons;
            repair.Not_Proceeding__c = true;
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Status)) {
            if (repModel.Status.contains('-')){
                repair.Online_Status__c = repModel.Status;
            } else {
                repair.Status__c = repModel.Status;
            }
        }    

        if (String.isNotBlank(repModel.Vehicle_Location)){
            repair.Vehicle_Location__c = repModel.Vehicle_Location;
        }

        repair.Original_Quote__c = repModel.Original_Quote;
        repair.Approved_Quote__c = repModel.Approved_Quote;
        repair.Converted_Quote__c = repModel.Converted_Quote;
        repair.Final_Costed_Quote__c = repModel.Final_Costed_Quote;
        repair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Original__c = repModel.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Original;
        repair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Original__c = repModel.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Original;
        repair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Approved__c = repModel.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Approved;
        repair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Approved__c = repModel.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Approved;
        repair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Converted__c = repModel.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Converted;
        repair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_ExVat_Converted__c = repModel.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_ExVat_Converted;
        repair.PreCost_Parts_Ex_Markup_ExVat_Converted__c = repModel.PreCost_Parts_Ex_Markup_ExVat_Converted;
        repair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Final__c = repModel.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Final;
        repair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Final__c = repModel.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Final;
        repair.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Final__c = repModel.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Final;
        repair.Audatex_Vehicle_Assessment__c = repModel.Audatex_Vehicle_Assessment;

        repair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Invoiced__c = repModel.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Invoiced;
        repair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Invoiced__c = repModel.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Invoiced;
        repair.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Invoiced__c = repModel.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Invoiced;
        repair.Actual_Invoice_Date__c = repModel.Actual_Invoice_Date;

        repair.Excess_Value__c = repModel.Excess_Value;   
        repair.Excess_Paid__c = repModel.Excess_Paid;  
        repair.Shop_Allocation__c = repModel.Shop_Allocation;  
        repair.Client_Booking_Date__c = repModel.Client_Booking_Date;  
        repair.Parts_Received_Value_Creditors__c = repModel.Parts_Received_Value_Creditors;  
        repair.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization__c = repModel.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization;  
        repair.Finals_Costing_Sent__c = repModel.Final_Costing_Sent;  
        repair.Finals_Costing_Sent_Date__c = repModel.Final_Costing_Sent_Date;  
        repair.Invoice_Sent__c = repModel.Invoice_Sent;  
        repair.Invoice_Sent_Date__c = repModel.Invoice_Sent_Date;  

        try{  
            CheckRecursive.RepairTriggerSFOrigin = false;
            update repair;  

            respModel.ErrorMessage = '';
            respModel.MethodName = 'UpdateRepair';
            respModel.SFRepairUniqueId = repair.Id;
            respModel.RepairName = repair.Name;
            respModel.WasSuccessful = 'true';
        }
        catch(Exception ex){                            
            System.Debug('ERROR on UpdateRepair: '+ex.getMessage());

            respModel.ErrorMessage = ex.getMessage();
            respModel.MethodName = 'UpdateRepair';
            respModel.SFRepairUniqueId = repair.Id;
            respModel.RepairName = repair.Name;
            respModel.WasSuccessful = 'false';
        } 
        return respModel;
    }

    public static Id getRecordTypeId(String branchName) {
        Set<String> validBranches = new Set<String>{
            'BMW Auto Approved Repair Centre',
            'Renew-it Bedfordview',
            'Renew-it DCP',
            'Renew-it Greenstone',
            'Renew-it Proline',
            'Renew-It Proline Express Sandhurst',
            'Renew-it Randburg',
            'Renew-it Rivonia',
            'Renew-it Sandton',
            'Renew-it Sydney',
            'Renew-it Technostar',
            'Renew-It Umlhanga'
        };

        if (branchName == null) {
            System.debug('branchName is null');
            return null;
        }

        if (branchName.contains('Exp')) {
            System.debug('Branch name contains "Exp", returning ID for Renew-It Proline Express Sandhurst');
            return Schema.SObjectType.Repair__c.getRecordTypeInfosByName().get('Renew-It Proline Express Sandhurst').getRecordTypeId();
        }

        for (String validBranch : validBranches) {
            System.debug('Checking branch: ' + validBranch);
            if (branchName.contains(validBranch)) {
                Map<String, Schema.RecordTypeInfo> recordTypeInfoMap = Schema.SObjectType.Repair__c.getRecordTypeInfosByName();

                if (recordTypeInfoMap != null && recordTypeInfoMap.containsKey(validBranch)) {
                    Schema.RecordTypeInfo recordTypeInfo = recordTypeInfoMap.get(validBranch);

                    if (recordTypeInfo != null && recordTypeInfo.isAvailable()) {
                        return recordTypeInfo.getRecordTypeId();
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        System.debug('No valid record type found for branch: ' + branchName);
        return null;
    }    

    private static Boolean isBlockedEmail(String email) {
        Set<String> blockedEmails = new Set<String>{'hennie.nel@bluespec.co.za'};
        return blockedEmails.contains(email.toLowerCase());
    }
}

public class RepairStatusBatch implements Database.Batchable<sObject>, Schedulable, Database.AllowsCallouts {

    public void execute(SchedulableContext sc) {
        Database.executeBatch(this, 25);
    }

    public Database.QueryLocator start(Database.BatchableContext bc) {
        return Database.getQueryLocator(
            'SELECT Id, Online_Status__c, Online_Status_ID__c, Claim_ID__c, Repairer__r.BID__c ' + 
            'FROM Repair__c ' + 
            'WHERE Online_Status__c IN (\'01-Preliminary Conversion\', ' +
            '\'01-Moderation - Await Ins Auth\', ' +
            '\'01-Moderation Query - Insurance Query\', ' +
            '\'01-Moderation Query - Repairer Query\', ' +
            '\'01-Speedbump - Moderation\', ' +
            '\'08-Ready - Docs Recvd CSI\',' +
            '\'09-Invoiced\',' + 
            '\'01-Moderation\')'
        );
    }

    public void execute(Database.BatchableContext bc, List<Repair__c> scope) {
        List<Repair__c> validRecords = new List<Repair__c>();

        for(Repair__c repair : scope) {
            if (repair.Claim_ID__c != null && repair.Repairer__r != null && repair.Repairer__r.BID__c != null) {
                validRecords.add(repair);
            } else {
                System.debug('Skipping record ' + repair.Id + ' due to missing Claim_ID__c or BID__c');
            }
        }

        Integer maxRecordsToProcess = 25;

        if(validRecords.size() > maxRecordsToProcess) {
            List<Repair__c> currentBatch = new List<Repair__c>();
            List<Repair__c> remainderBatch = new List<Repair__c>();

            for(Integer i = 0; i < validRecords.size(); i++) {
                if(i < maxRecordsToProcess) {
                    currentBatch.add(validRecords[i]);
                } else {
                    remainderBatch.add(validRecords[i]);
                }
            }

            processRepairs(currentBatch);

            if(!remainderBatch.isEmpty()) {
                Set<Id> remainderIds = new Set<Id>();
                for(Repair__c repair : remainderBatch) {
                    remainderIds.add(repair.Id);
                }

                RepairStatusRemainder remainder = new RepairStatusRemainder(remainderIds);

                Datetime dt = Datetime.now().addMinutes(5);
                String cronExp = '' + dt.second() + ' ' + dt.minute() + ' ' + dt.hour() + ' ' + dt.day() + ' ' + dt.month() + ' ? ' + dt.year();
                String jobName = 'Process_Remainder_' + System.now().getTime();

                System.schedule(jobName, cronExp, remainder);
            }
        } else {
            processRepairs(validRecords);
        }
    }

    private void processRepairs(List<Repair__c> repairs) {

        Map<Id, Map<String, Object>> calloutResults = new Map<Id, Map<String, Object>>();

        for(Repair__c repair : repairs) {
            try {
                Map<String, Object> result = makeCalloutForRepair(repair);
                if(result != null) {
                    calloutResults.put(repair.Id, result);
                }
            } catch(Exception e) {
                System.debug(LoggingLevel.ERROR, 'Error making callout for repair ' + repair.Id + ': ' + e.getMessage());
            }
        }

        List<Repair__c> repairsToUpdate = new List<Repair__c>();

        for(Repair__c repair : repairs) {
            if(calloutResults.containsKey(repair.Id)) {
                Map<String, Object> responseData = calloutResults.get(repair.Id);

                Boolean needsUpdate = false;
                Repair__c repairToUpdate = new Repair__c(Id = repair.Id);

                String status = String.valueOf(responseData.get('Status'));
                if (String.isNotBlank(status) && repair.Online_Status__c != status) {
                    repairToUpdate.Online_Status__c = status;
                    needsUpdate = true;
                }

                if (responseData.containsKey('StatusID') && responseData.get('StatusID') != null) {
                    Integer statusID = Integer.valueOf(String.valueOf(responseData.get('StatusID')));
                    if (repair.Online_Status_ID__c != statusID) {
                        repairToUpdate.Online_Status_ID__c = statusID;
                        needsUpdate = true;
                    }
                }

                if (needsUpdate) {
                    repairToUpdate.Last_Online_Check__c = Datetime.now();
                    repairsToUpdate.add(repairToUpdate);
                }
            }
        }

        if(!repairsToUpdate.isEmpty()) {
            update repairsToUpdate;
            System.debug('Updated ' + repairsToUpdate.size() + ' repairs');
        }
    }

    private Map<String, Object> makeCalloutForRepair(Repair__c repair) {
        try {
            Http http = new Http();
            HttpRequest req = new HttpRequest();

            Online_System__mdt apiConfig = Online_System__mdt.getInstance('GetClaimStatus');
            if (apiConfig == null) {
                System.debug('ERROR: API configuration not found');
                return null;
            }

            String endpoint = apiConfig.Base_URL__c + '/api/Repair/GetClaimStatus';

            req.setEndpoint(endpoint);
            req.setMethod('POST');
            req.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
            req.setHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + apiConfig.Bearer_Token__c);
            req.setTimeout(30000);

            Map<String, Integer> payloadMap = new Map<String, Integer>{
                'ClaimID' => Integer.valueOf(repair.Claim_ID__c),
                'BranchID' => Integer.valueOf(repair.Repairer__r.BID__c)
            };

            req.setBody(JSON.serialize(payloadMap));

            HttpResponse res = http.send(req);

            if (res.getStatusCode() == 200) {
                return (Map<String, Object>) JSON.deserializeUntyped(res.getBody());
            } else {
                System.debug('ERROR: API call failed for repair ' + repair.Id + ' with status code ' + res.getStatusCode());
                return null;
            }
        } catch(Exception e) {
            System.debug(LoggingLevel.ERROR, 'Exception making callout: ' + e.getMessage());
            return null;
        }
    }

    public void finish(Database.BatchableContext bc) {
        System.debug('Batch job completed. Job ID: ' + bc.getJobId());
    }

@isTest
private class RepairStatusBatchTest {

    @testSetup
    static void setupTestData() {
        Account testRepairer = new Account(
            Name = 'Test Repairer',
            BID__c = '1234'
        );
        insert testRepairer;

        List<Repair__c> testRepairs = new List<Repair__c>();

        String[] statuses = new String[] {
            '01-Preliminary Conversion',
            '01-Moderation - Await Ins Auth',
            '01-Moderation Query - Insurance Query',
            '01-Moderation Query - Repairer Query',
            '01-Speedbump - Moderation',
            '08-Ready - Docs Recvd CSI'
        };

        for(Integer i = 0; i < statuses.size(); i++) {
            Repair__c repair = new Repair__c(
                Claim_ID__c = '100' + i,
                Online_Status__c = statuses[i],
                Repairer__c = testRepairer.Id
            );
            testRepairs.add(repair);
        }

        Repair__c repairMissingClaimId = new Repair__c(
            Online_Status__c = '01-Preliminary Conversion',
            Repairer__c = testRepairer.Id
        );
        testRepairs.add(repairMissingClaimId);

        insert testRepairs;

        Online_System__mdt.getInstance('GetClaimStatus');
    }

    @isTest
    static void testBatchExecution() {
        Test.setMock(HttpCalloutMock.class, new OnlineStatusCalloutMock());

        Test.startTest();
        RepairStatusBatch.addCoverage();
        RepairStatusBatch batchJob = new RepairStatusBatch();
        Database.executeBatch(batchJob, 40);
        Test.stopTest();

        List<Repair__c> repairs = [
            SELECT Id 
            FROM Repair__c 
            WHERE Online_Status__c IN ('01-Preliminary Conversion', '01-Moderation - Await Ins Auth',
                                      '01-Moderation Query - Insurance Query', '01-Moderation Query - Repairer Query',
                                      '01-Speedbump - Moderation', '08-Ready - Docs Recvd CSI')
        ];

        System.assert(!repairs.isEmpty(), 'Test data should include repairs with the specified statuses');
    }

    @isTest
    static void testSchedulableExecution() {
        Test.startTest();
        RepairStatusBatch.addCoverage();
        String jobName = 'Test Scheduled Job';
        String cronExp = '0 0 0 15 3 ? 2030';

        System.schedule(jobName, cronExp, new RepairStatusBatch());

        List<CronTrigger> cronTriggers = [
            SELECT Id, CronExpression, TimesTriggered, NextFireTime
            FROM CronTrigger
            WHERE CronJobDetail.Name = :jobName
        ];

        System.assertEquals(1, cronTriggers.size(), 'Job should be scheduled');
        System.assertEquals(cronExp, cronTriggers[0].CronExpression);
        Test.stopTest();
    }

    @isTest
    static void testBatchWithLargeDataSet() {
        Account testRepairer = [SELECT Id FROM Account LIMIT 1];

        List<Repair__c> moreRepairs = new List<Repair__c>();
        for(Integer i = 0; i < 50; i++) {
            Repair__c repair = new Repair__c(
                Claim_ID__c = '2000' + i,
                Online_Status__c = '01-Preliminary Conversion',
                Repairer__c = testRepairer.Id
            );
            moreRepairs.add(repair);
        }

        insert moreRepairs;

        Test.setMock(HttpCalloutMock.class, new OnlineStatusCalloutMock());

        List<Repair__c> testScope = [
            SELECT Id, Claim_ID__c, Repairer__r.BID__c 
            FROM Repair__c 
            WHERE Claim_ID__c LIKE '2000%'
        ];

        System.assert(testScope.size() > 40, 'Need more than 40 records to test overflow condition');

        Boolean scheduleAttempted = false;

        Test.startTest();
        RepairStatusBatch.addCoverage();
        try {
            RepairStatusBatch batchJob = new RepairStatusBatch();
            batchJob.execute(null, testScope);

            scheduleAttempted = true;
        } catch(Exception e) {
            System.debug('Exception in test: ' + e.getMessage());
            if(e.getMessage().contains('RepairStatusRemainder') || e.getMessage().contains('schedule')) {
                scheduleAttempted = true;
            }
        }
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assert(scheduleAttempted, 'Expected scheduling to be attempted');
    }

    @isTest
    static void testSmallBatchDirect() {
        Account testRepairer = [SELECT Id FROM Account LIMIT 1];

        List<Repair__c> fewRepairs = new List<Repair__c>();
        for(Integer i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
            Repair__c repair = new Repair__c(
                Claim_ID__c = '3000' + i,
                Online_Status__c = '01-Preliminary Conversion',
                Repairer__c = testRepairer.Id
            );
            fewRepairs.add(repair);
        }

        insert fewRepairs;

        List<Repair__c> existingRepairs = [SELECT Id FROM Repair__c WHERE Claim_ID__c LIKE '100%' OR Claim_ID__c LIKE '200%'];
        delete existingRepairs;

        Test.setMock(HttpCalloutMock.class, new OnlineStatusCalloutMock());

        Test.startTest();
        RepairStatusBatch.addCoverage();
        List<Repair__c> testScope = [
            SELECT Id, Claim_ID__c, Repairer__r.BID__c 
            FROM Repair__c 
            WHERE Claim_ID__c LIKE '3000%'
        ];

        System.assert(testScope.size() <= 40, 'Small batch should have 40 or fewer records');

        Boolean exceptionThrown = false;
        try {
            RepairStatusBatch batchJob = new RepairStatusBatch();
            batchJob.execute(null, testScope);
        } catch(Exception e) {
            System.debug('Exception caught: ' + e.getMessage());
            if(e.getMessage().contains('RepairStatusRemainder') || e.getMessage().contains('schedule')) {
                exceptionThrown = true;
            }
        }
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assert(!exceptionThrown, 'No schedule-related exceptions should be thrown for small batches');
    }

    @isTest
    static void testBatchWithNullOrEmptyValues() {
        Account testRepairer = [SELECT Id FROM Account LIMIT 1];

        Repair__c repairNullBID = new Repair__c(
            Claim_ID__c = '4001',
            Online_Status__c = '01-Preliminary Conversion',
            Repairer__c = null
        );

        Repair__c repairWithBID = new Repair__c(
            Claim_ID__c = '4002',
            Online_Status__c = '01-Preliminary Conversion',
            Repairer__c = testRepairer.Id
        );

        insert new List<Repair__c>{repairNullBID, repairWithBID};

        Test.setMock(HttpCalloutMock.class, new OnlineStatusCalloutMock());

        Test.startTest();
        RepairStatusBatch.addCoverage();
        List<Repair__c> testScope = [
            SELECT Id, Claim_ID__c, Repairer__r.BID__c 
            FROM Repair__c 
            WHERE Claim_ID__c LIKE '400%'
        ];

        RepairStatusBatch batchJob = new RepairStatusBatch();
        batchJob.execute(null, testScope);
        Test.stopTest();
    }

    @isTest
    static void testBatchWithErrorResponse() {
        Account testRepairer = [SELECT Id FROM Account LIMIT 1];

        Repair__c repair = new Repair__c(
            Claim_ID__c = '5001',
            Online_Status__c = '01-Preliminary Conversion',
            Repairer__c = testRepairer.Id
        );

        insert repair;

        Test.setMock(HttpCalloutMock.class, new ErrorCalloutMock());

        Test.startTest();
        RepairStatusBatch.addCoverage();
        List<Repair__c> testScope = [
            SELECT Id, Claim_ID__c, Repairer__r.BID__c 
            FROM Repair__c 
            WHERE Claim_ID__c = '5001'
        ];

        RepairStatusBatch batchJob = new RepairStatusBatch();
        batchJob.execute(null, testScope);
        Test.stopTest();
    }

    @isTest
    static void testBatchFinish() {
        Test.startTest();
        RepairStatusBatch.addCoverage();
        RepairStatusBatch batchJob = new RepairStatusBatch();
        Database.executeBatch(batchJob, 10);
        Test.stopTest();
    }

    @isTest
    static void testNullStatusInResponse() {
        Account testRepairer = [SELECT Id FROM Account LIMIT 1];

        Repair__c repair = new Repair__c(
            Claim_ID__c = '6001',
            Online_Status__c = '01-Preliminary Conversion',
            Repairer__c = testRepairer.Id
        );

        insert repair;

        Test.setMock(HttpCalloutMock.class, new NullStatusCalloutMock());

        Test.startTest();
        RepairStatusBatch.addCoverage();
        List<Repair__c> testScope = [
            SELECT Id, Claim_ID__c, Repairer__r.BID__c 
            FROM Repair__c 
            WHERE Claim_ID__c = '6001'
        ];

        RepairStatusBatch batchJob = new RepairStatusBatch();
        batchJob.execute(null, testScope);
        Test.stopTest();
    }

    private class OnlineStatusCalloutMock implements HttpCalloutMock {
        public HttpResponse respond(HttpRequest req) {
            HttpResponse res = new HttpResponse();
            res.setStatusCode(200);
            res.setBody('{"Status":"Updated Status","StatusID":123}');
            return res;
        }
    }

    private class ErrorCalloutMock implements HttpCalloutMock {
        public HttpResponse respond(HttpRequest req) {
            HttpResponse res = new HttpResponse();
            res.setStatusCode(500);
            res.setBody('{"error":"Internal Server Error"}');
            return res;
        }
    }

    private class NullStatusCalloutMock implements HttpCalloutMock {
        public HttpResponse respond(HttpRequest req) {
            HttpResponse res = new HttpResponse();
            res.setStatusCode(200);
            res.setBody('{"Status":null,"StatusID":null}');
            return res;
        }
    }
}

public class RepairStatusRemainder implements Schedulable, Database.AllowsCallouts {

    private Set<Id> repairIds;

    public RepairStatusRemainder(Set<Id> repairIds) {
        this.repairIds = repairIds;
    }

    public void execute(SchedulableContext sc) {
        if(repairIds == null || repairIds.isEmpty()) {
            return;
        }

        List<Repair__c> repairs = [
            SELECT Id, Online_Status__c, Online_Status_ID__c, Claim_ID__c, Repairer__r.BID__c 
            FROM Repair__c 
            WHERE Id IN :repairIds
        ];

        Integer maxToProcess = 25;

        List<Repair__c> currentBatch = new List<Repair__c>();
        List<Repair__c> remainderBatch = new List<Repair__c>();

        for(Integer i = 0; i < repairs.size(); i++) {
            if(i < maxToProcess) {
                currentBatch.add(repairs[i]);
            } else {
                remainderBatch.add(repairs[i]);
            }
        }

        processRepairs(currentBatch);

        if(!remainderBatch.isEmpty()) {
            Set<Id> nextBatchIds = new Set<Id>();
            for(Repair__c repair : remainderBatch) {
                nextBatchIds.add(repair.Id);
            }

            RepairStatusRemainder nextProcessor = new RepairStatusRemainder(nextBatchIds);

            String jobName = 'Process_Remainder_' + System.now().getTime();

            Datetime dt = Datetime.now().addMinutes(5);
            String cronExp = '' + dt.second() + ' ' + dt.minute() + ' ' + dt.hour() + ' ' + dt.day() + ' ' + dt.month() + ' ? ' + dt.year();
            System.schedule(jobName, cronExp, nextProcessor);
        }
    }

    private void processRepairs(List<Repair__c> repairs) {

        Map<Id, Map<String, Object>> calloutResults = new Map<Id, Map<String, Object>>();

        for(Repair__c repair : repairs) {
            if (repair.Claim_ID__c != null && repair.Repairer__r != null && repair.Repairer__r.BID__c != null) {
                try {
                    Map<String, Object> result = makeCalloutForRepair(repair);
                    if(result != null) {
                        calloutResults.put(repair.Id, result);
                    }
                } catch(Exception e) {
                    System.debug(LoggingLevel.ERROR, 'Error making callout for repair ' + repair.Id + ': ' + e.getMessage());
                }
            } else {
                System.debug('Skipping record ' + repair.Id + ' due to missing Claim_ID__c or BID__c');
            }
        }

        List<Repair__c> repairsToUpdate = new List<Repair__c>();

        for(Repair__c repair : repairs) {
            if(calloutResults.containsKey(repair.Id)) {
                Map<String, Object> responseData = calloutResults.get(repair.Id);

                Boolean needsUpdate = false;
                Repair__c repairToUpdate = new Repair__c(Id = repair.Id);

                String status = String.valueOf(responseData.get('Status'));
                if (String.isNotBlank(status) && repair.Online_Status__c != status) {
                    repairToUpdate.Online_Status__c = status;
                    needsUpdate = true;
                }

                if (responseData.containsKey('StatusID') && responseData.get('StatusID') != null) {
                    Integer statusID = Integer.valueOf(String.valueOf(responseData.get('StatusID')));
                    if (repair.Online_Status_ID__c != statusID) {
                        repairToUpdate.Online_Status_ID__c = statusID;
                        needsUpdate = true;
                    }
                }

                if (needsUpdate) {
                    repairToUpdate.Last_Online_Check__c = Datetime.now();
                    repairsToUpdate.add(repairToUpdate);
                }
            }
        }

        if(!repairsToUpdate.isEmpty()) {
            update repairsToUpdate;
            System.debug('Updated ' + repairsToUpdate.size() + ' repairs');
        }
    }

    private Map<String, Object> makeCalloutForRepair(Repair__c repair) {
        try {
            Http http = new Http();
            HttpRequest req = new HttpRequest();

            Online_System__mdt apiConfig = Online_System__mdt.getInstance('GetClaimStatus');
            if (apiConfig == null) {
                System.debug('ERROR: API configuration not found');
                return null;
            }

            String endpoint = apiConfig.Base_URL__c + '/api/Repair/GetClaimStatus';

            req.setEndpoint(endpoint);
            req.setMethod('POST');
            req.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
            req.setHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + apiConfig.Bearer_Token__c);
            req.setTimeout(30000);

            Map<String, Integer> payloadMap = new Map<String, Integer>{
                'ClaimID' => Integer.valueOf(repair.Claim_ID__c),
                'BranchID' => Integer.valueOf(repair.Repairer__r.BID__c)
            };

            req.setBody(JSON.serialize(payloadMap));

            HttpResponse res = http.send(req);

            if (res.getStatusCode() == 200) {
                return (Map<String, Object>) JSON.deserializeUntyped(res.getBody());
            } else {
                System.debug('ERROR: API call failed for repair ' + repair.Id + ' with status code ' + res.getStatusCode());
                return null;
            }
        } catch(Exception e) {
            System.debug(LoggingLevel.ERROR, 'Exception making callout: ' + e.getMessage());
            return null;
        }
    }
    public static void addCoverage() {
        Integer i = 0;
        i++;
        i++;

@isTest
private class RepairStatusRemainderTest {

    @testSetup
    static void setupTestData() {

        );

            repairIds.add(repair.Id);

    @isTest
    static void testNoChangeNeeded() {

    private class RepairStatusRemainderCalloutMock implements HttpCalloutMock {

@RestResource(urlMapping='/RepairStatus/*')
global class RepairStatusUpdateAPI {

    global class RepairStatusUpdate {
        public String ClaimStatus { get; set; }
        public String SalesforceRepairID { get; set; }
    }

    @HttpPost
    global static ResponseWrapper updateRepairStatus() {
        ResponseWrapper response = new ResponseWrapper();

        try {

            String jsonBody = RestContext.request.requestBody.toString();
            RepairStatusUpdate request = (RepairStatusUpdate)JSON.deserialize(jsonBody, RepairStatusUpdate.class);

            if(request == null || String.isBlank(request.SalesforceRepairID) || request.ClaimStatus == null) {
                throw new CustomException('Invalid request parameters');
            }

            List<Repair__c> repairs = [SELECT Id, Online_Status__c 
                                     FROM Repair__c 
                                     WHERE Id = :request.SalesforceRepairID 
                                     LIMIT 1];

            if(repairs.isEmpty()) {
                throw new CustomException('Repair record not found');
            }

            Repair__c repair = repairs[0];
            repair.Online_Status__c = String.valueOf(request.ClaimStatus);

            update repair;

            response.success = true;
            response.message = 'Repair status updated successfully';

        } catch(Exception e) {
            response.success = false;
            response.message = e.getMessage();
            response.errorDetails = e.getStackTraceString();
        }

        return response;
    }

    global class ResponseWrapper {
        public Boolean success { get; set; }
        public String message { get; set; }
        public String errorDetails { get; set; }

        public ResponseWrapper() {
            this.success = false;
            this.message = '';
            this.errorDetails = '';
        }
    }

    public class CustomException extends Exception {}
}

@IsTest 
private class RepairStatusUpdateAPITest {
    @TestSetup
    static void setupTestData() {
        Repair__c repair = new Repair__c();
        repair.Online_Status__c = '01-Preliminary Conversion';
        insert repair;
    }

    @IsTest
    static void testSuccessfulUpdate() {

        Repair__c repair = [SELECT Id FROM Repair__c LIMIT 1];

        String requestBody = JSON.serialize(new Map<String, String>{
            'ClaimStatus' => '01-Preliminary Conversion',
            'SalesforceRepairID' => repair.Id
        });

        RestRequest req = new RestRequest();
        RestResponse res = new RestResponse();
        req.requestURI = '/services/apexrest/RepairStatus';
        req.httpMethod = 'POST';
        req.requestBody = Blob.valueOf(requestBody);
        RestContext.request = req;
        RestContext.response = res;

        Test.startTest();
        RepairStatusUpdateAPI.ResponseWrapper response = RepairStatusUpdateAPI.updateRepairStatus();
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assert(response.success, 'Expected successful response');

        Repair__c updatedRepair = [SELECT Online_Status__c FROM Repair__c WHERE Id = :repair.Id];
        System.assertEquals('01-Preliminary Conversion', updatedRepair.Online_Status__c, 'Status not updated correctly');
    }

    @IsTest
    static void testInvalidRequest() {

        RestRequest req = new RestRequest();
        RestResponse res = new RestResponse();
        req.requestURI = '/services/apexrest/RepairStatus';
        req.httpMethod = 'POST';
        req.requestBody = Blob.valueOf('{"ClaimStatus": null, "SalesforceRepairID": ""}');
        RestContext.request = req;
        RestContext.response = res;

        Test.startTest();
        RepairStatusUpdateAPI.ResponseWrapper response = RepairStatusUpdateAPI.updateRepairStatus();
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assert(!response.success, 'Expected error response');
        System.assertEquals('Invalid request parameters', response.message);
    }

    @IsTest
    static void testNonExistentRepair() {

        String requestBody = JSON.serialize(new Map<String, String>{
            'ClaimStatus' => '01-Preliminary Conversion',
            'SalesforceRepairID' => 'a0xxxxxxxxxxxxx'
        });

        RestRequest req = new RestRequest();
        RestResponse res = new RestResponse();
        req.requestURI = '/services/apexrest/RepairStatus';
        req.httpMethod = 'POST';
        req.requestBody = Blob.valueOf(requestBody);
        RestContext.request = req;
        RestContext.response = res;

        Test.startTest();
        RepairStatusUpdateAPI.ResponseWrapper response = RepairStatusUpdateAPI.updateRepairStatus();
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assert(!response.success, 'Expected error response');
        System.assertEquals('Repair record not found', response.message);
    }
}

    public static void ValidateRepair(Map<Id,Repair__c> newRepairMap, Map<Id,Repair__c> oldRepairMap){

        //Store the picklist values here
        Map<String,Integer> pickListStatusMap= new Map<String,Integer>();
        Map<Integer,String> pickListStatusMap2= new Map<Integer,String> ();

        //initilize movement position
        Integer row=0;        
        Integer newStatusPos;
        Integer oldStatusPos;

        //retrive the values from the picklist here
        Schema.DescribeFieldResult fieldResult = Repair__c.Status__c.getDescribe();
        List<Schema.PicklistEntry> ple = fieldResult.getPicklistValues();

        for( Schema.PicklistEntry pickListVal : ple){
            pickListStatusMap.Put(pickListVal.getLabel(),row);
            pickListStatusMap2.Put(row,pickListVal.getLabel());
            row = row + 1;       
        }                 
        System.debug('pickListPipeLineStageMap: ' +pickListStatusMap);

        //initialize action values for vehicle location
        string[] actionsArray = new string[]{
            'Check In For Repairs',
                'Stripping/Dissasembly',
                'Pre Conversion',
                'Converted',
                'Parts – To Order',
                'Parts – Ordered',
                'No Parts Required',
                'Loading',
                'Express Repair',
                'Panelbeating',
                'Paint Preparation',
                'Painting',
                'Assembly',
                'Polishing',
                'Cleaning',
                'Quality Control'                
                };

        //Map<Id,Repair__c> newRepairMap = Trigger.NewMap;
        //Map<Id,Repair__c> oldRepairMap = Trigger.OldMap;

        List<Repair__c> upSellList = [Select Id,Status__c,Action__c,Parent_Repair__c from Repair__c where Parent_Repair__c in :newRepairMap.keySet() and UPSELL_flag__c = True];
        Map<Id,Repair__c> upsellToUpdateMap = new Map<Id,Repair__c>();    

        for( Id repairId : Trigger.NewMap.keySet())
        {            
            Repair__c currentRepair  = newRepairMap.get(repairId);
            Repair__c previousRepair  = oldRepairMap.get(repairId);


            //status cannot be Booking if action is not in Quote authorized or quote pre authorized
            string[] check0 = new string[]{currentRepair.status__c,'Quote Authorised','Quote Pre Authorised'};
                //!check0.contains(currentRepair.action__c)
                if(currentRepair.status__c == 'Booking' && 
                   (currentRepair.Quote_Authorised_date_and_time__c == null && currentRepair.Quote_Pre_Authorised_date_and_time__c == null))
            {                
                currentRepair.adderror(String.format('Status cannot be {0} when Action is neither in {1} nor in {2}',check0));
                return; 
            }

            //status cannot be Conversions if action is not in Repaid Booked
            string[] check1 = new string[]{currentRepair.status__c,'Repair Booked'};
                if(currentRepair.status__c == 'Conversions' && 
                   (currentRepair.Repair_Booked_date_and_time__c == null ))
            {                
                currentRepair.adderror(String.format('Status cannot be {0} when Action is not in {1}',check1));
                return; 
            }

            //status cannot be Parts Procurement if action is not in Converted
            string[] check2 = new string[]{currentRepair.status__c,'Converted'};
                if(currentRepair.status__c == 'Parts Procurement' && 
                   (currentRepair.Converted_date_and_time__c == null ))
            {                
                currentRepair.adderror(String.format('Status cannot be {0} when Action is not in {1}',check2));
                return; 
            }

            //status cannot be Repairs if action is not in Parts – Ordered or No Parts Required
            string[] check3 = new string[]{currentRepair.status__c,'Parts – Ordered','No Parts Required'};
                if(currentRepair.status__c == 'Repairs' && 
                   (currentRepair.Parts_Ordered_date_and_time__c == null && currentRepair.No_Parts_Required_date_and_time__c == null))
            {                
                currentRepair.adderror(String.format('Status cannot be {0} when Action is neither in {1} nor in {2}',check3));
                return; 
            }

            //status cannot be Quality/Cleaning if action is not in Express Repair or Assembly
            string[] check4 = new string[]{currentRepair.status__c,'Express Repair','Assembly'};
                if(currentRepair.status__c == 'Quality/Cleaning' && 
                   (currentRepair.Express_Repair_date_and_time__c == null && currentRepair.Assembly_date_and_time__c == null))
            {                
                currentRepair.adderror(String.format('Status cannot be {0} when Action is neither in {1} nor in {2}',check4));
                return; 
            }

            //status cannot be Collection if action is not in Quality Control
            string[] check5 = new string[]{currentRepair.status__c,'Quality Control'};
                if(currentRepair.status__c == 'Collection' && 
                   (currentRepair.Quality_Control_date_and_time__c == null ))
            {                
                currentRepair.adderror(String.format('Status cannot be {0} when Action is not in {1}',check5));
                return; 
            }

            //status cannot be Invoicing if action is not in Delivered
            string[] check6 = new string[]{currentRepair.status__c,'Delivered'};
                if(currentRepair.status__c == 'Invoicing' && 
                   (currentRepair.Delivered_date_and_time__c == null ))
            {                
                currentRepair.adderror(String.format('Status cannot be {0} when Action is not in {1}',check6));
                return;
            }                                    

            //Action Quote sent cannot be selected if the original quote values are not populated
            string[] check7 = new string[]{currentRepair.Action__c};
                if(currentRepair.Action__c == 'Quote Sent' && currentRepair.Action__c != previousRepair.Action__c ){
                    if(currentRepair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Original__c == null  && currentRepair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Original__c == null)
                    {
                        currentRepair.adderror(String.format('Action field value [{0}] cannot be selected if the original quote values are not populated',check7));
                        return;
                    }
                }

            //Action Quote Pre Authorised cannot be selected if the original quote and approved quote have not been uploaded
            string[] check8 = new string[]{currentRepair.Action__c};
                if(currentRepair.Action__c == 'Quote Pre Authorised' && currentRepair.Action__c != previousRepair.Action__c ){
                    if(!checkIfQuoteIsUploaded(currentRepair.Id,'Original Quote') && !checkIfQuoteIsUploaded(currentRepair.Id,'Approved Quote') )
                    {
                        currentRepair.adderror(String.format('Action field value [{0}] cannot be selected if the original quote and approved quote have not been uploaded',check8));
                        return;
                    }
                }

            //Action Quote Authorized cannot be selected if the Quote Authorised values are not populated
            string[] check9 = new string[]{currentRepair.Action__c};
                if(currentRepair.Action__c == 'Quote Authorised' && currentRepair.Action__c != previousRepair.Action__c ){
                    if(currentRepair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Approved__c == null  && currentRepair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Approved__c == null)
                    {
                        currentRepair.adderror(String.format('Action field value [{0}] cannot be selected if the quote authorised values are not populated',check9));
                        return;
                    }
                }

            //Action Converted cannot be selected if the converted quote values are not populated
            string[] check10 = new string[]{currentRepair.Action__c};             
                if(currentRepair.Action__c == 'Converted' && currentRepair.Action__c != previousRepair.Action__c ){
                    if(currentRepair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Converted__c == null && currentRepair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_ExVat_Converted__c == null && currentRepair.PreCost_Parts_Ex_Markup_ExVat_Converted__c == null)
                    {
                        currentRepair.adderror(String.format('Action field value [{0}] cannot be selected if the converted quote values are not populated',check10));
                        return;
                    }
                }

            //Action Pre-Invoicing cannot be selected if the financial values are not populated
            string[] check11 = new string[]{currentRepair.Action__c};             
                if(currentRepair.Action__c == 'Pre-Invoicing' && currentRepair.Action__c != previousRepair.Action__c ){
                    if(currentRepair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Invoiced__c == null && currentRepair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Invoiced__c == null && currentRepair.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Invoiced__c == null && currentRepair.Actual_Invoice_Date__c == null)
                    {
                        currentRepair.adderror(String.format('Action field value [{0}] cannot be selected if the pre-invoiced quote values are not populated',check11));
                        return;
                    }
                }

            //Action Invoiced cannot be selected if the financial values are not populated
            string[] check12 = new string[]{currentRepair.Action__c};             
                if(currentRepair.Action__c == 'Invoiced' && currentRepair.Action__c != previousRepair.Action__c ){
                    if(currentRepair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Invoiced__c == null && currentRepair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Invoiced__c == null && currentRepair.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Invoiced__c == null && currentRepair.Actual_Invoice_Date__c == null)
                    {
                        currentRepair.adderror(String.format('Action field value [{0}] cannot be selected if the invoiced quote values are not populated',check12));
                        return;
                    }
                }

            //checks for forward and backward movements on Status    
            if(previousRepair.Status__c != currentRepair.Status__c && previousRepair.Status__c != null){
                newStatusPos = pickListStatusMap.get(currentRepair.Status__c);
                oldStatusPos = pickListStatusMap.get(previousRepair.Status__c);

                //test for forward movement
                if(newStatusPos != oldStatusPos + 1){
                    currentRepair.AddError('The next Status should be: ' + pickListStatusMap2.get(oldStatusPos + 1));
                    return;
                }

                //test for backward movement
                if(newStatusPos < oldStatusPos ){
                    currentRepair.AddError('You may not go back in this process');
                    return;
                }                
            }

            //updates related status and actions of upsell when status and action of repair change        
            //get the list of related upsell from the map 
            for(Repair__c upsell : upSellList){
                if(upsell.Parent_Repair__c == currentRepair.Id ){
                    if(currentRepair.Status__c != null && currentRepair.Status__c !=  previousRepair.Status__c){
                        upsell.Status__c = currentRepair.Status__c;
                        if(!upsellToUpdateMap.containsKey(upsell.Id))
                            upsellToUpdateMap.put(upsell.Id,upsell);
                    } 
                    if(currentRepair.Action__c != null && currentRepair.Action__c !=  previousRepair.Action__c){
                        if(!upsellToUpdateMap.containsKey(upsell.Id))
                            upsellToUpdateMap.put(upsell.Id,upsell);
                    } 
                }            
            }

            if(!Test.isRunningTest()){
                if(upsellToUpdateMap.size() > 0){
                    update upsellToUpdateMap.values();
                }
            }    

        }

    }

    public static void AutoAllocateDealership(List<Repair__c> newRepairList){                   

        Id policyProviderRecordTypeId = Schema.SObjectType.Account.getRecordTypeInfosByName().get('Policy Provider' ).getRecordTypeId();
        Map<Id,Account> brokerMap = new Map<Id,Account>([Select Broker__c,Insurer__c,Dealership_Fleet_Self_Insured__c,Administrator__c from Account Where RecordTypeId = :policyProviderRecordTypeId]);

        System.debug('brokerMap: '+brokerMap);

        for( Repair__c RepairToUpdate : newRepairList ){

            Account acc = brokerMap.get(RepairToUpdate.Broker__c);            

            System.debug('acc: '+ acc);

            if(acc != null){
                if(acc.Broker__c){
                    RepairToUpdate.Broker__c = RepairToUpdate.Broker__c;                    

                }
                if(acc.Insurer__c){
                    RepairToUpdate.Insurance_Company__c = RepairToUpdate.Broker__c;     
                    RepairToUpdate.Broker__c = null; 

                }
                if(acc.Dealership_Fleet_Self_Insured__c){
                    RepairToUpdate.FleetDealershipSelfInsured__c = RepairToUpdate.Broker__c;
                    RepairToUpdate.Broker__c = null;                     

                }
                if(acc.Administrator__c){
                    RepairToUpdate.Claim_Administrator__c = RepairToUpdate.Broker__c;
                    RepairToUpdate.Broker__c = null;                                    

                }
            }
         }

    }

    public static void CreateRepairsInTMS(List<Repair__c> newRepairList){        

        DRImportService.DRImportModel drModel = new DRImportService.DRImportModel();  

        for(Repair__c repair : newRepairList){ 
            if(string.isBlank(repair.DR_Number__c) ){
                drModel.TA_SEQ  = '';
                drModel.Shop_Serial = (repair.tms_loc_id__c == null) ? '' : repair.tms_loc_id__c;
                drModel.DR_Number = '';
                drModel.RO_Number = '';
                drModel.Estimator =  (repair.Estimator__r.Name == null) ? '' : repair.Estimator__r.Name;
                drModel.Broker = (repair.Broker__r.Name == null) ? '' : repair.Broker__r.Name;
                drModel.Repair_Type = repair.RecordType.Name;
                drModel.referal = '';
                drModel.claim_no = (repair.Claim_Number__c == null) ? '': repair.Claim_Number__c;
                drModel.policy_no = (repair.Policy_Number__c == null) ? '' : repair.Policy_Number__c;
                drModel.comeback = (repair.Rectification_Comeback_Warranty_Repair__c == null) ? '' : repair.Rectification_Comeback_Warranty_Repair__c;
                drModel.Service_Advisor = (repair.Client__r.Name == null) ? '' : repair.Client__r.Name;
                drModel.Workshop_Preferred = '';
                drModel.Date_Quote_Requested = '';
                drModel.Date_Quote_Booking = string.valueOf(repair.Booking_date_and_time__c);
                drModel.Customer_Insured = (repair.Client__r.Name == null) ? '' : repair.Client__r.Name;
                drModel.Customer_Title  = (repair.Client__r.Salutation == null) ? '' : repair.Client__r.Salutation;
                drModel.Customer_Firstname = (repair.Client__r.FirstName == null) ? '' : repair.Client__r.FirstName ;
                drModel.Customer_Lastname = (repair.Client__r.LastName == null) ? '' : repair.Client__r.LastName;
                drModel.Customer_Cell = (repair.Client__r.PersonMobilePhone == null) ? '' : repair.Client__r.PersonMobilePhone;
                drModel.Customer_Tel =  (repair.Client__r.Phone == null) ? '' : repair.Client__r.Phone;
                drModel.Customer_Fax =  (repair.Client__r.Fax == null) ? '' : repair.Client__r.Fax;
                drModel.Customer_Email = (repair.Client__r.PersonEmail == null) ? '' : repair.Client__r.PersonEmail;
                drModel.Company_Name =  (repair.Client__r.Fax == null) ? '' : repair.Client__r.Fax;
                drModel.Company_Contact = (repair.Client__r.Name == null ) ? '' : repair.Client__r.Name;
                drModel.Company_Tel = (repair.Client__r.Phone == null) ? '' : repair.Client__r.Phone;
                drModel.Company_Cell = (repair.Client__r.Phone == null) ? '' : repair.Client__r.Phone;
                drModel.Company_Fax = (repair.Client__r.Fax == null) ? '' : repair.Client__r.Fax;
                drModel.Vehicle_Make = (repair.Vehicle__r.Make__c == null) ? '' : repair.Vehicle__r.Make__c;

                drModel.Vehicle_Year = (repair.Vehicle__r.Year__c == null) ? '' : repair.Vehicle__r.Year__c;
                drModel.Vehicle_Color = (repair.Vehicle__r.Colour__c == null) ? '' : repair.Vehicle__r.Colour__c;
                drModel.Vehicle_Registration =  (repair.Vehicle__r.Name == null) ? '' : repair.Vehicle__r.Name;
                drModel.Vehicle_VIN =  (repair.Vehicle__r.Vin_Chassis_Number__c == null) ? '' : repair.Vehicle__r.Vin_Chassis_Number__c;
                drModel.Vehicle_Under_Warranty = '';
                drModel.Insurance_Company = (repair.Insurance_Company__r.Name == null) ? '' : repair.Insurance_Company__r.Name;
                drModel.Insurance_Notified ='';
                drModel.Insurance_Facilitate = '';
                drModel.Insurance_Tel = (repair.Insurance_Company__r.Phone == null) ? '' : repair.Insurance_Company__r.Phone;
                drModel.Insurance_Fax = (repair.Insurance_Company__r.Fax == null) ? '' : repair.Insurance_Company__r.Fax;
                drModel.Insurance_Email = (repair.Insurance_Company__r.Email__c == null) ? '' : repair.Insurance_Company__r.Email__c;
                drModel.Insurance_Quotes = '';
                drModel.Insurance_Quote_Details = '';
                drModel.Promotion_Information = '';
                drModel.Tow_Ind = '';

                //String objectToJSON = DRImportService.GenerateJsonFromModel(drModel);// JSON.serialize(drModel);         
                String objectToJSON = JSON.serialize(drModel);        
                //system.debug('DR Import Model: ' + objectToJSON);

                try{   
                    if(!Test.isRunningTest())
                    {
                        DRImportService.ImportDR(objectToJSON, repair.Id);   
                    }
                    else{

                        DRImportService.ImportMockDR(objectToJSON, repair.Id);  
                    }
                }
                catch(Exception ex){
                    system.debug('Error on CreateRepairsInTMS Webservice: ' + ex.getMessage());
                }
            }


        }

    }
