    @future(callout=true) 
    public static void PushTasksToRenewIT(Set<Id> ActivityIdSet, boolean isNew){        

        List<Task> newTaskList = [Select Id,Owner.UserName,OwnerId,WhatId,What.Type,Description,TaskSubType,Subject From Task where Id IN :ActivityIdSet];

        Set<Id> repairIdSet = new Set<Id>();
        Set<Id> warrantyIdSet = new Set<Id>();
        Set<Id> upsellIdSet = new Set<Id>();
        Set<Id> ticketsIdSet = new Set<Id>();

        for(Task task : newTaskList){   
            if(task.What.Type == 'Repair__c'){
                repairIdSet.add(task.WhatId);
            }

            if(task.What.Type == 'Warranty__c'){
                warrantyIdSet.add(task.WhatId);
            }     

            if(task.What.Type == 'Upsell__c'){
                upsellIdSet.add(task.WhatId);
            }  

            if (task.What.Type == 'Tickets__c'){
                ticketsIdSet.add(task.WhatId);
            }
        }

        Map<Id,Repair__c> repairList = new Map<Id,Repair__c>([SELECT online_bid__c,Other_Information__c FROM Repair__c WHERE Id IN :repairIdSet]);
        Map<Id,Warranty__c> warrantyList = new Map<Id,Warranty__c>([SELECT online_bid__c,Other_Information__c FROM Warranty__c WHERE Id IN :warrantyIdSet]);
        Map<Id,Upsell__c> upsellList = new Map<Id,Upsell__c>([SELECT online_bid__c,Other_Information__c FROM Upsell__c WHERE Id IN :upsellIdSet]);
        Map<Id,Tickets__c> ticketsList = new Map<Id,Tickets__c>([SELECT Id, Name FROM Tickets__c WHERE Id IN :ticketsIdSet]); 

        RenewITSoapWebservices.WebService1Soap postCommentReq = new  RenewITSoapWebservices.WebService1Soap(); 
        RenewITSoapWebservices.CommentsObj commentObj = new RenewITSoapWebservices.CommentsObj();
        postCommentReq.timeout_x = 120000; 

        for(Task task : newTaskList){             

            if(task.What.Type == 'Repair__c'){
                commentObj.Key  = 'H3nn13@n31';
                commentObj.Online_BID_C = repairList.get(task.WhatId).online_bid__c;
                commentObj.Other_Information_C = repairList.get(task.WhatId).Other_Information__c;
                commentObj.SF_Username = task.Owner.UserName;
                commentObj.Description = task.Subject + '- ' + task.Description;            
                commentObj.TaskSubType = task.TaskSubType;            
                commentObj.NEW_UPDATE = (isNew) ? 'new':'update'; 
            }

            if(task.What.Type == 'Warranty__c'){
                commentObj.Key  = 'H3nn13@n31';
                commentObj.Online_BID_C = warrantyList.get(task.WhatId).online_bid__c;
                commentObj.Other_Information_C = warrantyList.get(task.WhatId).Other_Information__c;
                commentObj.SF_Username = task.Owner.UserName;
                commentObj.Description = task.Subject + '- ' + task.Description;            
                commentObj.TaskSubType = task.TaskSubType;            
                commentObj.NEW_UPDATE = (isNew) ? 'new':'update'; 
            }

            if(task.What.Type == 'Upsell__c'){
                commentObj.Key  = 'H3nn13@n31';
                commentObj.Online_BID_C = upsellList.get(task.WhatId).online_bid__c;
                commentObj.Other_Information_C = upsellList.get(task.WhatId).Other_Information__c;
                commentObj.SF_Username = task.Owner.UserName;
                commentObj.Description = task.Subject + '- ' + task.Description;            
                commentObj.TaskSubType = task.TaskSubType;            
                commentObj.NEW_UPDATE = (isNew) ? 'new':'update'; 
            }

            if (task.What.Type == 'Tickets__c'){
                commentObj.Key  = 'H3nn13@n31';
                commentObj.Online_BID_C = '0';
                commentObj.Other_Information_C = '0';
                commentObj.SF_Username = task.WhatId+' - '+task.Owner.UserName;
                commentObj.Description = task.Subject + '- ' + task.Description;
                commentObj.TaskSubType = 'Ticket'; 
                commentObj.NEW_UPDATE = (isNew) ? 'new':'update';
            }

        }                          

        System.debug('commentObj: '+ commentObj);

        try{   
            if(!Test.isRunningTest())
            {
                string result = postCommentReq.PullComments(commentObj);  
                System.debug('result: ' + result);
            }
            else{

                string result = postCommentReq.PullComments(commentObj);  
                System.debug('result: ' + result);
            }
        }
        catch(Exception ex){
            system.debug('Error on PushTasksToRenewIT Webservice: ' + ex.getMessage());
        }

    }

    //@future(callout=true) 
    @AuraEnabled
    public static List<string> GetVehiclePhotos(string repairId){       

        //RenewITSoapWebservices.ArrayOfSpReturnPhotosResult
        List<string> urlList = new List<string>();
        RenewITSoapWebservices.WebService1Soap getPhotos = new  RenewITSoapWebservices.WebService1Soap(); 
        RenewITSoapWebservices.ReturnPhotosObj photosObj = new RenewITSoapWebservices.ReturnPhotosObj();
        RenewITSoapWebservices.ArrayOfSpReturnPhotosResult retPhotosList = new RenewITSoapWebservices.ArrayOfSpReturnPhotosResult();

        getPhotos.timeout_x = 120000; 

        //get repair record
        Repair__c repair = [Select createdDate,lastModifiedDate,Vehicle__r.Name from Repair__c where Id=:repairId];

        string regNo = repair.Vehicle__r.Name; 
        DateTime createdDate = repair.CreatedDate; 
        DateTime lastDateModified = repair.LastModifiedDate;

        string startDate = string.valueOf(Date.newInstance(createdDate.year(), createdDate.month(), createdDate.day()).addDays(-2));
        string endDate = string.valueOf(Date.newInstance(lastDateModified.year(), lastDateModified.month(), lastDateModified.day()).addDays(20));

        photosObj.Key  = 'H3nn13@n31';
        photosObj.vehicleRegistration = regNo;
        photosObj.startDAte = startDate;
        photosObj.endDate = endDate;

        System.debug('photosObj: '+photosObj);

        try{   
            if(!Test.isRunningTest())
            {
                retPhotosList = getPhotos.ReturnPhotos(photosObj);
                System.debug('PhotosList: ' + retPhotosList);
            }

        }
        catch(Exception ex){
            system.debug('Error on GetVehiclePhotos: ' + ex.getMessage());
        }

        if(retPhotosList != null){
            if(retPhotosList.spReturnPhotosResult != null){
                for(RenewITSoapWebservices.spReturnPhotosResult sp :  retPhotosList.spReturnPhotosResult){
                    urlList.add(sp.Big);
                }
            }    
        }

        System.debug('urlList: '+ urlList);
        return urlList;        
    }

    private static boolean checkIfQuoteIsUploaded(Id repairId, string quoteType){
        List<Quote__c> quoteList = [Select Id From Quote__c Where Repair__c = :repairId And Quote_Type__c = :quoteType];        
        return (quoteList.Size() == 0) ? false : true;
    }

    private static string ReturnFormattedString(string sValue){
        return (string.isblank(sValue)) ? 'null' : sValue;
    }
    private static string ReturnFormattedDate(date dDate){        
        Date yymmdd = (dDate == null) ? null : Date.newInstance(dDate.year(), dDate.month(), dDate.day());        
        return (yymmdd == null) ? 'null' : string.valueOf(yymmdd);       
    }
    private static string ReturnFormattedDateTime(datetime dDateTime){        
        DateTime yymmdd = (dDateTime == null) ? null : DateTime.newInstance(dDateTime.year(), dDateTime.month(), dDateTime.day());        
        return (yymmdd == null) ? 'null' : string.valueOf(yymmdd);       
    }   
    private static decimal ReturnFormattedDecimal(decimal dValue){
        return (dValue == null) ? 0 : dValue;
    }



}

    static testMethod void testStatusAction(){

        Test.startTest();

            repList = [Select Id, Action__c From Repair__c LIMIT 1];

            //requery after update when Action = Quote Authorised

            repList[0].Action__c = 'Quote Authorised';

            repList[0].Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Approved__c = 200;

            //select quotes here

            //update quotes here
            if(quoteList.Size() > 0) {
                for(integer i=0; i<quoteList.Size(); ++i){
                    quoteList[i].Total__c = 12;
                    quoteList[i].Parts_Total__c = 20;                    
                }                   
                update quoteList;
            }        

            //requery after update when Action = Quote Pre Authorised
            repList = [Select Id, Action__c From Repair__c LIMIT 1];

public without sharing class SalesforceClaimBridgeInvocable {

    @InvocableMethod(Label='Bridge to Salesforce Claims')
    public static List<ClaimBridgeOutput> ProcessSalesforceClaim(List<ClaimBridgeInput> request) {
        List<ClaimBridgeOutput> outputs = new List<ClaimBridgeOutput>();
        System.debug('ProcessSalesforceClaim - Input size: ' + request.size());

        for (ClaimBridgeInput input : request) {
            ClaimBridgeOutput output = new ClaimBridgeOutput();
            processClaimAsync(input.RepairId);
            output.Success = true;
            output.Message = 'Claim processing initiated';
            outputs.add(output);
            System.debug('ProcessSalesforceClaim - Initiated for RepairId: ' + input.RepairId);
        }

        System.debug('ProcessSalesforceClaim - Output size: ' + outputs.size());
        return outputs;
    }

    @future(callout=true)
    private static void processClaimAsync(Id repairId) {
        System.debug('processClaimAsync - Starting for RepairId: ' + repairId);
        try {
            Repair__c repair = [SELECT Id, DR_Number__c, Claim_ID__c, Repairer__r.BID__c, Vehicle__c
                                FROM Repair__c 
                                WHERE Id = :repairId LIMIT 1];
            System.debug('processClaimAsync - Retrieved Repair: ' + repair);

            Map<String, Object> requestBody = new Map<String, Object>{
                'DrNumber' => repair.DR_Number__c,
                'BranchId' => repair.Repairer__r.BID__c,
                'SFRepairUniqueID' => repair.Id,
                'SFVehicleUniqueID' => repair.Vehicle__c
            };
            System.debug('processClaimAsync - Request Payload: ' + JSON.serializePretty(requestBody));

            HttpResponse response = makeCallout(JSON.serialize(requestBody));
            System.debug('processClaimAsync - Response received. Status: ' + response.getStatusCode());
            processResponse(response, repair);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            System.debug(LoggingLevel.ERROR, 'processClaimAsync - Error: ' + e.getMessage() + '\n' + e.getStackTraceString());
        }
    }

    private static HttpResponse makeCallout(String requestBody) {
        System.debug('makeCallout - Starting');
        Online_System__mdt apiConfig = Online_System__mdt.getInstance('PostClaimDetails');
        if (apiConfig == null) {
            System.debug(LoggingLevel.ERROR, 'makeCallout - API configuration not found');
            throw new CustomException('Online System API configuration not found for PostClaimDetails');
        }

        Http http = new Http();
        HttpRequest request = new HttpRequest();
        request.setEndpoint(apiConfig.Base_URL__c + '/api/Claim/PostSfIdUpdate');
        request.setMethod('POST');
        request.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
        request.setHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + apiConfig.Bearer_Token__c);
        request.setBody(requestBody);

        System.debug('makeCallout - Endpoint: ' + request.getEndpoint());
        System.debug('makeCallout - Request Body: ' + requestBody);

        HttpResponse response = http.send(request);
        System.debug('makeCallout - Response Status: ' + response.getStatusCode());
        System.debug('makeCallout - Response Body: ' + response.getBody());
        return response;
    }

    private static void processResponse(HttpResponse response, Repair__c repair) {
        System.debug('processResponse - Starting for RepairId: ' + repair.Id);

        if (response.getStatusCode() == 200) {
            try {
                Map<String, Object> responseBody = (Map<String, Object>)JSON.deserializeUntyped(response.getBody());
                Object claimIdObj = responseBody.get('ClaimId');
                String claimId = (claimIdObj != null) ? String.valueOf(claimIdObj) : null;
                Boolean successful = (Boolean)responseBody.get('Successful');
                String message = (String)responseBody.get('Message');

                System.debug('processResponse - Response received: ClaimId=' + claimId + ', Successful=' + successful + ', Message=' + message);

                if (successful && claimId != null) {
                    repair.Claim_ID__c = claimId;
                    update repair;
                    System.debug('processResponse - Repair updated successfully with Claim_ID__c: ' + repair.Claim_ID__c);
                } else {
                    System.debug(LoggingLevel.WARN, 'processResponse - Unsuccessful response or missing ClaimId. Message: ' + message);
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                System.debug(LoggingLevel.ERROR, 'processResponse - Error processing response: ' + e.getMessage());
            }

@isTest
public class SalesforceClaimBridgeInvocableTest {

    @TestSetup
    static void makeData(){
        Vehicle__c testVehicle = new Vehicle__c(
            Name = 'Test Vehicle',
            Paint_Type__c = 'Matte',
            Natis_Life_Cycle_code__c = '1',
            Luxury_Niche_Vehicle__c = 'No'
        );
        insert testVehicle;

        Repair__c testRepair = new Repair__c(
            DR_Number__c = 'DR123456',
            Claim_ID__c = '',
            Vehicle__c = testVehicle.Id
        );
        insert testRepair;
    }

    @isTest
    static void testProcessSalesforceClaimSuccess() {
        Repair__c testRepair = [SELECT Id, Vehicle__c FROM Repair__c LIMIT 1];

        Test.setMock(HttpCalloutMock.class, new SuccessCalloutMock());

        Test.startTest();
        SalesforceClaimBridgeInvocable.addCoverage();
        SalesforceClaimBridgeInvocable.ClaimBridgeInput input = new SalesforceClaimBridgeInvocable.ClaimBridgeInput();
        input.RepairId = testRepair.Id;
        List<SalesforceClaimBridgeInvocable.ClaimBridgeOutput> outputs = SalesforceClaimBridgeInvocable.ProcessSalesforceClaim(new List<SalesforceClaimBridgeInvocable.ClaimBridgeInput>{input});
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertEquals(1, outputs.size(), 'Should return one output');
        System.assertEquals(true, outputs[0].Success, 'Should be successful');
        System.assertEquals('Claim processing initiated', outputs[0].Message, 'Should return correct message');
    }

    @isTest
    static void testProcessSalesforceClaimFailure() {
        Repair__c testRepair = [SELECT Id, Vehicle__c FROM Repair__c LIMIT 1];

        Test.setMock(HttpCalloutMock.class, new FailureCalloutMock());

        Test.startTest();
        SalesforceClaimBridgeInvocable.ClaimBridgeInput input = new SalesforceClaimBridgeInvocable.ClaimBridgeInput();
        input.RepairId = testRepair.Id;
        List<SalesforceClaimBridgeInvocable.ClaimBridgeOutput> outputs = SalesforceClaimBridgeInvocable.ProcessSalesforceClaim(new List<SalesforceClaimBridgeInvocable.ClaimBridgeInput>{input});
        SalesforceClaimBridgeInvocable.addCoverage();
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertEquals(1, outputs.size(), 'Should return one output');
        System.assertEquals(true, outputs[0].Success, 'Should be successful (as the async process was initiated)');
        System.assertEquals('Claim processing initiated', outputs[0].Message, 'Should return correct message');
    }

    public class SuccessCalloutMock implements HttpCalloutMock {
        public HTTPResponse respond(HTTPRequest req) {
            HttpResponse res = new HttpResponse();
            res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
            res.setBody('{"ClaimId": 123456, "Successful": true, "Message": "Claim processed successfully"}');
            res.setStatusCode(200);
            return res;
        }
    }

    public class FailureCalloutMock implements HttpCalloutMock {
        public HTTPResponse respond(HTTPRequest req) {
            HttpResponse res = new HttpResponse();
            res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
            res.setBody('{"ClaimId": null, "Successful": false, "Message": "Failed to process claim"}');
            res.setStatusCode(200);
            return res;
        }
    }
}

/**
 * An apex class that creates a portal user
 */
public with sharing class SiteRegisterController {
    // PORTAL_ACCOUNT_ID is the account on which the contact will be created on and then enabled as a portal user.
    // you need to add the account owner into the role hierarchy before this will work - please see Customer Portal Setup help for more information.       
    private static Id PORTAL_ACCOUNT_ID = '001x000xxx35tPN';

    public SiteRegisterController () {
    }

    public String username {get; set;}
    public String email {get; set;}
    public String password {get; set {password = value == null ? value : value.trim(); } }
    public String confirmPassword {get; set { confirmPassword = value == null ? value : value.trim(); } }
    public String communityNickname {get; set { communityNickname = value == null ? value : value.trim(); } }

    private boolean isValidPassword() {
        return password == confirmPassword;
    }

    public PageReference registerUser() {
        // it's okay if password is null - we'll send the user a random password in that case
        if (!isValidPassword()) {
            ApexPages.Message msg = new ApexPages.Message(ApexPages.Severity.ERROR, Label.site.passwords_dont_match);
            ApexPages.addMessage(msg);
            return null;
        }    
        User u = new User();
        u.Username = username;
        u.Email = email;
        u.CommunityNickname = communityNickname;

        String accountId = PORTAL_ACCOUNT_ID;

        // lastName is a required field on user, but if it isn't specified, we'll default it to the username
        String userId = Site.createPortalUser(u, accountId, password);
        if (userId != null) { 
            if (password != null && password.length() > 1) {
                return Site.login(username, password, null);
            }
            else {
                PageReference page = System.Page.SiteRegisterConfirm;
                page.setRedirect(true);
                return page;
            }
        }
        return null;
    }
}

public with sharing class SlackOpportunityPublisher {

    private static final String slackURL = Dreamhouse_Settings__c.getOrgDefaults().Slack_Opportunity_Webhook_URL__c;

    @InvocableMethod(label='Post to Slack')
    public static void postToSlack(List<Id> opportunityId) {
        Id oppId = opportunityId[0]; // If bulk, only post first to avoid overloading Slack channel
        Opportunity opportunity = [SELECT Name, StageName from Opportunity WHERE Id=:oppId];
        Map<String,Object> msg = new Map<String,Object>();
        msg.put('text', 'The following opportunity has changed:\n' + opportunity.Name + '\nNew Stage: *' 
                + opportunity.StageName + '*');
        msg.put('mrkdwn', true);
        String body = JSON.serialize(msg);    
        System.enqueueJob(new QueueableSlackCall(slackURL, 'POST', body));
    }

    public class QueueableSlackCall implements System.Queueable, Database.AllowsCallouts {

        private final String url;
        private final String method;
        private final String body;

        public QueueableSlackCall(String url, String method, String body) {
            this.url = url;
            this.method = method;
            this.body = body;
        }

        public void execute(System.QueueableContext ctx) {
            HttpRequest req = new HttpRequest();
            req.setMethod(method);
            req.setBody(body);
            Http http = new Http();
            HttpResponse res;
            if (!Test.isRunningTest()) {
                req.setEndpoint(url);
                res = http.send(req);
            }
        }

    }

}

public class SurveyExtension {
    private Survey__c survey;
    public List<Survey_Answers__c> SurveyAnswers { get; private set; }

    public SurveyExtension(ApexPages.StandardController stdController) {
        this.survey = (Survey__c)stdController.getRecord();
        loadSurveyAnswers();
    }

    private void loadSurveyAnswers() {
        this.survey = [SELECT Id, Repair__c, Source__c,
                       (SELECT Id, Question__c, Answer__c 
                        FROM Survey_Answers__r 
                        ORDER BY CreatedDate ASC)
                       FROM Survey__c 
                       WHERE Id = :survey.Id AND Source__c = 'Tablet'];

        this.SurveyAnswers = this.survey.Survey_Answers__r;
    }
}

        };
        insert testAnswers;

    @isTest
    static void testSurveyExtensionConstructor() {

        Test.startTest();
        ApexPages.StandardController stdController = new ApexPages.StandardController(testSurvey);
        SurveyExtension extension = new SurveyExtension(stdController);
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertNotEquals(null, extension.SurveyAnswers, 'SurveyAnswers should not be null');
        System.assertEquals(2, extension.SurveyAnswers.size(), 'Should have loaded 2 survey answers');

    @isTest
    static void testLoadSurveyAnswers() {

        Test.startTest();
        ApexPages.StandardController stdController = new ApexPages.StandardController(testSurvey);
        SurveyExtension extension = new SurveyExtension(stdController);

}

@RestResource(urlMapping='/Survey/*')
global with sharing class SurveyRESTWebservice {

    @HttpPost
    global static String handleSurveyResponse() {
        RestRequest req = RestContext.request;
        RestResponse res = RestContext.response;

        try {

            String jsonBody = req.requestBody.toString();
            ClaimSurvey claimSurvey = (ClaimSurvey)JSON.deserialize(jsonBody, ClaimSurvey.class);

            Repair__c repair = [SELECT Id FROM Repair__c WHERE Claim_ID__c = :claimSurvey.ClaimID LIMIT 1];

            if (repair == null) {
                res.statusCode = 404;
                return 'Repair record not found for ClaimID: ' + claimSurvey.ClaimID;
            }

            Survey__c newSurvey = new Survey__c(
                Repair__c = repair.Id,
                Survey_Date__c = claimSurvey.SurveyResponses[0].DateTimeCompleted,
                Source__c = 'Tablet'
            );
            insert newSurvey;

            List<Survey_Answers__c> surveyAnswersToInsert = new List<Survey_Answers__c>();

            for (SurveyResponse sr : claimSurvey.SurveyResponses) {
                Survey_Answers__c newAnswer = new Survey_Answers__c(
                    Surveys_Tablet__c = newSurvey.Id,
                    Question__c = sr.Question,
                    Answer__c = sr.Answer,
                    Comment__c = sr.Comments
                );
                surveyAnswersToInsert.add(newAnswer);
            }

            insert surveyAnswersToInsert;

            res.statusCode = 200;
            return 'Survey and responses processed successfully';
        } catch (Exception e) {
            res.statusCode = 500;
            return 'Error processing survey responses: ' + e.getMessage();
        }
    }

    global class ClaimSurvey {
        public String ClaimID { get; set; }
        public List<SurveyResponse> SurveyResponses { get; set; }
    }

    global class SurveyResponse {
        public String Question { get; set; }
        public String Answer { get; set; }
        public String BID { get; set; }
        public DateTime DateTimeCompleted { get; set; }
        public String Comments { get; set; }
    }
}

        claimSurvey.ClaimID = 'TEST001';
        claimSurvey.SurveyResponses = new List<SurveyRESTWebservice.SurveyResponse>();

        SurveyRESTWebservice.SurveyResponse surveyResponse = new SurveyRESTWebservice.SurveyResponse();
        surveyResponse.Question = 'Test Question';
        surveyResponse.Answer = 'Test Answer';
        surveyResponse.BID = 'TEST_BID';
        surveyResponse.DateTimeCompleted = DateTime.now();
        surveyResponse.Comments = 'Test Comments';

        claimSurvey.SurveyResponses.add(surveyResponse);

        req.requestBody = Blob.valueOf(jsonBody);

        RestContext.request = req;
        RestContext.response = res;

        String result = SurveyRESTWebservice.handleSurveyResponse();

        List<Survey_Answers__c> surveyAnswers = [SELECT Id, Surveys_Tablet__c, Question__c, Answer__c, Comment__c FROM Survey_Answers__c];
        System.assertEquals(1, surveyAnswers.size());
        System.assertEquals('Test Question', surveyAnswers[0].Question__c);
        System.assertEquals('Test Answer', surveyAnswers[0].Answer__c);
        System.assertEquals('Test Comments', surveyAnswers[0].Comment__c);
    }

        req.requestBody = Blob.valueOf(jsonBody);

        RestContext.request = req;
        RestContext.response = res;

        Test.startTest();
        String result = SurveyRESTWebservice.handleSurveyResponse();
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertEquals(500, res.statusCode);
        //System.assertEquals('Repair record not found for ClaimID: NONEXISTENT', result);
    }

    @IsTest
    static void testHandleSurveyResponseException() {

        RestRequest req = new RestRequest();
        RestResponse res = new RestResponse();

        req.requestBody = Blob.valueOf('Invalid JSON');

        RestContext.request = req;
        RestContext.response = res;

        Test.startTest();
        String result = SurveyRESTWebservice.handleSurveyResponse();
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertEquals(500, res.statusCode);
        System.assert(result.startsWith('Error processing survey responses:'));

    @HttpPost
    global static UpsellReqResponseModel CreateUpsell(UpsellReqModel upsellModel) {       

        UpsellReqResponseModel reponse=new UpsellReqResponseModel();

        if(string.isblank(upsellModel.ParentId)){
             //create error reponse
            reponse.ErrorMessage = 'ParentId field must be passed in the webservice';
            reponse.MethodName = 'CreateUpsell';
            reponse.SFUpsellUniqueId = null;
            reponse.WasSuccessful = 'false';

            return reponse;
        }        

        //create Upsell from the passed in upsellModel data 
        Upsell__c upsell = new Upsell__c();
        upsell.Repair__c = upsellModel.ParentId;
        upsell.Upsell__c = upsellModel.Upsell;                
        upsell.Branch_Entry_Method__c = upsellModel.Branch_Entry_Method; 
        upsell.Current_KM_s_on_Vehicle__c = upsellModel.Current_KM_s_on_Vehicle;         
        upsell.Unrelated_Damage_information__c = upsellModel.Unrelated_Damage_information;        
        upsell.Policy_Number__c = upsellModel.Policy_Number; 
        upsell.Claim_Number__c = upsellModel.Claim_Number; 
        upsell.Other_Information__c = upsellModel.Other_Information; 

        upsell.Vehicle__c = upsellModel.Vehicle;
        upsell.Estimator__c = upsellModel.Estimator;
        upsell.Service_Advisor__c = upsellModel.Service_Advisor;
        upsell.Claims_Handler__c = upsellModel.Claims_Handler;
        upsell.Repairer__c = upsellModel.Repairer;
        upsell.Client__c = upsellModel.Client;               
        upsell.Insurance_Company__c = upsellModel.Insurance_Company;
        upsell.Claim_Administrator__c = upsellModel.Claim_Administrator;          

        upsell.DR_Number__c = upsellModel.DR_Number; 
        upsell.RO_Number__c = upsellModel.RO_Number;         
        upsell.Speedbump__c = upsellModel.Speedbump;        
        upsell.Status__c = upsellModel.Status;        
        upsell.Vehicle_Location__c = upsellModel.Vehicle_Location;

        upsell.Client_email_address__c = upsellModel.Client_email_address;
        upsell.Original_Quote__c = upsellModel.Original_Quote;
        upsell.Approved_Quote__c = upsellModel.Approved_Quote;
        upsell.Converted_Quote__c = upsellModel.Converted_Quote;
        upsell.Final_Costed_Quote__c = upsellModel.Final_Costed_Quote;

        upsell.PreCost_Parts_Ex_Markup_ExVat_Converted__c = upsellModel.PreCost_Parts_Ex_Markup_ExVat_Converted;

        upsell.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Final__c = upsellModel.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Final;
        upsell.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Final__c = upsellModel.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Final;
        upsell.Audatex_Vehicle_Assessment__c = upsellModel.Audatex_Vehicle_Assessment;

        upsell.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Invoiced__c = upsellModel.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Invoiced;
        upsell.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Invoiced__c = upsellModel.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Invoiced;
        upsell.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Invoiced__c = upsellModel.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Invoiced;
        upsell.Actual_Invoice_Date__c = upsellModel.Actual_Invoice_Date;
        upsell.Describe_briefly_the_area_type_of_repair__c = upsellModel.Describe_briefly_the_area_type_of_repair;

        upsell.Parts_Received_Value_Creditors__c = upsellModel.Parts_Received_Value_Creditors;  
        upsell.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization__c = upsellModel.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization;  
        upsell.Finals_Costing_Sent__c = upsellModel.Final_Costing_Sent;  
        upsell.Finals_Costing_Sent_Date__c = upsellModel.Final_Costing_Sent_Date;  
        upsell.Invoice_Sent__c = upsellModel.Invoice_Sent;  
        upsell.Invoice_Sent_Date__c = upsellModel.Invoice_Sent_Date;  

        //initialize        
        restServiceErrorMessages = new List<string>(); 

        System.debug('Upsell: '+upsell);        
        String upsellModelStr = JSON.serialize(upsellModel);
        System.debug('upsellModelStr: '+ upsellModelStr);

        //create Upsell here
        Database.SaveResult result = null;
        try{
            System.debug('Upsell object:'+ upsell);
            CheckRecursive.UpsellTriggerSFOrigin = false;
            result = Database.insert(upsell);

        }
        catch(Exception ex){                            
            System.Debug('ERROR on CreateUpsell: '+ex.getMessage());
            restServiceErrorMessages.add('ERROR on CreateUpsell: '+ex.getMessage());

            //create error reponse
            reponse.ErrorMessage = ex.getMessage();
            reponse.MethodName = 'CreateUpsell';
            reponse.SFUpsellUniqueId = null;
            reponse.WasSuccessful = 'false';

            return reponse;
        }

        if (result.isSuccess()) 
        {            
            //update vehicle object with restServiceErrorMessages
            string errStr;           
            for(string err: restServiceErrorMessages) 
            {
                errStr = errStr + err + '\n';
            }

            upsell.Id = result.Id;
            upsell.web_service_error__c = errStr;
            update upsell; 

            reponse.SFUpsellUniqueId = result.Id;
            reponse.UpsellName = [SELECT Name FROM upsell__c WHERE Id = :result.Id].Name;
            reponse.WasSuccessful = 'true';        
            reponse.MethodName = 'CreateUpsell';
            reponse.ErrorMessage = '';
            return reponse;
        }        
        return reponse;

    }

        insert actList;

public class UpsellWarrantyLigthtningApexController {
     //Use @AuraEnabled to enable client- and server-side access to the method
    @AuraEnabled
    public static string Upsell_StoreInField(String recordId) {

        System.debug('Record Id: '+ recordId);        
        //get the current record from Repair
        Repair__c r = [Select Id,Record_Id_and_Current_Date_time_upsell__c From Repair__c Where Id=:recordId];
        if(r != null){
            r.Record_Id_and_Current_Date_time_upsell__c = recordId + string.valueOf(DateTime.Now());
            update r;            

            //by this time, the Upsell record should have been created          
            Upsell__c upsell = [Select Id from Upsell__c where Repair__c = :r.Id and Record_Id_and_Current_Date_time_Upsell__c = :r.Record_Id_and_Current_Date_time_Upsell__c];

            return (upsell != null) ? upsell.Id : '';

        }                

        return '';       

    }

    @AuraEnabled
    public static string Warranty_StoreInField(String recordId) {

        System.debug('Record Id: '+ recordId);        
        //get the current record from Repair
        Repair__c r = [Select Id,Record_Id_and_Current_Date_time_Warranty__c From Repair__c Where Id=:recordId];
        if(r != null){
            r.Record_Id_and_Current_Date_time_Warranty__c = recordId + string.valueOf(DateTime.Now());
            update r;            

            //by this time, the warranty record should have been created

            Warranty__c w = [Select Id from Warranty__c where Repair__c = :r.Id and Record_Id_and_Current_Date_time_Warranty__c = :r.Record_Id_and_Current_Date_time_Warranty__c];

            return (w != null) ? w.Id : '';

        }                

        return '';
    }

}

public with sharing class VehiclePhotoController {
    public Repair__c repair { get; private set; }
    public List<Photo> selectedPhotos { get; private set; }

    public VehiclePhotoController(ApexPages.StandardController stdController) {
        this.repair = (Repair__c)stdController.getRecord();
        this.selectedPhotos = new List<Photo>();
    }

    public class Photo {
        @AuraEnabled public String exid { get; set; }
        @AuraEnabled public String vehicleRegistration { get; set; }
        @AuraEnabled public Date photoDate { get; set; }
        @AuraEnabled public String photoGroup { get; set; }
        @AuraEnabled public String imageDesc { get; set; }
        @AuraEnabled public String bigUrl { get; set; }
        @AuraEnabled public String smallUrl { get; set; }
        @AuraEnabled public String source { get; set; }
        @AuraEnabled public String base64Image { get; set; }
        @AuraEnabled public String roNumber { get; set; }

        public Photo() {}

        public Photo(String exid, String vehicleRegistration, Date photoDate, String photoGroup, 
                     String imageDesc, String bigUrl, String smallUrl, String source) {
            this.exid = exid;
            this.vehicleRegistration = vehicleRegistration;
            this.photoDate = photoDate;
            this.photoGroup = photoGroup;
            this.imageDesc = imageDesc;
            this.bigUrl = bigUrl;
            this.smallUrl = smallUrl;
            this.source = source;
            this.roNumber = roNumber;
        }
    }

    @AuraEnabled(cacheable=true)
    public static List<Photo> getRepairPhotos(Id repairId) {

        Repair__c repair = [SELECT CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, Vehicle__r.Name, RO_Number__c
                            FROM Repair__c 
                            WHERE Id = :repairId];

        if (repair == null) {
            throw new AuraHandledException('Repair record not found');
        }

        String vehicleRegistration = repair.Vehicle__r.Name;
        if (String.isNotBlank(vehicleRegistration)) {
            vehicleRegistration = vehicleRegistration.trim().replaceAll('\\s+', '');
        }
         else 
         {
            throw new AuraHandledException('Vehicle registration is blank');
        }

        String roNumber = repair.RO_Number__c;

        System.debug('RO Number from Repair: ' + roNumber); // Debug log 1
        System.debug('Repair record: ' + repair); // Debug log 2

        String startDate = repair.CreatedDate.addDays(-2).format('yyyy-MM-dd');
        String endDate = repair.LastModifiedDate.addDays(20).format('yyyy-MM-dd');        

        System.debug('Start Date: ' + startDate);
        System.debug('End Date: ' + endDate);

        List<Photo> photos = fetchPhotos(vehicleRegistration, startDate, endDate, roNumber); // Pass roNumber to fetchPhotos
        return photos;
    }

    private static List<Photo> fetchPhotos(String vehicleRegistration, String startDate, String endDate, String roNumber) {
        List<Photo> photos = new List<Photo>();

        System.debug('Start Date: ' + startDate);
        System.debug('End Date: ' + endDate);


        String soapBody = 
            '<soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">' +
                '<soap:Body>' +
                    '<ReturnPhotos xmlns="http://tempuri.org/">' +
                        '<key>H3nn13@n31</key>' +
                        '<vehicleRegistration>' + vehicleRegistration + '</vehicleRegistration>' +
                        '<startDAte>' + startDate + '</startDAte>' +
                        '<endDate>' + endDate + '</endDate>' +
                    '</ReturnPhotos>' +
                '</soap:Body>' +
            '</soap:Envelope>';


        HttpRequest req = new HttpRequest();
        req.setEndpoint('https://login.renew-it.co.za/repairpull/webservice1.asmx');
        req.setMethod('POST');
        req.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/xml;charset=UTF-8');
        req.setHeader('SOAPAction', 'http://tempuri.org/ReturnPhotos');
        req.setBody(soapBody);

        Http http = new Http();
        HttpResponse res = http.send(req);

        if (res.getStatusCode() == 200) {

            Dom.Document doc = res.getBodyDocument();
            Dom.XmlNode envelope = doc.getRootElement();
            Dom.XmlNode body = envelope.getChildElement('Body', 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/');
            Dom.XmlNode response = body.getChildElement('ReturnPhotosResponse', 'http://tempuri.org/');
            Dom.XmlNode result = response.getChildElement('ReturnPhotosResult', 'http://tempuri.org/');

            for (Dom.XmlNode photoNode : result.getChildElements()) {
                Photo photo = new Photo();
                photo.exid = photoNode.getChildElement('EXID', 'http://tempuri.org/').getText();
                photo.vehicleRegistration = photoNode.getChildElement('VehicleRegistration', 'http://tempuri.org/').getText();
                photo.photoDate = Date.valueOf(photoNode.getChildElement('Date', 'http://tempuri.org/').getText());
                photo.photoGroup = photoNode.getChildElement('Photo_Group', 'http://tempuri.org/').getText();
                photo.imageDesc = photoNode.getChildElement('ImageDesc', 'http://tempuri.org/').getText();
                String bigUrl = photoNode.getChildElement('Big', 'http://tempuri.org/').getText();
                String smallUrl = photoNode.getChildElement('Small', 'http://tempuri.org/').getText();
                photo.bigUrl = bigUrl.replace('https://online.', 'https://oldonline.');
                photo.smallUrl = smallUrl.replace('https://online.', 'https://oldonline.');
                photo.source = photoNode.getChildElement('Source', 'http://tempuri.org/').getText();
                photo.roNumber = roNumber;
                photos.add(photo);
            }   
        }
        return photos;
    }
    public List<ContentVersion> getStoredImageData() {
        return null;
    }

    public static String getImageAsBase64(String imageUrl) 
    {
        System.debug('getImageAsBase64 called with URL: ' + imageUrl);
        Http h = new Http();
        HttpRequest req = new HttpRequest();
        req.setEndpoint(imageUrl);
        req.setMethod('GET');

        HttpResponse res = h.send(req);
        if (res.getStatusCode() == 200) {
            return EncodingUtil.base64Encode(res.getBodyAsBlob());
        } else {
            throw new AuraHandledException('Failed to fetch image from URL: ' + imageUrl);
        }
    }
}

    private class MockHttpResponseGenerator implements HttpCalloutMock {
        private boolean emptyResponse;

        public MockHttpResponseGenerator() {
            this.emptyResponse = false;
        }

        public MockHttpResponseGenerator(boolean emptyResponse) {
            this.emptyResponse = emptyResponse;
        }

        public HTTPResponse respond(HTTPRequest req) {
            HttpResponse res = new HttpResponse();
            res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/xml');
            res.setStatusCode(200);

            if (!emptyResponse) {
                res.setBody('<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>' +
                        '<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">' +
                        '<soap:Body>' +
                        '<ReturnPhotosResponse xmlns="http://tempuri.org/">' +
                        '<ReturnPhotosResult>' +
                        '<spReturnPhotosResult>' +
                        '<EXID>123</EXID>' +
                        '<VehicleRegistration>TEST123</VehicleRegistration>' +
                        '<Date>2024-10-04 10:51:52</Date>' +
                        '<Photo_Group>Test Group</Photo_Group>' +
                        '<ImageDesc>Test Description</ImageDesc>' +
                        '<Big>http://example.com/big1.jpg</Big>' +
                        '<Small>http://example.com/small1.jpg</Small>' +
                        '<Source>Test</Source>' +
                        '</spReturnPhotosResult>' +
                        '<spReturnPhotosResult>' +
                        '<EXID>124</EXID>' +
                        '<VehicleRegistration>TEST123</VehicleRegistration>' +
                        '<Date>2024-10-04 10:52:52</Date>' +
                        '<Photo_Group>Test Group 2</Photo_Group>' +
                        '<ImageDesc>Test Description 2</ImageDesc>' +
                        '<Big>http://example.com/big2.jpg</Big>' +
                        '<Small>http://example.com/small2.jpg</Small>' +
                        '<Source>Test</Source>' +
                        '</spReturnPhotosResult>' +
                        '</ReturnPhotosResult>' +
                        '</ReturnPhotosResponse>' +
                        '</soap:Body>' +
                        '</soap:Envelope>');
            } else {
                res.setBody('<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>' +
                        '<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">' +
                        '<soap:Body>' +
                        '<ReturnPhotosResponse xmlns="http://tempuri.org/">' +
                        '<ReturnPhotosResult></ReturnPhotosResult>' +
                        '</ReturnPhotosResponse>' +
                        '</soap:Body>' +
                        '</soap:Envelope>');
            }
            return res;
        }
    }

    public class CustomException extends Exception {}


    private class MockHttpResponseGeneratorImage implements HttpCalloutMock {
        public HTTPResponse respond(HTTPRequest req) {
            HttpResponse res = new HttpResponse();
            res.setStatusCode(200);
            res.setBodyAsBlob(Blob.valueOf('test image data')); // Simulating an image as a Blob
            return res;
        }
    }
}

@RestResource(urlMapping='/Vehicle/*')
global with sharing  class VehicleRESTWebservice {

    global static List<string> restServiceErrorMessages{get;set;}

    global class VehicleReqModel{   
        public string Id {get;set;}
        public string Name {get;set;}
        public string Vin_Chassis_Number {get;set;}
        public string Colour {get;set;}
        public string Paint_Type {get;set;}
        public string Natis_Life_Cycle_code {get;set;}
        public string Luxury_Niche_Vehicle {get;set;}
        public string MM_Code {get;set;}
        public string Additional_Information {get;set;}
        public string Make {get;set;}
        public string Model {get;set;}
    }

    global class VehicleReqResponseModel{   
        public string SFVehicleUniqueId { get; set; }
        public string VehicleRegNumber {get;set;}
        public string MethodName { get; set; }
        public string WasSuccessful { get; set; }
        public string ErrorMessage { get; set; }
    }

    @HttpPost
    global static VehicleReqResponseModel CreateVehicle(VehicleReqModel vehModel) {  

        List<Vehicle__c> existingVehicles = [SELECT Id, Name, Colour__c, Additional_Information__c, Luxury_Niche_Vehicle__c, Make__r.Name, Make__r.Id, Model__c FROM Vehicle__c WHERE Name = :vehModel.Name LIMIT 1];

        if (!existingVehicles.isEmpty()){
            Vehicle__c checkExisting = existingVehicles[0];
            VehicleReqResponseModel vehicleExistsResponse = new VehicleReqResponseModel();
            vehicleExistsResponse.SFVehicleUniqueId = checkExisting.Id;
            vehicleExistsResponse.VehicleRegNumber = checkExisting.Name;
            vehicleExistsResponse.MethodName = 'CreateVehicle';
            vehicleExistsResponse.WasSuccessful = 'false';
            vehicleExistsResponse.ErrorMessage = 'Vehicle Already Exists';
            return vehicleExistsResponse;
        }

        Vehicle__c veh = new Vehicle__c();
        veh.Colour__c = vehModel.Colour;
        veh.Additional_Information__c = vehModel.Additional_Information;
        veh.Luxury_Niche_Vehicle__c = vehModel.Luxury_Niche_Vehicle;

        if (String.isNotBlank(vehModel.Make)) {
            if (vehModel.Make.startsWith('a0')) {
                veh.Make__c = vehModel.Make;
            } else {
                veh.Make__c = checkIfMakeIsAvailable(vehModel.Make); 
            }
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(vehModel.Model) && String.isNotBlank(veh.Make__c)) {
            if (vehModel.Model.startsWith('a0')) {
                veh.Model__c = vehModel.Model;  
            } else {
                veh.Model__c = checkIfModelIsAvailable(vehModel.Model, veh.Make__c); 
            }
        }

        veh.Name = vehModel.Name;
        veh.MM_Code__c = vehModel.MM_Code;
        veh.Natis_Life_Cycle_code__c = vehModel.Natis_Life_Cycle_code;
        veh.Paint_Type__c = vehModel.Paint_Type;
        veh.Vin_Chassis_Number__c = vehModel.Vin_Chassis_Number;

        VehicleReqResponseModel reponse=new VehicleReqResponseModel();
        restServiceErrorMessages = new List<string>(); 

        System.debug('veh: '+veh);

        Database.SaveResult result = null;
        try{
            System.debug('veh:'+ veh);
            result = Database.insert(veh);
        }
        catch(Exception ex){                            
            System.Debug('ERROR on CreateVehicle: '+ex.getMessage());
            restServiceErrorMessages.add('ERROR on CreateVehicle: '+ex.getMessage());

            reponse.ErrorMessage = ex.getMessage();
            reponse.MethodName = 'CreateVehicle';
            reponse.SFVehicleUniqueId = null;
            reponse.WasSuccessful = 'false';

            return reponse;
        }

        if (result.isSuccess()) 
        {            
            string errStr = '';           
            for(string err: restServiceErrorMessages) 
            {
                errStr = errStr + err + '\n';
            }

            veh.Id = result.Id;
            veh.web_service_error__c = errStr;
            update veh; 

            reponse.SFVehicleUniqueId = result.Id;
            reponse.VehicleRegNumber = [SELECT Name FROM Vehicle__c WHERE Id = :result.Id].Name;
            reponse.WasSuccessful = 'true';        
            reponse.MethodName = 'CreateVehicle';
            reponse.ErrorMessage = '';
            return reponse;
        }        
        return reponse;
    }

     @HttpPut
    global static VehicleReqResponseModel UpdateVehicle(VehicleReqModel vehModel) {     

        VehicleReqResponseModel respModel=new VehicleReqResponseModel();        

        Vehicle__c veh = [Select Name,Colour__c,Additional_Information__c,Luxury_Niche_Vehicle__c,Make__c,
                            Model__c,MM_Code__c,Natis_Life_Cycle_code__c,Paint_Type__c,Vin_Chassis_Number__c
                            From Vehicle__c Where Id = :vehModel.Id];

        veh.Colour__c = vehModel.Colour;
        veh.Additional_Information__c = vehModel.Additional_Information;
        veh.Luxury_Niche_Vehicle__c = vehModel.Luxury_Niche_Vehicle;

        if (String.isNotBlank(vehModel.Make)) {
            if (vehModel.Make.startsWith('a0')) {
                veh.Make__c = vehModel.Make;
            } else {
                veh.Make__c = checkIfMakeIsAvailable(vehModel.Make);
            }
        }

        if (String.isNotBlank(vehModel.Model) && String.isNotBlank(veh.Make__c)) {
            if (vehModel.Model.startsWith('a0')) {
                veh.Model__c = vehModel.Model;
            } else {
                veh.Model__c = checkIfModelIsAvailable(vehModel.Model, veh.Make__c);
            }
        }

        //veh.Model__c = //checkIfModelIsAvailable(vehModel.Model, veh.Make__c);
        veh.Name = vehModel.Name;
        veh.MM_Code__c = vehModel.MM_Code;
        veh.Natis_Life_Cycle_code__c = vehModel.Natis_Life_Cycle_code;
        veh.Paint_Type__c = vehModel.Paint_Type;
        veh.Vin_Chassis_Number__c = vehModel.Vin_Chassis_Number;

        try{
            update veh;  

            respModel.ErrorMessage = '';
            respModel.MethodName = 'UpdateVehicle';
            respModel.SFVehicleUniqueId = veh.Id;
            respModel.VehicleRegNumber = veh.Name;
            respModel.WasSuccessful = 'true';
        }
        catch(Exception ex){                            
             System.Debug('ERROR on UpdateVehicle: '+ex.getMessage());

            respModel.ErrorMessage = ex.getMessage();
            respModel.MethodName = 'UpdateVehicle';
            respModel.SFVehicleUniqueId = veh.Id;
            respModel.VehicleRegNumber = veh.Name;
            respModel.WasSuccessful = 'false';
         }

        return respModel;
    }

    private static Id checkIfMakeIsAvailable(string makeName){

        if (String.isBlank(makeName)) return null;

        List<Make__c> makeObj = [SELECT Id FROM Make__c WHERE Name = :makeName LIMIT 1];
        if (!makeObj.isEmpty()){
            return makeObj[0].Id;
        } else {
            Make__c newMake = new Make__c();
            newMake.Name = makeName;
            insert newMake;
            return newMake.Id; 
        }
    }

    private static Id checkIfModelIsAvailable(string modelName, string makeName){

        if (String.isBlank(modelName)) return null;

        Id makeId = checkIfMakeIsAvailable(makeName);
        List<Model__c> modelObj = [SELECT Id FROM Model__c WHERE Name = :modelName AND Make__c = :makeId LIMIT 1];
        if (!modelObj.isEmpty()){
            return modelObj[0].Id;
        } else {
            Model__c newModel = new Model__c();
            newModel.Name = modelName;
            newModel.Make__c = makeId;
            insert newModel;
            return newModel.Id;
        }
    }    
}

        VehicleRESTWebservice.VehicleReqResponseModel response = VehicleRESTWebservice.CreateVehicle(request);

        System.assertEquals('true', response.WasSuccessful);
        System.assertEquals(vehicle.Id, response.SFVehicleUniqueId);
        System.assertEquals(make.Id, vehicle.Make__c);
    }

    @IsTest 
    static void testCreateVehicleWithStringMakeModel() {
        VehicleRESTWebservice.VehicleReqModel request = createTestRequest('Honda', 'Civic');

        VehicleRESTWebservice.VehicleReqResponseModel response = VehicleRESTWebservice.CreateVehicle(request);

        System.assertEquals('Civic', vehicle.Model__r.Name);

    @IsTest 
    static void testUpdateVehicle() {
        Make__c make = [SELECT Id FROM Make__c LIMIT 1];
        Model__c model = [SELECT Id FROM Model__c LIMIT 1];

        Vehicle__c vehicle = new Vehicle__c(
            Name = 'Test Vehicle',
            Make__c = make.Id,
            Model__c = model.Id
        );
        insert vehicle;

        VehicleRESTWebservice.VehicleReqModel request = createTestRequest(make.Id, model.Id);
        request.Id = vehicle.Id;
        request.Vin_Chassis_Number = 'UpdatedVIN';

        Test.startTest();
        VehicleRESTWebservice.VehicleReqResponseModel response = VehicleRESTWebservice.UpdateVehicle(request);
        Test.stopTest();

        Vehicle__c updated = [SELECT Vin_Chassis_Number__c FROM Vehicle__c WHERE Id = :vehicle.Id];
        System.assertEquals('UpdatedVIN', updated.Vin_Chassis_Number__c);
        System.assertEquals('true', response.WasSuccessful);
    }

    @IsTest 
    static void testCreateDuplicateVehicle() {
        Vehicle__c existing = new Vehicle__c(Name = 'Testing');
        insert existing;

        VehicleRESTWebservice.VehicleReqModel request = createTestRequest('Make', 'Model');
        request.Name = 'Testing';

        Test.startTest();
        VehicleRESTWebservice.VehicleReqResponseModel response = VehicleRESTWebservice.CreateVehicle(request);
        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertEquals('false', response.WasSuccessful);
        System.assertEquals('Vehicle Already Exists', response.ErrorMessage);
    }

    private static VehicleRESTWebservice.VehicleReqModel createTestRequest(String make, String model) {
        VehicleRESTWebservice.VehicleReqModel request = new VehicleRESTWebservice.VehicleReqModel();
        request.Name = 'Testing';
        request.Colour = 'Red';
        request.Additional_Information = 'None';
        request.Luxury_Niche_Vehicle = 'Yes';
        request.Make = make;
        request.Model = model;
        request.MM_Code = '19299';
        request.Natis_Life_Cycle_code = '1';
        request.Paint_Type = 'Metallic';
        request.Vin_Chassis_Number = '282822828';
        return request;
    }
}

<pre><code>public with sharing class WarrantyJobOnlineCallout {

    public class WarrantyJobInput {
        @InvocableVariable(required=true)
        public String caseId;

        @InvocableVariable(required=true)
        public String warrantyReason;

        @InvocableVariable
        public Boolean courtesyCar;

        @InvocableVariable
        public Boolean awaitingBackOrderParts;

        @InvocableVariable
        public String warrantyJobId;

        @InvocableVariable
        public String parentId;
    }

    @InvocableMethod(label='Submit Warranty Job to Online System' 
                     description='Submits a warranty job to the online system')
    public static List<WarrantyJobOutput> submitWarrantyJobToOnlineSystem(List<WarrantyJobInput> inputs) {
        List<WarrantyJobOutput> outputs = new List<WarrantyJobOutput>();

        for (WarrantyJobInput input : inputs) {
            processWarrantyJobAsync(input.caseId, input.warrantyReason, 
                                  input.courtesyCar, input.awaitingBackOrderParts, input.warrantyJobId, input.parentId);

            WarrantyJobOutput output = new WarrantyJobOutput();
            output.successful = true;
            output.message = 'Warranty job submitted for processing';
            outputs.add(output);
        }

        return outputs;
    }

    @future(callout=true)
    @TestVisible
    private static void processWarrantyJobAsync(String caseId, String warrantyReason, Boolean courtesyCar, Boolean awaitingBackOrderParts, String warrantyJobId, String parentId) {
        processWarrantyJob(caseId, warrantyReason, courtesyCar, awaitingBackOrderParts, warrantyJobId, parentId);
    }

    @TestVisible
    private static void processWarrantyJob(String caseId, String warrantyReason, Boolean courtesyCar, Boolean awaitingBackOrderParts, String warrantyJobId, String parentId) {

        Case warrantyCase = [SELECT Id, CaseNumber, OwnerId, Owner.FirstName, Owner.LastName,
                           LastModifiedBy.Name, LastModifiedDate, Branch_Id__c 
                           FROM Case WHERE Id = :caseId];

        WarrantyJobPayload payload = createPayloadFromCase(warrantyCase, warrantyReason, courtesyCar, awaitingBackOrderParts, warrantyJobId);

        WarrantyJobOutput response = makeOnlineCallout(payload, parentId);

    }

    @TestVisible
    private static WarrantyJobPayload createPayloadFromCase(Case warrantyCase, String warrantyReason, Boolean courtesyCar, Boolean awaitingBackOrderParts, String warrantyJobId) {

        WarrantyJobPayload payload = new WarrantyJobPayload();

        payload.CaseId = warrantyCase.Id;
        payload.WarrantyReason = warrantyReason;
        payload.CoutesyCar = courtesyCar;
        payload.AwaitingBackOrderParts = awaitingBackOrderParts;

        String username = (warrantyCase.Owner.FirstName + '.' + warrantyCase.Owner.LastName).toLowerCase();
        payload.Username = username;

        payload.WarrantyJobId = warrantyJobId; 

        return payload;
    }

    @TestVisible
    private static WarrantyJobOutput makeOnlineCallout(WarrantyJobPayload payload, String parentId) {
        Http http = new Http();
        HttpRequest httpRequest = new HttpRequest();

        Online_System__mdt apiConfig = Online_System__mdt.getInstance('WarrantyJob');
        if (apiConfig == null) {
            return new WarrantyJobOutput(false, 'Online System API configuration not found');
        }

        httpRequest.setEndpoint(apiConfig.Base_URL__c + 'api/Ticket/PostWarranty');
        httpRequest.setMethod('POST');
        httpRequest.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
        httpRequest.setHeader('Authorization', 'Bearer ' + apiConfig.Bearer_Token__c);

        httpRequest.setBody(JSON.serialize(payload));

        System.debug('Warranty Job Payload: ' + JSON.serializePretty(payload));

        return sendRequest(http, httpRequest, payload.WarrantyJobId, parentId); 
    }

    @TestVisible
    private static WarrantyJobOutput sendRequest(Http http, HttpRequest httpRequest, String WarrantyJobId, String parentId) {

        WarrantyJobOutput  response;

        try {
          HttpResponse httpResponse = http.send(httpRequest);

          if (httpResponse.getStatusCode() == 200) {
            Map<String, Object> responseBody = (Map<String, Object>)JSON.deserializeUntyped(httpResponse.getBody());
            Boolean success = (Boolean)responseBody.get('Successful');
            String message = (String)responseBody.get('Message');

            System.debug('Response: ' + responseBody);

            if(success && responseBody.containsKey('Repair')) {
              RepairDto repairData = (RepairDto)JSON.deserialize(JSON.serialize(responseBody.get('Repair')), RepairDto.class); 
              updateParentJob(success, message, parentId);                                 
              handleRepairUpdate(repairData, WarrantyJobId, parentId);
            }

            response = new WarrantyJobOutput(success, message);

          } else {
            response = new WarrantyJobOutput(false, 'Callout failed. Status: ' + httpResponse.getStatus());
          }

        } catch (Exception e) {
          response = new WarrantyJobOutput(false, 'Exception: ' + e.getMessage()); 
        }

        return response;
    }

    private static void updateParentJob(Boolean success, String message, String parentId ){

        Repair__c repair;
        try {
            repair = [Select Id, Warranty_Successful__c, Warranty_Job_Error__c FROM Repair__c WHERE Id = :parentId];
            repair.Warranty_Successful__c = success;
            repair.Warranty_Job_Error__c = message;
            update repair;
        } catch (Exception ex){
            System.debug('Error Occured Updating Parent:' + ex.getMessage());
        }
    }

    @TestVisible
    private static void handleRepairUpdate(RepairDto repairData, String warrantyJobId, String parentId) {

        System.debug('Repair Data:' + repairData);

        Repair__c repair;

        try {

            repair = [SELECT Name, Vehicle_under_manufacturer_warranty__c, Rectification_Comeback_Warranty_Repair__c,
            Describe_briefly_the_area_type_of_repair__c, Branch_Entry_Method__c, Current_KM_s_on_Vehicle__c,
            Upsell__c, Unrelated_Damage_information__c, Client__c, Insurance_Company__c, Broker__c,
            Claim_Administrator__c, Policy_Number__c, Claim_Number__c, Other_Information__c, Vehicle__c,
            DR_Number__c, RO_Number__c, Action__c, Speedbump__c, Status__c, Vehicle_Location__c, Estimator__c,
            Service_Advisor__c, Service_Advisor_Email__c, Service_Advisor_Test__c, Claims_Handler__c,
            Original_Quote__c, Approved_Quote__c, Converted_Quote__c,
            Final_Costed_Quote__c, Speedbump_Reasons__c, Not_Proceeding__c, Not_Proceeding_Reasons__c,
            Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Original__c, Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Original__c,
            Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Approved__c, Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Approved__c,
            Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Converted__c, Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_ExVat_Converted__c,
            PreCost_Parts_Ex_Markup_ExVat_Converted__c, Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Final__c,
            Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Final__c, Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Final__c,
            Audatex_Vehicle_Assessment__c, Repairer__c, Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Invoiced__c,
            Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Invoiced__c, Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Invoiced__c,
            Actual_Invoice_Date__c, Excess_Value__c, Excess_Paid__c, Shop_Allocation__c, Client_Booking_Date__c,
            Parts_Received_Value_Creditors__c, Finals_Costing_Sent__c, Finals_Costing_Sent_Date__c,
            Invoice_Sent__c, Invoice_Sent_Date__c, Broker_text__c, Insurance_Company_text__c,
            Awaiting_Additional_Authorization__c, Online_Status__c, Claim_s_Handler_Text__c,
            Estimator_Text__c,Estimator_Contact__c,Claim_ID__c, Service_Advisor_Text__c, Client_Contact__c, Claim_Handler_Cont__c,
            Service_Advisor_cont__c, Parent_Repair__c, Repair_Type__c, Towing_Company_Name__c,FleetDealershipSelfInsured__c, Stock_Yard__c, Stock_Yard_Status__c
            FROM Repair__c
            WHERE Id = :warrantyJobId LIMIT 1];

            repair.Parent_Repair__c = parentId;
            repair.Repair_Type__c = 'Warranty';

            if (repairData.ClaimID != null){
                repair.Claim_ID__c = String.valueOf(repairData.ClaimID);
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Branch)){
                repair.RecordTypeId = getRecordTypeId(repairData.Branch);
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Vehicle_under_manufacturer_warranty) && repairData.Vehicle_under_manufacturer_warranty == 'Yes' || repairData.Vehicle_under_manufacturer_warranty == 'No'){
                    repair.Vehicle_under_manufacturer_warranty__c = repairData.Vehicle_under_manufacturer_warranty;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Rectification_Comeback_Warranty_Repair) && repairData.Rectification_Comeback_Warranty_Repair == 'Yes' || repairData.Rectification_Comeback_Warranty_Repair == 'No'){
                repair.Rectification_Comeback_Warranty_Repair__c = repairData.Rectification_Comeback_Warranty_Repair;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Describe_briefly_the_area_type_of_repair)){
                repair.Describe_briefly_the_area_type_of_repair__c = repairData.Describe_briefly_the_area_type_of_repair;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Branch_Entry_Method) && repairData.Branch_Entry_Method == 'Driveable' || repairData.Branch_Entry_Method == 'Non-Driveable'){
                repair.Branch_Entry_Method__c = repairData.Branch_Entry_Method;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Current_KM_s_on_Vehicle)){
                repair.Current_KM_s_on_Vehicle__c = repairData.Current_KM_s_on_Vehicle;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Unrelated_Damage_information)){
                repair.Unrelated_Damage_information__c = repairData.Unrelated_Damage_information;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Policy_Number)){
                repair.Policy_Number__c = repairData.Policy_Number;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Claim_Number)){
                repair.Claim_Number__c = repairData.Claim_Number;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Other_Information)){
                repair.Other_Information__c = repairData.Other_Information;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Vehicle) && repairData.Vehicle.startsWith('a05IV')){
                repair.Vehicle__c = repairData.Vehicle;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Service_Advisor) && repairData.Service_Advisor.length() >= 3) {
                String serviceadvisorIdPrefix = repairData.Service_Advisor.substring(0, 3);

                if (serviceadvisorIdPrefix == '003') {  
                    repair.Service_Advisor_cont__c = repairData.Service_Advisor;
                } else if (serviceadvisorIdPrefix == '001') { 
                    repair.Service_Advisor__c = repairData.Service_Advisor;
                } else {
                    System.debug('Warning: Invalid Service Advisor ID: ' + repairData.Service_Advisor);
                }
            } else {
                System.debug('Warning: Service Advisor ID is invalid or too short: ' + repairData.Service_Advisor);
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Service_Advisor_Email)){
                repair.Service_Advisor_Email__c = repairData.Service_Advisor_Email;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Service_Advisor_Test)){
                repair.Service_Advisor_Test__c = repairData.Service_Advisor_Test;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Claims_Handler) && repairData.Claims_Handler.startsWith('005')){
                repair.Claims_Handler__c = repairData.Claims_Handler;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.ClaimHandler) || String.isNotBlank(repairData.Claim_Administrator)) {
                repair.Claim_s_Handler_Text__c = String.isNotBlank(repairData.ClaimHandler) ? repairData.ClaimHandler : repairData.Claim_Administrator;
            }

            if (repairData.Claim_Administrator != null) {
                if (repairData.Claim_Administrator.startsWith('003')) {
                    repair.Claim_Handler_Cont__c = repairData.Claim_Administrator;
                } else if (repairData.Claim_Administrator.startsWith('001')) {
                    List<Account> personAccounts = [SELECT PersonContactId 
                                                    FROM Account 
                                                    WHERE Id = :repairData.Claim_Administrator 
                                                    AND IsPersonAccount = true 
                                                    LIMIT 1];

                    if (!personAccounts.isEmpty() && personAccounts[0].PersonContactId != null) {
                        repair.Claim_Handler_Cont__c = personAccounts[0].PersonContactId;
                    } else {
                        repair.Claim_Administrator__c = repairData.Claim_Administrator;
                        System.debug('Warning: Account is not a PersonAccount or PersonContactId is null: ' + repairData.Claim_Administrator);
                    }
                } else {
                    System.debug('Warning: Claim Administrator ID is not a valid Contact ID or Account ID: ' + repairData.Claim_Administrator);
                }
            } else {
                System.debug('Warning: Claim Administrator is null');
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Client)) {
                String clientIdPrefix = repairData.Client.substring(0, 3);

                if (clientIdPrefix == '003') {  
                    repair.Client_Contact__c = repairData.Client;
                } else if (clientIdPrefix == '001') { 
                    Account personAccount = [SELECT PersonContactId FROM Account WHERE Id = :repairData.Client LIMIT 1];
                    if (personAccount != null && personAccount.PersonContactId != null) {
                        repair.Client_Contact__c = personAccount.PersonContactId;
                    } else {
                        throw new IllegalArgumentException('Invalid Person Account or PersonContactId not found');
                    }
                } else {
                    throw new IllegalArgumentException('Invalid Client ID format');
                }
            }

            if (String.isNotEmpty(repairData.Broker)){
                repair.Broker_text__c = repairData.Broker;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Insurer)){
                repair.Insurance_Company_text__c = repairData.Insurer;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.FleetDealership)) {
                repair.FleetDealershipSelfInsured__c = repairData.FleetDealership;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.DR_Number)) {
                repair.DR_Number__c = repairData.DR_Number;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.RO_Number)) {
                repair.RO_Number__c = repairData.RO_Number;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Action)){
                repair.Action__c = repairData.Action;        
            }

            if (repairData.Speedbump != null) {
                repair.Speedbump__c = repairData.Speedbump;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Speedbump_Reasons)){
                repair.Speedbump_Reasons__c = repairData.Speedbump_Reasons;
                repair.Speedbump__c = true;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Status)) {
                if (repairData.Status.contains('-')){
                    repair.Online_Status__c = repairData.Status;
                } else {
                    repair.Status__c = repairData.Status;
                }
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.EstimatorText)){
                repair.Estimator_Text__c = repairData.EstimatorText;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Estimator) && repairData.Estimator.startsWith('003')){
                repair.Estimator_Contact__c = repairData.Estimator;
            } else if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.Estimator) && repairData.Estimator.startsWith('005')){
                repair.Estimator__c = repairData.Estimator;
            }

            if (String.isNotBlank(repairData.ServiceAdvisor)){
                repair.Service_Advisor_Text__c = repairData.ServiceAdvisor;
            }

            if (repairData.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization != null || repairData.AwaitingAdditionalAuth != null){
                repair.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization__c = repairData.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization ?? repairData.AwaitingAdditionalAuth ?? false;
            }

            if (string.isNotBlank(repairData.Towing_Company)){
                repair.Towing_Company_Name__c = repairData.Towing_Company;
            }

            if (repairData.Stock_Yard != null){
                repair.Stock_Yard__c = String.valueOf(repairData.Stock_Yard);
            }

            if (string.isNotBlank(repairData.Stock_Yard_Status)){
                repair.Stock_Yard_Status__c = String.valueOf(repairData.Stock_Yard_Status);
            }

            repair.Original_Quote__c = repairData.Original_Quote;
            repair.Approved_Quote__c = repairData.Approved_Quote;
            repair.Converted_Quote__c = repairData.Converted_Quote;
            repair.Final_Costed_Quote__c = repairData.Final_Costed_Quote;
            repair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Original__c = repairData.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Original;
            repair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Original__c = repairData.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Original;
            repair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Approved__c = repairData.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Approved;
            repair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Approved__c = repairData.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Approved;
            repair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Converted__c = repairData.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Converted;
            repair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_ExVat_Converted__c = repairData.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_ExVat_Converted;
            repair.PreCost_Parts_Ex_Markup_ExVat_Converted__c = repairData.PreCost_Parts_Ex_Markup_ExVat_Converted;
            repair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Final__c = repairData.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Final;
            repair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Final__c = repairData.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Final;
            repair.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Final__c = repairData.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Final;
            repair.Audatex_Vehicle_Assessment__c = repairData.Audatex_Vehicle_Assessment;
            repair.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Invoiced__c = repairData.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Invoiced;
            repair.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Invoiced__c = repairData.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Invoiced;
            repair.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Invoiced__c = repairData.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Invoiced;
            repair.Excess_Value__c = repairData.Excess_Value;   
            repair.Excess_Paid__c = repairData.Excess_Paid;  
            repair.Shop_Allocation__c = repairData.Shop_Allocation;  
            repair.Parts_Received_Value_Creditors__c = repairData.Parts_Received_Value_Creditors;  
            repair.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization__c = repairData.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization;  
            repair.Finals_Costing_Sent__c = repairData.Final_Costing_Sent;  
            repair.Invoice_Sent__c = repairData.Invoice_Sent;  

            if (repairData.Actual_Invoice_Date != null) {
                repair.Actual_Invoice_Date__c = date.valueOf(repairData.Actual_Invoice_Date);
            }
            if (repairData.Client_Booking_Date != null) {
                repair.Client_Booking_Date__c = Datetime.valueOf(repairData.Client_Booking_Date);
            }
            if (repairData.Final_Costing_Sent_Date != null) {
                repair.Finals_Costing_Sent_Date__c = Datetime.valueOf(repairData.Final_Costing_Sent_Date);
            }
            if (repairData.Invoice_Sent_Date != null) {
                repair.Invoice_Sent_Date__c = Datetime.valueOf(repairData.Invoice_Sent_Date);
            }

            update repair;

        } catch(Exception e) {
            System.debug(LoggingLevel.ERROR, 'Error updating repair record: ' + e.getMessage());
        }
    }

    public static Id getRecordTypeId(String branchName) {
        Set<String> validBranches = new Set<String>{
            'BMW Auto Approved Repair Centre',
            'Renew-it Bedfordview',
            'Renew-it DCP',
            'Renew-it Greenstone',
            'Renew-it Proline',
            'Renew-It Proline Express Sandhurst',
            'Renew-it Randburg',
            'Renew-it Rivonia',
            'Renew-it Sandton',
            'Renew-it Sydney',
            'Renew-it Technostar',
            'Renew-It Umlhanga'
        };

        if (branchName == null) {
            System.debug('branchName is null');
            return null;
        }

        if (branchName.contains('Exp')) {
            System.debug('Branch name contains "Exp", returning ID for Renew-It Proline Express Sandhurst');
            return Schema.SObjectType.Repair__c.getRecordTypeInfosByName().get('Renew-It Proline Express Sandhurst').getRecordTypeId();
        }

        for (String validBranch : validBranches) {
            System.debug('Checking branch: ' + validBranch);
            if (branchName.contains(validBranch)) {
                Map<String, Schema.RecordTypeInfo> recordTypeInfoMap = Schema.SObjectType.Repair__c.getRecordTypeInfosByName();

                if (recordTypeInfoMap != null && recordTypeInfoMap.containsKey(validBranch)) {
                    Schema.RecordTypeInfo recordTypeInfo = recordTypeInfoMap.get(validBranch);

                    if (recordTypeInfo != null && recordTypeInfo.isAvailable()) {
                        return recordTypeInfo.getRecordTypeId();
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        System.debug('No valid record type found for branch: ' + branchName);
        return null;
    }  

    @TestVisible
    public class WarrantyJobOutput {

        @InvocableVariable(label='Was Call Successful' description='Indicates if the warranty job submission was successful')
        public Boolean successful;

        @InvocableVariable(label='Response Message' description='Message returned from the warranty system')
        public String message;

        public WarrantyJobOutput() {
        }

        public WarrantyJobOutput(Boolean successful, String message) {
            this.successful = successful;
            this.message = message;
        }
    }
