@isTest
private class WarrantyJobOnlineCalloutTest {

    @TestSetup
    static void setupTestData() {
        Profile p = [SELECT Id FROM Profile WHERE Name = 'Standard User'];
        User testUser = new User(
            FirstName = 'Test',
            LastName = 'User',
            Email = 'test.user@example.com',
            Username = 'test.user@example.com' + System.currentTimeMillis(),
            Alias = 'tuser',
            EmailEncodingKey = 'UTF-8',
            LanguageLocaleKey = 'en_US',
            LocaleSidKey = 'en_US',
            TimeZoneSidKey = 'America/Los_Angeles',
            ProfileId = p.Id
        );
        insert testUser;

        Case testCase = new Case(
            Subject = 'Test Case',
            Status = 'New',
            OwnerId = testUser.Id
        );
        insert testCase;

        Repair__c testRepair = new Repair__c(
            Status__c = 'New',
            Repair_Type__c = 'Warranty'
        );
        insert testRepair;
    }

    @isTest
    static void testSuccessfulWarrantyJobSubmission() {
        Case testCase = [SELECT Id FROM Case LIMIT 1];
        Repair__c testRepair = [SELECT Id FROM Repair__c LIMIT 1];
        String testParentId = getFakeId(Repair__c.SObjectType);

        Test.setMock(HttpCalloutMock.class, new WarrantyJobCalloutMock(true, 'Success', testParentId));

        Test.startTest();

        WarrantyJobOnlineCallout.WarrantyJobInput input = new WarrantyJobOnlineCallout.WarrantyJobInput();
        input.caseId = testCase.Id;
        input.warrantyReason = 'Test Reason';
        input.courtesyCar = true;
        input.awaitingBackOrderParts = false;
        input.warrantyJobId = testRepair.Id;
        input.parentId = testParentId;

        List<WarrantyJobOnlineCallout.WarrantyJobOutput> outputs = 
            WarrantyJobOnlineCallout.submitWarrantyJobToOnlineSystem(new List<WarrantyJobOnlineCallout.WarrantyJobInput>{input});

        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertEquals(1, outputs.size());
        System.assertEquals(true, outputs[0].successful);
        System.assertEquals('Warranty job submitted for processing', outputs[0].message);
    }

    @isTest
    static void testFailedWarrantyJobSubmission() {
        Case testCase = [SELECT Id FROM Case LIMIT 1];
        Repair__c testRepair = [SELECT Id FROM Repair__c LIMIT 1];
        String testParentId = getFakeId(Repair__c.SObjectType);

        Test.setMock(HttpCalloutMock.class, new WarrantyJobCalloutMock(false, 'Error occurred', testParentId));

        Test.startTest();

        WarrantyJobOnlineCallout.WarrantyJobInput input = new WarrantyJobOnlineCallout.WarrantyJobInput();
        input.caseId = testCase.Id;
        input.warrantyReason = 'Test Reason';
        input.courtesyCar = false;
        input.awaitingBackOrderParts = true;
        input.warrantyJobId = testRepair.Id;
        input.parentId = testParentId;

        List<WarrantyJobOnlineCallout.WarrantyJobOutput> outputs = 
            WarrantyJobOnlineCallout.submitWarrantyJobToOnlineSystem(new List<WarrantyJobOnlineCallout.WarrantyJobInput>{input});

        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertEquals(1, outputs.size());
        System.assertEquals(true, outputs[0].successful);
        System.assertEquals('Warranty job submitted for processing', outputs[0].message);
    }

    @isTest

            WarrantyJobOnlineCallout.createPayloadFromCase(testCase, 'Test Reason', true, false, testRepair.Id);

        Test.stopTest();

        System.assertEquals(testCase.Id, payload.CaseId);

        System.assertEquals(true, payload.CoutesyCar);
        System.assertEquals(false, payload.AwaitingBackOrderParts);
        System.assertEquals('test.user', payload.Username);
        System.assertEquals(testRepair.Id, payload.WarrantyJobId);
    }

    private static String getFakeId(Schema.SObjectType sot) {
        String result = String.valueOf(sot.getDescribe().getKeyPrefix());
        String suffix = '0'.repeat(12);
        return result + suffix;
    }

    private class WarrantyJobCalloutMock implements HttpCalloutMock {
        private Boolean successful;
        private String message;
        private String parentId;

        public WarrantyJobCalloutMock(Boolean successful, String message, String parentId) {
            this.successful = successful;
            this.message = message;
            this.parentId = parentId;
        }

        public HttpResponse respond(HttpRequest request) {
            HttpResponse response = new HttpResponse();
            response.setStatusCode(200);

            WarrantyJobOnlineCallout.RepairDto repairDto = new WarrantyJobOnlineCallout.RepairDto();
            repairDto.ParentId = this.parentId;
            repairDto.Status = 'In Progress';
            repairDto.RepairType = 'Warranty';

            Map<String, Object> responseBody = new Map<String, Object>{
                'Successful' => this.successful,
                'Message' => this.message,
                'Repair' => repairDto
            };

            response.setBody(JSON.serialize(responseBody));
            return response;
        }
    }

     global class WarrantyReqResponseModel{

    @HttpPost
    global static WarrantyReqResponseModel CreateWarranty(WarrantyReqModel wtyModel) {       

        WarrantyReqResponseModel reponse=new WarrantyReqResponseModel();

        if(string.isblank(wtyModel.ParentId)){
             //create error reponse
            reponse.ErrorMessage = 'ParentId field must be passed in the webservice';
            reponse.MethodName = 'CreateWarranty';
            reponse.SFWarrantyUniqueId = null;
            reponse.WasSuccessful = 'false';

            return reponse;
        }        

        //create Warranty from the passed in wtyModel data 
        Warranty__c warranty = new Warranty__c();
        warranty.Repair__c = wtyModel.ParentId;
        warranty.Vehicle_under_manufacturer_warranty__c = wtyModel.Vehicle_under_manufacturer_warranty;                
        warranty.Branch_Entry_Method__c = wtyModel.Branch_Entry_Method; 
        warranty.Current_KM_s_on_Vehicle__c = wtyModel.Current_KM_s_on_Vehicle;         
        warranty.Unrelated_Damage_information__c = wtyModel.Unrelated_Damage_information;        
        warranty.Policy_Number__c = wtyModel.Policy_Number; 
        warranty.Claim_Number__c = wtyModel.Claim_Number; 
        warranty.Other_Information__c = wtyModel.Other_Information; 

        warranty.Vehicle__c = wtyModel.Vehicle;
        warranty.Estimator__c = wtyModel.Estimator;
        warranty.Service_Advisor__c = wtyModel.Service_Advisor;
        warranty.Claims_Handler__c = wtyModel.Claims_Handler;
        warranty.Repairer__c = wtyModel.Repairer;
        warranty.Client__c = wtyModel.Client;               
        warranty.Insurance_Company__c = wtyModel.Insurance_Company;
        warranty.Claim_Administrator__c = wtyModel.Claim_Administrator;          

        warranty.DR_Number__c = wtyModel.DR_Number; 
        warranty.RO_Number__c = wtyModel.RO_Number;         
        warranty.Speedbump__c = wtyModel.Speedbump;        
        warranty.Status__c = wtyModel.Status;        
        warranty.Vehicle_Location__c = wtyModel.Vehicle_Location;

        warranty.Client_email_address__c = wtyModel.Client_email_address;
        warranty.Original_Quote__c = wtyModel.Original_Quote;
        warranty.Approved_Quote__c = wtyModel.Approved_Quote;
        warranty.Converted_Quote__c = wtyModel.Converted_Quote;
        warranty.Final_Costed_Quote__c = wtyModel.Final_Costed_Quote;
        warranty.Speedbump_Reasons__c = wtyModel.Speedbump_Reasons;
        warranty.Not_Proceeding__c = wtyModel.Not_Proceeding;
        warranty.Not_Proceeding_Reasons__c = wtyModel.Not_Proceeding_Reasons;
        warranty.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Original__c = wtyModel.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Original;
        warranty.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Original__c = wtyModel.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Original;
        warranty.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Approved__c = wtyModel.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Approved;
        warranty.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Approved__c = wtyModel.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Approved;
        warranty.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Converted__c = wtyModel.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Converted;
        warranty.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_ExVat_Converted__c = wtyModel.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_ExVat_Converted;
        warranty.PreCost_Parts_Ex_Markup_ExVat_Converted__c = wtyModel.PreCost_Parts_Ex_Markup_ExVat_Converted;
        warranty.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Final__c = wtyModel.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Final;
        warranty.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Final__c = wtyModel.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Final;
        warranty.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Final__c = wtyModel.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Final;
        warranty.Audatex_Vehicle_Assessment__c = wtyModel.Audatex_Vehicle_Assessment;

        warranty.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Invoiced__c = wtyModel.Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Invoiced;
        warranty.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Invoiced__c = wtyModel.Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Invoiced;
        warranty.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Invoiced__c = wtyModel.Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Invoiced;
        warranty.Actual_Invoice_Date__c = wtyModel.Actual_Invoice_Date;
        warranty.Describe_briefly_the_area_type_of_repair__c = wtyModel.Describe_briefly_the_area_type_of_repair;

        warranty.Client_Booking_Date__c = wtyModel.Client_Booking_Date;  
        warranty.Parts_Received_Value_Creditors__c = wtyModel.Parts_Received_Value_Creditors;  
        warranty.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization__c = wtyModel.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization;  
        warranty.Finals_Costing_Sent__c = wtyModel.Final_Costing_Sent;  
        warranty.Finals_Costing_Sent_Date__c = wtyModel.Final_Costing_Sent_Date;  
        warranty.Invoice_Sent__c = wtyModel.Invoice_Sent;  
        warranty.Invoice_Sent_Date__c = wtyModel.Invoice_Sent_Date;  

        //initialize        
        restServiceErrorMessages = new List<string>(); 

        System.debug('Warranty: '+warranty);        
        String wtyModelStr = JSON.serialize(wtyModel);
        System.debug('wtyModelStr: '+ wtyModelStr);

        //create Warranty here
        Database.SaveResult result = null;
        try{
            System.debug('Warranty object:'+ warranty);
            CheckRecursive.WarrantyTriggerSFOrigin = false;
            result = Database.insert(warranty);

        }
        catch(Exception ex){                            
            System.Debug('ERROR on CreateWarranty: '+ex.getMessage());
            restServiceErrorMessages.add('ERROR on CreateWarranty: '+ex.getMessage());

            //create error reponse
            reponse.ErrorMessage = ex.getMessage();
            reponse.MethodName = 'CreateWarranty';
            reponse.SFWarrantyUniqueId = null;
            reponse.WasSuccessful = 'false';

            return reponse;
        }

        if (result.isSuccess()) 
        {            
            //update vehicle object with restServiceErrorMessages
            string errStr;           
            for(string err: restServiceErrorMessages) 
            {
                errStr = errStr + err + '\n';
            }

            warranty.Id = result.Id;
            warranty.web_service_error__c = errStr;
            update warranty; 

            reponse.SFWarrantyUniqueId = result.Id;
            reponse.WarrantyName = [SELECT Name FROM warranty__c WHERE Id = :result.Id].Name;
            reponse.WasSuccessful = 'true';        
            reponse.MethodName = 'CreateWarranty';
            reponse.ErrorMessage = '';
            return reponse;
        }        
        return reponse;

    }

    @HttpPut
    global static WarrantyReqResponseModel UpdateWarranty(WarrantyReqModel wtyModel) {     

        //initialize
        WarrantyReqResponseModel respModel=new WarrantyReqResponseModel();

                          Final_Costed_Quote__c,Speedbump_Reasons__c,Not_Proceeding__c,Not_Proceeding_Reasons__c,Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Original__c,

                          Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Final__c,Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Final__c,
                          Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Final__c,Audatex_Vehicle_Assessment__c,Repairer__c,
                          Quote_Value_Ex_Vat_Incl_Excess_Invoiced__c,Parts_Value_Incl_Markup_Ex_Vat_Invoiced__c,Parts_Actuals_Excl_Markup_Invoiced__c,
                          Actual_Invoice_Date__c,Describe_briefly_the_area_type_of_repair__c,
                          Client_Booking_Date__c,Parts_Received_Value_Creditors__c,Finals_Costing_Sent__c,Finals_Costing_Sent_Date__c,
                          Invoice_Sent__c,Invoice_Sent_Date__c,Awaiting_Additional_Authorization__c
                          From Warranty__c
                    Where Id = :wtyModel.Id];

        warranty.Repair__c = wtyModel.ParentId;
        warranty.Vehicle_under_manufacturer_warranty__c = wtyModel.Vehicle_under_manufacturer_warranty;         
        warranty.Branch_Entry_Method__c = wtyModel.Branch_Entry_Method; 
        warranty.Current_KM_s_on_Vehicle__c = wtyModel.Current_KM_s_on_Vehicle;        
        warranty.Unrelated_Damage_information__c = wtyModel.Unrelated_Damage_information; 
        warranty.Policy_Number__c = wtyModel.Policy_Number; 
        warranty.Claim_Number__c = wtyModel.Claim_Number; 
        warranty.Other_Information__c = wtyModel.Other_Information; 

        warranty.Vehicle__c = wtyModel.Vehicle;
        warranty.Estimator__c = wtyModel.Estimator;
        warranty.Service_Advisor__c = wtyModel.Service_Advisor;
        warranty.Claims_Handler__c = wtyModel.Claims_Handler;
        warranty.Repairer__c = wtyModel.Repairer;
        warranty.Client__c = wtyModel.Client;
        warranty.Insurance_Company__c = wtyModel.Insurance_Company;
        warranty.Broker__c = wtyModel.Broker;
        warranty.Claim_Administrator__c = wtyModel.Claim_Administrator;

        warranty.DR_Number__c = wtyModel.DR_Number; 
        warranty.RO_Number__c = wtyModel.RO_Number;

        warranty.Status__c = wtyModel.Status;        
        warranty.Vehicle_Location__c = wtyModel.Vehicle_Location;

        wtyModel.Awaiting_Additional_Authorization= True;
        wtyModel.Final_Costing_Sent= True;
        wtyModel.Invoice_Sent= True;

        Test.startTest();
            // Create Warranty                  
            WarrantyRESTWebservice.WarrantyReqResponseModel res = WarrantyRESTWebservice.CreateWarranty(wtyModel);
            System.debug('Response on CreateWarranty: '+ res);            
            // Verify results

docs.text: Name Data Type Expression Description formulaCheckNoteFormat Boolean AND(    CONTAINS(LOWER({!$Record.Body__c}), "confirmed that the client was contacted during"),    CONTAINS(LOWER({!$Record.Body__c}), "the response was")) formulaExtractConfirmCall String CASE(    TRIM(        LOWER(            MID(                $Record.Body__c,                FIND("during", LOWER($Record.Body__c)) + 6,                FIND("stage", LOWER($Record.Body__c)) - (FIND("during", LOWER($Record.Body__c)) + 6)            )        )    ),    "quote confirmation", "Quote Confirmation",    "quote followed up", "Quote Followed Up",    "introduction", "Introduction",    "ready", "Ready",    "in progress", "In Progress",    "other", "Other",    "") formulaExtractResponse String CASE(    IF(CONTAINS(LOWER($Record.Body__c), "response was answered"), "Answered",    IF(CONTAINS(LOWER($Record.Body__c), "response was no answer(left"), "No Answer(Left a Message)",    IF(CONTAINS(LOWER($Record.Body__c), "response was no answer"), "No Answer",    IF(CONTAINS(LOWER($Record.Body__c), "response was face to face"), "Face to Face",    ""))))    ,    "Answered", "Answered",    "No Answer", "No Answer",    "No Answer(Left a Message)", "No Answer(Left a Message)",    "Face to Face", "Face to Face",    "")
